content: Lub plaub hlis ntuj nub xab tsib xyoo peb caug,  kuv yog Npuxis tug tub Exekees kws ua povthawj, kuv tau nrug cov Yudas kws raug nteg coj moog nyob ntawm tug Dlej Khenpales huv lub nroog Npanpiloos. Ntuj txawm qheb ces kuv ua ywgtoog pum Vaajtswv lug qha rua kuv.
(Yog xyoo tsib kws Vaajntxwv Yehauyakhees raug luas nteg coj moog).
Thaus kuv nyob huv lub nroog Npanpiloos kws nyob ntawm tug ntug Dlej Khenpales, kuv nov tug TSWV lug has rua kuv hab nwg lub fwjchim lug kaav hlo kuv.

Kuv tsaa muag saib rua sau, kuv pum muaj naag xub naag cua lug saab qaumteb lug. Muaj tsaglig xub cig laim quas lag huv ib tauv fuab kws luj luj tuaj, hab lub ntuj kws nyob puagncig tauv fuab ntawd los ci ntsaa ab. Nyob rua huv cov tsaglig xub ntawd, muaj ib yaam ci zoo le tooj dlaag.
Nyob rua huv cov naag xub naag cua ntawd, kuv pum plaub tug qhelunpees zoo ib yaam le tuabneeg.
Tabsis ib tug qhelunpees twg muaj plaub lub ntsejmuag hab plaub phob tis.
Puab tej teg taw yag quas leeg hab muaj rau zoo ib yaam le rau nyuj, puab ci ib yaam le tej tooj dlaag kws luas muab txhuam tau lawm.
Dlua le ntawd, ib tug qhelunpees twg muaj plaub txhais teg zoo le teg tuabneeg, ib txhais teg nyob rua huv qaab ib phob tis. Hab cov qhelunpees ntawd cov ntsejmuag hab cov koojtis zoo le nuav:
Txhua tug qhelunpees nthuav tis tuaj sis twb ua ib lub vaajvoog plaub ceg kaum. Thaus puab moog kev, puab moog ua ib paab tsi tig le.

Cov qhelunpees ntawd txhua tug puavleej muaj plaub lub ntsejmuag kws zoo tsi sis thooj. Lub ntsejmuag kws zoo le tuabneeg nyob tom hauv ntej, lub ntsejmuag kws zoo le tsuv ntxhuav nyob saab xis, lub ntsejmuag kws zoo le tug txiv nyuj nyob saab txhumphem hab lub ntsejmuag kws zoo le tug dlaav nyob tom qaab.
Ib tug qhelunpees twg nthuav ob phob tis  tsaa rua sau, tug tom qaab nthuav tis moog twb tug tom ntej phob tis. Hab muaj dlua ob phob tis dlauv npug lub cev.
Txhua tug qhelunpees twg muaj plaub lub ntsejmuag rua plaub saab. Cov qhelunpees ntawd yuav moog rua saab twg los yeej moog tau lawv le puab xaav tsi taag yuav tig cev le.
Nyob huv  cov qhelunpees muaj dlua ib yaam zoo le teg tsau kws cig laam lug moog moog lug lug. Cov nplaim tawg ntawd yaa tej ntshuas lab pis vog ib yaam le tsaglig xub tawm tuaj.
Cov qhelunpees ntawd txaav moog moog lug lug ceev cuag tsaglig xub laim.
Thaus kuv tseem saib ntsoov plaub tug qhelunpees ntawd, kuv pum ib tug qhelunpees twg muaj ib lub lug nyob ntawm ib saab,  cov lug ntawd puavleej chwv aav.
Plaub lub lug ntawd zoo ib yaam nkaus, cov lug ntawd ci ib yaam le tej qai zeb muaj nqes; hab ib lub lug twg tseem muaj dlua ib lub lug kws nyob rua ntawm ceg kaum saab xis.
Cov lug ntawd txhaj ndlog tau moog rua txhua phaab.
Muaj qhovmuag nyob thoob plawg cov lug ntawd tej npoo.
Thaus twg cov qhelunpees ntawd moog kev, ces cov lug ntawd txawm ndlog moog hab, yog cov qhelunpees ntawd yaa moog sab, cov lug ntawd nqaa sab hab.
Cov qhelunpees ntawd xaav moog qhov twg los puab yeej moog tau, hab cov lug ndlog lawv le cov qhelunpees ntawd, rua qhov cov qhelunpees yog cov kws tswj cov lug ntawd.
Thaus twg cov qhelunpees ntawd moog kev, nreg lossis yaa sab rua sau nruab ntug, cov lug yeej moog lawv nraim le cov qhelunpees ntawd.
Nyob ntawm cov qhelunpees taubhau rua sau, muaj ib yaam nthuav zoo le lub tsev kheej kws muab cov qai zeb muaj nqes ci ci ua.
Cov qhelunpees ntawd sawv huv qaab qhov kws zoo le lub tsev kheej ntawd, puab nthuav tis ib tug twb ib tug, hab muab ob phob tis nthuav npug lub cev.

Thaus cov qhelunpees ntawd yaa, kuv nov puab ntxuaj tis nrov ib yaam le dlej havtxwv ndlaas hab ib yaam le paab tubrog coob coob moog kev, hab yaam le Vaajtswv tug kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus lub suab. Thaus puab tsaws, puab qhaws nkaus puab tej tis,
tabsis tseem muaj ib lub suab nrov sau qhov kws zoo le lub tsev kheej kws nyob sau cov qhelunpees ntawd taubhau tuaj.
Nyob sau qhov kws zoo le lub tsev ntawd, muaj ib qhov zoo le lub zwmtxwv kws yog muab cov qai zeb Xafiles ua hab tug kws nyob sau lub zwmtxwv ntawd muaj tug yaam ntxwv zoo le tuabneeg.
Tug yaam ntxwv ntawd ci ib yaam le tej tooj dlaag kws muab hlawv rua huv qhovcub. Muaj nplaim tawg cig laam lug puagncig tug yaam ntxwv ntawd,

hab nyob huv cov nplaim tawg ntawd, muaj ib yaam zoo le tug dluab zaaj. Qhov ntawd yog tug TSWV tug tshwjchim kws ci ntsaa ab nyob ntawm nwg xubndlag. Thaus kuv pum dlheev le ntawd, kuv nyo ntshis ti nkaus rua huv aav, ces kuv txawm nov ib lub suab
has tas “Tub noobneej, koj ca le sawv! Kuv muaj lug yuav has rua koj.”
Thaus lub suab ntawd has taagnrho, Vaajtswv tug ntsujplig txawm lug kaav hlo kuv, ua rua kuv sawv tseeg nreg nreeg hab kuv nov ib lub suab has ntxiv tas,
“Tub noobneej, kuv yuav khaiv koj moog cuag cov Yixalayees. Puab tau ntxeev sab tawmtsaam kuv hab puab tseem ntxeev sab qeeg ib yaam le puab cov yawmkoob tau ua lug lawm.
Puab tawv ncauj hab tsi fwm kuv, yog le ntawd kuv txhaj khaiv koj moog qha rua puab has tas, tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam yog tug has tej lug nuav rua puab.
Txawm yog cov tuabneeg ntxeev sab ntawd yuav nyam noog koj has hab tsi noog los xij, puab yuav paub has tas muaj ib tug cev Vaajtswv lug nrug puab nyob lawm.

“Tabsis tub noobneej, koj yuavtsum tsi xob ntshai puab lossis tej lug kws puab has. Puab yuav tsi txaus sab hab yuav saib tsi taug koj, yuav zoo le koj moog nyob huv cov raubris teb. Txawm le ntawd los koj tsi xob ntshai cov tuabneeg ntxeev sab ntawd lossis tej lug kws puab has rua koj.
Koj yuavtsum qha rua puab lawv le kuv kuas koj qha, txawm yog puab yuav nyam noog koj has hab tsi noog los xij. Ncu ntsoov has tas puab yeej yog tuabneeg ntxeev sab hab phem kawg le.
“Tub noobneej, koj ca le noog tej lug kws kuv has rua koj. Koj tsi xob ntxeev sab ib yaam le puab cov ntawd. Koj ca le rua qhovncauj hab noj yaam kws kuv yuav muab rua koj noj.”
Kuv txawm pum dlheev ib txhais teg tuav rawv ib thooj ntawv cev tuaj rua kuv.

Txhais teg ntawd nthuav kag thooj ntawv rua kuv saib, kuv pum muaj npe ntawv sau rua huv thooj ntawv ntawd thoob plawg ob saab tuabsi, muaj tej suab quaj tu sab kawg nkaus, tej suab quaj ntsuag hab suab ntsaaj sau rua huv thooj ntawv ntawd.
Vaajtswv has tas, “Tub noobneej, koj ca le noj thooj ntawv nuav; hab moog has rua cov Yixalayees.”
Kuv txhaj le rua qhovncauj hab nwg muab thooj ntawv rua kuv noj.
Nwg has tas, “Tub noobneej, ca le noj thooj ntawv kws kuv muab rua koj; noj kuas puv koj lub plaab.” Thaus kuv noj thooj ntawv ntawd, mas qaab zib npaum le zib ntaab ntaag.
Vaajtswv has tas, “Tub noobneej, koj ca le moog cuag cov Yixalayees hab has rua puab lawv le kuv qha rua koj lawm.
Kuv tsi khaiv koj moog rua lwm tsaav tuabneeg kws koj tsi paub luas tej lug, tabsis yog khaiv koj moog rua tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees xwb.
Yog has tas kuv khaiv koj moog rua tej tsaav tuabneeg kws has tej lug kws koj tsi yoojyim totaub, mas puab tseem yuav noog koj has dlua.
Tabsis cov Yixalayees yuav tsi muaj ib tug noog koj has, txawm yog kuv has los puab tub tsi noog. Puab cov ntawd yeej yog noob tawv ncauj hab tsi noog lug.
Nwgnuav kuv yuav ua kuas koj muaj lub sab tawv ib yaam le puab, koj txhaj le muaj cuabkaav tiv taug puab.
Kuv yuav ua kuas koj tawv ib yaam le lub qai zeb muaj nqes kws tawv dlua tej pobzeb hauvsim; koj tsi xob ntshai cov tuabneeg ntxeev sab ntawd hlo le.”
Vaajtswv has ntxiv tas, “Tub noobneej, ca le ua tuab zoo noog tej lug kws kuv has rua koj hab khaws txhua yaam rua nruab sab.

Koj ca le moog cuag koj cov tuabneeg kws raug luas nteg coj moog rua lwm tebchaws lawm, hab has rua puab tas, tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has le nuav. Txawm yog puab yuav noog koj has hab tsi noog los xij.”
Ces Vaajtswv tug Ntsujplig txawm lug muab kuv nqaa hlo hab kuv nov ib lub suab has tom qaab tuaj has tas, “Ca le qhuas tug TSWV kws muaj tshwjchim ci ntsaa ab kws nyob sau ntuj.”
Kuv nov cov qhelunpees cov tis sis txhuam hab cov lug lub suab sau nruab ntug nrov cuag aav qeeg thoob nplajteb.
Tug TSWV tug ntsujplig lug kaav hlo kuv hab coj kuv moog, kuv dlhuav hab npautawg kawg le.

Yog le ntawd kuv txhaj moog rua huv Tiles Anpis kws nyob ntawm ntug Dlej Khenpales, qhov chaw kws cov Yixalayees raug nteg moog nyob, hab kuv nyob qhov ntawd tau xyaa nub, kuv xaav tsi thoob rua tej kws kuv pum hab kuv nov ntawd le.
Tom qaab xyaa nub ntawd, tug TSWV rov has rua kuv.
Nwg has tas, “Tub noobneej, kuv muab koj tsaa ua ib tug faajxwm saib cov Yixalayees. Koj yuav coj kuv tej lug ceebtoom moog qha rua puab.

Yog kuv has tas ib tug tuabneeg txhum yuav tuag, tabsis koj tsi qha kuas nwg hloov sab, kuas nwg tsi xob raug kev pluj tuag, nwg yuav tuag vim nwg tej kev txhum, mas kuv yuav muab nwg lub txim rua koj ris.
Yog has tas koj tub xub qha rua tug tuabneeg txhum ntawd lawm, tabsis nwg tsi kaam tso nwg tej kev txhum tseg, mas tug ntawd yuav tuag vim nwg tej kev txhum, tabsis koj yuav dlim.

“Yog ib tug tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg tso kev ncaaj nceeg tseg moog ua txhum, yog kuv muab kev sim sab lug cuab nwg kev, yog koj tsi moog qha nwg, mas nwg yuav tuag vim nwg tej kev txhum, kuv yuav tsi suav tej kws nwg tau ua zoo taag lug lawm, hab kuv yuav muab nwg lub txim rua koj ris.
Yog koj ntuag ib tug tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg kuas tsi xob ua txhum, yog nwg noog koj lug hab tsi ua txhum, nwg yuav tsi raug kev pluj kev tuag, ces kuv yuav tseg koj txujsa.”
Tug Tswv lub fwjchim lug kaav hlo kuv hab tug TSWV has rua kuv tas, “Koj ca le sawv moog rua tom lub haav. Kuv muaj lug yuav has rua koj tod!”
Yog le ntawd, kuv txhaj moog rua tom lub haav, kuv pum tug TSWV tug tshwjchim ci ntsaa ab ib yaam le kuv tau pum ntawm ntug Dlej Khenpales, kuv txawm qhau cev hlo ua ntsejmuag ti nkaus rua huv aav,
Tabsis Vaajtswv tug Ntsujplig lug kaav hlo kuv hab tsaa kuv sawv. Tug TSWV has rua kuv tas, “Koj ca le rov moog tsev, kaw qhovrooj hab nyob tuabywv.
Tub noobneej, koj yuav raug luas muab hlua khi hab koj yuav tsiv tsi dlhau ntawm puab moog le.
Kuv yuav ua kuas koj tug nplaig txhaav hab has tsi tau lug rua cov tuabneeg ntxeev sab ntawd.

Thaus kuv has lug rua koj hab pub koj rov has tau lug, ces koj yuav has rua puab tas, tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has le nuav. Puab cov ntawd muaj ibtxha yuav noog koj has hab muaj ibtxha yuav tsi noog, rua qhov puab yog noob ntxeev sab.”
Vaajtswv has tas, “Tub noobneej, koj moog nqaa ib dlaim thwvcib lug tso rua ntawm koj xubndlag hab muab suam ua lub nroog Yeluxalees.
Koj ua kuas muaj ntsaa yeej puagncig lub nroog, muaj chaw faajxwm, muab aav meem ua tug ntswg tiv rog, hab tso tej cuabyeej rhuav lub nroog puagncig lub nroog.

Koj muab ib dlaim hlau lug tsaa ua ib tug ntsaa yeej quas koj hab lub nroog, pev txug lub nroog taabtom raug luas tuaj tua hab koj yog tug kws tuaj vij lub nroog ntawd ntaag. Qhov nuav yuav ua ib qho cim tseemceeb rua tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees.

“Koj pw tig rua saab txhumphem. Kuv  yuav muab tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees tej kev txhum tso rua sau koj, koj yuav pw txomnyem peb puas cuaj caum nub vim puab tej kev txhum. Ib xyoos twg kuv rau txim rua koj ib nub txhaj yuav taag puab tej kev txhum.
Thaus koj ua le ntawd taag lawm, koj tsua pw tig rua saab xis tiv kev txomnyem plaub caug nub vim cov Yudas tej kev txhum. Ib xyoos twg kuv rau txim rua koj ib nub.
“Koj tig xubndlag rua lub nroog Yeluxalees; nqug nrig rua lub nroog hab cev kuv tej lug tawmtsaam lub nroog ntawd.
Kuv yuav muab koj khi rua ntawd, kuas koj tig tsi tau cev moog txug thaus luas tuaj vij tau lub nroog tsaiv!

“Koj ca le muab moov pas, moov nplej, moov taum laag, moov taum mog, moov cej hab moov qeb sis xyaw zuaj puab ua ncuav. Npaaj tej ntawd rua koj noj lub sijhawm peb puas cuaj caum nub kws koj pw tig rua saab txhumphem ntawd.
Ib nub twg tsuas pub koj noj yim laag ncuav xwb, tsi pub noj tshaaj ntawd le.
Ib nub twg tsuas pub koj haus ob khob dlej xwb, tsi pub haus tshaaj ntawd le.
Koj muab tuabneeg tej quav qhuav ua tawg rauv, ci ncuav sau cov ncaig quav tuabneeg ntawd, hab coj moog noj taabmeeg rua txhua tug pum.”
Tug TSWV has tas, “Cov Yixalayees yuav tau noj tej zaub mov tsi huv kws txwv tsi pub noj  thaus kws kuv ntab puab moog nyob rua lwm tebchaws lawm.”

Kuv teb has tas, “Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam, kuv ua tsi tau le ko! Kuv yeej tsi tau ua ib yaam tsi huv rua kuv lub cev le. Txij thaus kws kuv tseem yog mivnyuas yau lug, kuv yeej tsi tau noj tej nqaj tsaj kws nwg tuag nwg lossis tej kws tsaj qus tum tuag le. Kuv yeej tsi tau noj ib yaam zaub mov kws tsi huv le.”
Yog le ntawd Vaajtswv txhaj has tas, “Zoo lawm lauj! Kuv yuav ca koj muab quav nyuj hloov quav tuabneeg hab koj yuav ci ncuav sau cov ncaig quav nyuj ntawd.”

Vaajtswv has ntxiv tas, “Tub noobneej, kuv yuav txav tsi pub kuas lub nroog Yeluxalees muaj noj muaj haus, cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv yuav nyuaj sab heev, ces puab yuav muab teev luj zaub mov rua puab noj hab luj dlej rua puab haus lawm xwb.
Zaub mov hab dlej haus los kuj taag, mas puab yuav taag kev ca sab hab puab yuav raug kev puamtsuaj vim puab tej kev txhum.”
Tug TSWV has tas, “Tub noobneej, ca le muab ib raab ntaaj kws ntse heev lug chais koj cov fwjtxwv hab cov plaubhau kuas dlu lug. Muab teev lug kiv cov plaubhau ntawd hab muab faib ua peb feem.

Thaus luas vij lub nroog dlhau lawm, koj muab ib feem coj moog hlawv rua huv nroog, muaj dlua ib feem koj muab koj raab ntaaj tsuav ncig lub nroog, hab muab dlua ib feem tso rua cua tshuab yaa moog, kuv yuav rhu kuv raab ntaaj caum.
Koj muab ob peb txuj plaubhau ntsaws rua huv koj lub nqaws tsho ca.
Hab koj rov rhu ob peb txuj coj moog hlawv rua huv qhovcub dlua hab ca kuas kub nyab taag. Txij ntawd moog suavtawg yuav kis moog kub tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees kuas taag.”
Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has tas, “Koj saib maj! Kuv muab lub nroog Yeluxalees tso rua huv plawv nplajteb kws muaj ntau lub tebchaws nyob puagncig nwg.

Tabsis vim Yeluxalees tawmtsaam kuv tej lug saamfwm, kuv txhaj paub has tas nwg ua phem tshaaj lwm tsaav tuabneeg hab tawv ncauj tshaaj cov tebchaws kws nyob puagncig nwg. Yeluxalees tso kuv tej lug saamfwm tseg hab tsi coj lawv le kuv tej Kevcai.

Yeluxalees, kuv yog tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam, koj noog kuv has: vim koj tsi coj lawv le kuv tej Kevcai hab tsi ceev kuv tej lug saamfwm, koj txhaj tsim kev kub ntxhuv ntau dlua cov tebchaws kws nyob puagncig koj. Koj tseem xyum ua lawv le lwm tsaav tuabneeg ua hab.
Kuv yog tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam, kuv qha rua koj has tas kuv yog koj tug yeebncuab ntaag. Kuv yuav rau txim rua koj taabmeeg txhua tsaav tuabneeg.
Vim tej kev phem kev qas kws koj ua, kuv yuav rau txim rua lub nroog Yeluxalees kws yaav taag lug kuv tsi tau rau dlua, hab yaav tom ntej los yuav tsi rau ib zag le lawm.

Vim le ntawd cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees, nam txiv yuav noj mivnyuas hab mivnyuas yuav noj nam txiv. Kuv yuav rau txim rua mej cov kws tseem ua neej nyob kuas tsiv moog nyob ua saab ua sua rua txhua qhov.

“Kuv yog Vaajtswv tug kws muaj sa nyob, kuv has rua mej tas, vim mej tau ua kev phem kev qas hab pe mlom ua rua kuv lub Tuamtsev tsi dlawbhuv lawm, kuv yuav muab mej tso tseg tsi taabncuab mej hlo le.

Mej cov tuabneeg ib feem peb yuav tuag rua kev mob kev nkeeg hab kev tshaib kev nqhes rua huv nroog; ib feem peb yuav tuag rua nav ntaaj nav rag rua saab nrau ntug nroog; hab ib feem peb kuv yuav muab tso rua cua ntsawj yaa moog hab kuv yuav rhu ntaaj caum.

“Mej yuav raug kuv txujkev chim hab kev npautawg moog txug thaus kuv lub sab nqeg. Thaus mej pum tej nuav lawm, mej yuav paub has tas, kuv yog tug TSWV kws has tej nuav. Kuv khib vim tej kws mej ua tsi ncaaj.
Lwm tsaav tuabneeg kws nyob puagncig mej, txhua tug kws dlua kev yuav luag mej plig, txobthuam mej hab yuav tshuv kev moog.
“Thaus kuv chim, kuv npautawg hab rau txim rua mej, txhua tsaav tuabneeg kws nyob puagncig mej yuav ntshai heev. Puab yuav saib tsi taug mej hab muab mej tso dlaaj tso luag.
Kuv yuav txav tsi pub kuas mej muaj kev noj kev haus, ca mej tuag tshaib tuag nqhes. Mej  yuav nyaj tshaib yoo nqhes hab tiv kev mob ib yaam le xibxub vug chob mej.
Kuv yuav tso kev tshaib kev nqhes hab tej tsaj qus lug noj mej tej mivnyuas, kuv yuav tso kaab mob kev nkeeg, kev siv kev npug hab kev tsuv kev rog lug raug mej. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws has le ntawd.”
Tug TSWV has rua kuv tas:.
“Tub noobneej, koj tsaa qhovmuag saib cov Yixalayees tej roob hab qha kuv tej lug rua puab.

Koj has kuas cov Yixalayees tej roob noog tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam tej lug, hab has rua tej roob, tej pov roob, tej kwj haa hab tej haav le nuav, kuv yuav rhu ntaaj tsuav cov tuabneeg tej chaw pe mlom kuas puamtsuaj taag.
Tej thaaj fij khoom hab tej thaaj hlawv tshuaj tsw qaab yuav raug rhuav kuas tawg taag. Txhua tug tuabneeg yuav raug tua tuag taag rua ntawm puab tej mlom.
Kuv yuav muab Yixalayees cov tuabneeg tuag tso rua ntawm puab tej mlom hauv ntej; kuv yuav muab puab tej pobtxhaa tso pawg lug puagncig puab tej thaaj.

Cov Yixalayees tej nroog yuav raug rhuav puamtsuaj taag, puab tej thaaj hab puab tej mlom yuav raug tsoo kuas tawg ntsoog ntxawg, puab tej thaaj hlawv tshuaj tsw qaab los yuav tawg taag, hab tej num kws puab ua yuav pluj moog.
Yuav muaj tuabneeg tuag pawg lug txhua qhov, ces mej cov kws seem yuav paub has tas, kuv yog tug TSWV.
“Kuv yuav ca ibtxha tsiv dlim tsi raug tua hab yuav coj puab moog nrug lwm tsaav tuabneeg nyob,

puab yuav moog ua tuabneeg poob tebchaws. Thaus ntawd puab yuav ncu txug kuv, hab paub has tas kuv yog tug kws rau txim rua puab hab ua rua puab poob ntsejmuag  vim puab tsi muab sab npuab kuv, puab tso kuv tseg hab moog pe mlom. Ces puab yuav rov ntxub puab, vim tej kev phem kev qas kws puab tau ua taag lug lawm.
Puab yuav paub has tas kuv yog tug TSWV, hab kuv tej lug yog lug tseeb tsi yog laam has.”

Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has tas, “Koj ca le npuaj teg ntaug taw hab quaj tu sab nrho, vim tej kev phem kev qas hab tej kev pe dlaab pe mlom kws cov Yixalayees tau ua. Puab yuav tuag taag rua huv tshaav rog lossis kev tshaib kev nqhes lossis kev mob kev nkeeg.

Cov kws nyob dleb yuav tuag rua kev mob kev nkeeg; cov kws nyob ze yuav raug tua tuag rua huv tshaav rog; cov kws dlim huv tshaav rog los yuav tuag rua kev tshaib kev nqhes. Puab yuav raug kuv txujkev chim kws luj kawg nkaus.

Thaus mej pum tej tuag nyob ntawm tej mlom hab nyob puagncig tej thaaj, thoob plawg rua sau tej pov roob sab, sau tej ncov roob, huv qaab txhua tsob ntoo kws muaj nplooj tsaus nti, huv qaab txhua tsob ntoo qheb, hab txhua qhov chaw kws puab hlawv khoom fij rua puab tej mlom. Ces mej txhua tug yuav paub has tas kuv yog tug TSWV tag.

Kuv yuav tsaa teg tawmtsaam puab hab ua kuas puab lub tebchaws raug puamtsuaj. Kuv yuav ua kuas lub tebchaws ua tsi tau noj, txij kag nraag taj suabpuam lug txug ndlua peg lub nroog Linpelas kws nyob rua saab qaumteb, hab yuav tsi tseg chaw rua cov Yixalayees nyob le. Ces mej txhua tug yuav paub has tas kuv yog tug TSWV.”
Tug TSWV has rua kuv tas:
“Tub noobneej, kuv yog tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam, kuv has tej lug nuav rua cov Yixalayees lub tebchaws: nub kawg lug txug lub tebchaws lawm!
“Cov Yixalayees, nub kawg tub lug txug lawm. Mej yuav raug kuv txujkev chim, rua qhov kuv yuav txav txim rua mej pauj tej kev phem kev qas kws mej tau ua taag lug lawm.
Kuv yuav tsi tseg mej hab tsi taabncuab mej le. Kuv yuav rau txim rua mej vim tej kev phem kev qas kws mej tau ua, mej txhaj paub has tas kuv yog tug TSWV.”
Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has tas: “Yuav muaj kev siv kev npug lug raug mej ib yaam taag ib yaam tuaj.
Nub kawg lug txug lawm, nub kawg lug txug lawm. Kev siv kev npug zag kawg lug tawmtsaam mej lawm. Nwg lug txug lawm.

Nub kawg lug txug rua mej cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub tebchaws nuav lawm. Lub sijhawm lug txug lawm, yuav tsi muaj pe mlom hab kev lomzem nyob sau tej roob, tabsis tsuas muaj kev nyuaj sab lawm xwb.
“Tshuav tsi ntev lawm mej yuav raug kuv txujkev chim. Kuv yuav rau txim pauj tej kev phem kev qas kws mej tau ua taag lug.
Kuv yuav tsi tseg mej hab tsi taabncuab mej le. Kuv yuav rau txim rua mej vim tej kev phem kev qas kws mej tau ua, mej txhaj paub has tas, kuv yog tug TSWV hab yog tug kws rau txim rua mej.”
Nub kws muaj kev puamtsuaj lug txug lawm. Kev siv kev npug taabtom fuam luj zuj zug hab kev khaavtheeb muaj tshwm tuaj.
Kev siv kev npug fuam luj zuj zug moog ua kev phem kev qas. Puab tej kev muaj txag npluanuj, kev ua num ua tswv hab kev muaj koob muaj meej yuav pluj moog taag.
Lub sijhawm lug txug lawm. Tug kws muag khoom los tsi xob tu sab, tug kws yuav khoom los tsi xob zoo sab, rua qhov Vaajtswv txujkev txav txim yuav lug raug txhua tug huv tuabsi.

Yaam kws tej tub laag tub luam muab muag lawm, puab yeej muab tsi tau rov lug taag puab simneej, rua qhov Vaajtswv yuav txav txim rua txhua tug tsi zaam le. Cov tuabneeg kws ua phem ua qas yuav tsi muaj ib tug muaj sa nyob.
Thaus luas tshuab xyu suavdlawg yeej npaaj txhij lawm, tabsis tsi muaj leejtwg kaam moog ntaus rog, vim le ntawd Vaajtswv txujkev chim txhaj yuav lug raug txhua tug huv tuabsi.

Nyob saab nrau muaj kev sis ntaus sis tua txhua qhov, nyob saab huv muaj kev mob kev nkeeg hab kev tshaib kev nqhes. Tug kws nyob tom teb yuav tuag rua nav ntaaj nav rag, hab tug kws nyob huv nroog los yuav tuag rua kev mob kev nkeeg hab kev tshaib kev nqhes.
Muaj ibtxha yuav tsiv dlim moog rua sau tej hauv roob ib yaam le tej nquab kws ntshai hab yaa huv haav lug. Puab yuav quaj tu sab rua puab tej kev txhum.
Puab tej npaab yuav tsaug leeg hab puab tej hauvcaug yuav tshee tsi muaj zug.
Puab yuav muab ntaub tsaaj lug npua hab quaj tshee nyo. Puab yuav muab puab tej plaubhau chais hab puab yuav raug kev txaajmuag.

Puab yuav muab puab tej nyaj tej kub povtseg rua huv plawv kev, ib yaam le tej lamsim. Vim tej nyaj tej kub ntawd paab tsi tau puab dlim ntawm tug TSWV txujkev chim kws luj kawg nkaus. Tej nyaj tej kub kws puab muaj los yeej dlaws tsi tau puab txujkev tshaib nqhes hab paab tsi tau kuas puab muaj kev txaus sab. Tej nyaj tej kub ntawd tsuas yog ua kuas puab moog ua kev txhum xwb.

Puab khaavtheeb rua puab tej saw nyaj saw kub kws zoo nkauj, tabsis puab siv tej ntawd nchuav ua tej mlom kws phem qas. Vim le ntawd tug TSWV txhaj muab puab tej nyaj tej kub tig moog ua kev phem tawmtsaam puab.
Tug TSWV has tas, “Kuv yuav ca lwm tsaav tuabneeg tuaj fuab ib puas tsaav yaam kws puab muaj. Cov tuabneeg kws tsi ncaaj nceeg yuav tuaj txeeb puab tej nyaj txag hab coj moog siv ua kev phem kev qas.
Thaus tubsaab tuaj tsoo nkaag moog ua tsi huv rua lub Tuamtsev, hab nqaa tej khoom tsimtxaj moog ua kev phem kev qas los kuv yeej yuav tsi quavntsej puab le.
“Muaj kev kub ntxhuv,  kev sis ntaus sis tua thoob lub tebchaws hab muaj kev siv kev npug nyob txhua lub nroog.

Kuv yuav coj lwm tsaav tuabneeg kws ua phem kawg nkaus tuaj rua huv mej lub tebchaws hab ca puab txeeb mej tej vaaj tse. Thaus kws kuv tso lwm tsaav tuabneeg tuaj ua tsi huv rua mej lub Tuamtsev, mej cov tuabneeg kws muaj zug heev yuav ua tsi tau dlaabtsi.
Kev txhawj kev ntshai lug txug lawm. Mej yuav nrhav kev thaajyeeb, tabsis yuav nrhav tsi tau le.

Kev siv kev npug ib yaam taag ib yaam tuaj, hab yuav muaj xaiv muaj lug has tsi paub taag. Mej yuav thov cov cev Vaajtswv lug kuas cev Vaajtswv lug rua mej, tabsis Vaajtswv tsi lug qha rua puab lawm. Cov povthawj yuav tsi muaj lug dlaabtsi qha rua cov tuabneeg hab cov txwjlaug los yuav tsi muaj tswvyim tuavxaam lawm.

Vaajntxwv yuav quaj ntsuag, tej numtswv yuav taag kev ca sab hab cov pejxeem yuav ntshai tshee quas nyo. Kuv yuav rau txim rua mej, vim tej kws mej tau ua taag lug lawm, kuv yuav txav txim rua mej ib yaam le mej tau txav txim rua lwm tug lawm. Mej txhaj paub has tas kuv yog tug TSWV.”

Lub rau hli ntuj, nub xab tsib xyoo rau kws peb raug nteg moog nyob rua lwm tebchaws, cov Yudas tej thawjcoj kws raug nteg moog nrug kuv nyob ua ke huv kuv tsev. Taamsim ntawd tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam lub fwjchim lug kaav hlo kuv.

Kuv tsaa qhovmuag saib rua sau, kuv pum muaj ib yaam zoo le tug tuabneeg. Txij ntawm nwg lub dluav rov huv zoo le suavtawg hab txij ntawm nwg lub dluav rov sau zoo le tej tooj dlaag kws luas muab txhuam ci ci lawm.

Nwg cev ib yaam zoo le txhais teg tuaj kov kuv cov plaubhau. Nyob huv zaaj ywgtoog ntawd, Vaajtswv tug ntsujplig txawm lug nqaa hlo kuv moog rua sau nruab ntug, hab coj kuv moog rua huv Yeluxalees, nwg coj kuv nkaag ntawm lub roojvaag saab qaumteb moog rua huv lub Tuamtsev. Nyob qhov ntawd muaj ib tug mlom kws Vaajtswv ntxub heev.
Kuv pum cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv tug tshwjchim zoo ib yaam le kuv tau pum zag taag lug ntawm ntug Dlej Khenpales.

Vaajtswv has rua kuv tas, “Tub noobneej, koj ca le saib moog rua saab qaumteb.” Kuv txawm saib rua peg, kuv pum ib tug mlom kws Vaajtswv ntxub heev nyob ze ntawm lub thaaj kws yog txujkev lug tom lub roojvaag lug.

Vaajtswv has rua kuv tas, “Tub noobneej, koj puas pum muaj dlaabtsi tshwmsim? Koj saib tej kev phem kev qas kws cov Yixalayees ua ntawm nuav, ua rua kuv tsiv dleb zuj zug ntawm kuv lub chaw dlawbhuv moog lawm. Koj tseem yuav pum muaj tej yaam kws phem tshaaj tej nuav hab.”
Nwg coj kuv moog rua ntawm txujkev kws lug nrau lub tshaav puam lug, hab qha kuv saib ib lub qhov ntawm saab phaab ntsaa.
Nwg has tas, “Tub noobneej, koj ca le tsoo saab phaab ntsaa nuav.” Kuv txawm tsoo saab phaab ntsaa ntawd tawg txua rua huv hab pum ib lub qhovrooj.
Nwg has rua kuv tas, “Koj ca le moog rua saab huv hab saib tej kev phem kev qas kws puab ua nyob huv.”
Yog le ntawd, kuv txhaj moog rua huv hab saib, kuv pum luas nraaj tej dluab ua tej tug naab hab lwm yaam tsaj tsi huv,  hab tej mlom kws cov Yixalayees pe puv nkaus rua tim tej phaab ntsaa.

Cov Yixalayees tej thawjcoj xyaa caum leej tuaj nyob ntawd. Safas tug tub Ya-axaniyas los nrug puab nyob ntawd hab. Puab cov ntawd ib leeg tuav rawv ib qho moov tshuaj tsw qaab hlawv ua paa nchu auv quas nab.

Vaajtswv nug kuv has tas, “Tub noobneej, koj puas pum tej kws cov Yixalayees tej thawjcoj tuaj ua nyob nraim quas nkoog ntawd? Puab taabtom pehawm huv chaav kws muaj tej dluab mlom nyob puv nkaus. Puab has tas: ‘Tug TSWV tsi pum peb le! Nwg tub tso peb lub tebchaws tseg lawm.’ ”
Ces tug TSWV has rua kuv tas, “Koj tseem yuav pum puab ua tej kev phem kev qas kws phem tshaaj ntawd hab.”
Tug TSWV coj kuv moog rua ntawm lub roojvaag saab peg lub Tuamtsev, hab qha kuas kuv saib cov quaspuj kws tuaj quaj nyav tug mlom Tamus.
Nwg nug kuv has tas, “Tub noobneej, koj puas pum tej ntawd? Koj tseem yuav pum tej yaam kws phem tshaaj tej ntawd hab.”

Yog le ntawd nwg coj kuv moog saib chaav huv plawv lub Tuamtsev. Nyob ze ntawm txujkev kws moog rua huv chaav pehawm Vaajtswv, ntu nruab nraab ntawm qaab khaav hab lub thaaj, muaj neeg nkaum tsib leeg txivneej nyob ntawd. Puab tig nrausqaum rua ntawm chaav pehawm Vaajtswv, tig xubndlag hab nyo taubhau rua saab nubtuaj, pe lub nub kws taabtom tawm tuaj.

Tug TSWV has rua kuv ntxiv tas, “Tub noobneej, koj puas pum tej ntawd? Cov tuabneeg Yudas tseem tsi tau txaus sab rua tej kev phem kev qas kws koj tau pum ntawd, hab tej kev kub ntxhuv kws muaj thoob plawg lub tebchaws le. Tsi taag le ntawd xwb, puab tseem tuaj rua huv lub Tuamtsev nuav ua kuas txaus puab sab hab ua kuas kuv chim. Koj saib! Puab ua txhua yaam tawmtsaam kuv npaum le puab yuav ua tau.
Puab yuav raug kuv txujkev chim kws luj kawg nkaus. Kuv yuav tsi tseg hab tsi taabncuab puab le. Txawm yog puab yuav quaj thov kuv los kuv yuav tsi noog puab tej lug thov.”
Kuv nov Vaajtswv hu nrov nrov has tas, “Mej cov kws yuav rau txim rua lub nroog, ca le lug ntawm nuav, coj mej tej cuabyeej ua rog nrug mej.”

Taamsim ntawd txawm muaj rau tug txivneej tawm ntawm lub roojvaag saab peg lug. Puab txhua tug puavleej nqaa cuabyeej ua rog hab tig ndlag rua saab qaumteb. Muaj ib tug txivneej naav rig tsho ntaub maag nrug puab paab ntawd lug, nwg tuav rawv ib lub thauv kua cwjmem. Puab lug sawv rua ntawm lub thaaj tooj.

Cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv tug tshwjchim kws ci ntsaa ab txawm tawm ntawm tug qhelunpees  kws yog nwg qhov chaw moog rua ntawm txujkev kws moog rua huv lub Tuamtsev. Tug TSWV hu tug txivneej kws naav rig tsho ntaub maag has tas:
“Koj ca le moog kuas thoob plawg lub nroog Yeluxalees hab nas cim rua txhua tug kws muaj kev txomnyem nyuaj sab hauvplaj, vim tej kev phem kev qas kws puab ua huv lub nroog.”
Hab kuv nov Vaajtswv has rua paab tuabneeg ntawd tas, “Mej ca le caum tug txivneej ntawd qaab moog kuas thoob lub nroog hab tua txhua tug, tsi xob zaam hab tsi xob taabncuab leejtwg le.

Lojxov tua cov yawm laug, cov tub hluas, cov ntxhais hluas, cov quaspuj hab cov mivnyuas huv tuabsi. Tabsis mej tsi xob ua le caag rua cov kws muaj lub cim nas rua ntawm hauvplaj lawm. Mej ca le pib tua ntawm kuv lub Tuamtsev nuav moog!” Puab txawm pib tua cov thawjcoj kws sawv ntawm lub Tuamtsev.

Vaajtswv has rua puab tas, “Mej ca le ua kuas lub Tuamtsev tsi huv. Coj tej tuabneeg tuag lug tso pawg lug rua huv tej chaav. Mej ca le nqeg teg ua num!” Ces puab txawm pib tua cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv nroog.

Thaus puab tseem tua cov tuabneeg ntawd, kuv nyob tuab leeg xwb. Kuv txhus caug ndlua nyo ua ntsejmuag ti nkaus huv aav hab quaj thov has tas, “Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam, koj chim heev rua lub nroog Yeluxalees, ces koj txawm yuav muab cov pejxeem kws seem huv tebchaws Yixalayees tua kuas tuag taag le los?”

Vaajtswv teb has tas, “Cov Yixalayees hab cov Yudas tau ua txhum hab muaj txim luj heev. Puab tua tuabneeg txhua qhov thoob plawg lub tebchaws hab puab sis ntaus sis tua puv nkaus huv lub nroog Yeluxalees. Puab has tas kuv kws yog tug TSWV tub tso puab lub tebchaws tseg lawm, kuv yeej tsi pum puab le.
Tabsis kuv yuav tsi tseg puab hab taabncuab puab le; kuv yuav ua pauj rua puab ib yaam le puab tau ua rua lwm tug lawm.”
Ces tug txivneej kws naav rig tsho ntaub maag rov lug has rua tug TSWV has tas, “Kuv tub moog ua tav lawv le koj tej lug saamfwm lawm.”
Kuv tsaa muag saib qhov kws zoo le lub ntuj ncaaj ntawm cov qhelunpees  taubhau rua sau, kuv pum muaj ib yaam zoo le lub zwmtxwv kws yog muab cov qai zeb Xafiles ua.

Vaajtswv has rua tug txivneej naav rig tsho ntaub maag has tas, “Koj ca le chaws kis nruab nraab ntawm cov lug kws nyob huv qaab cov qhelunpees, hab muab phoov teg yawm cov ncaig tawg kws cig lab ploog nqaa lug; hab coj moog w kuas thoob plawg lub nroog.” Kuv saib ntsoov tug txivneej ntawd moog.
Thaus nwg moog rua huv, cov qhelunpees tseem taabtom sawv ntawm lub Tuamtsev saab nraag, hab muaj fuab lug puv nkaus chaav huv plawv.

Tug TSWV tug tshwjchim txawm tawm ntawm cov qhelunpees moog rua ntawm txujkev kws moog rua huv lub Tuamtsev. Ces fuab txawm lug qhwv nkaus lub Tuamtsev hab tug TSWV tug tshwjchim ci ntsaa ab puv nkaus huv chaav tsev ntawd.
Cov qhelunpees ntxuaj tis nrov heev, ua rua cov tuabneeg kws nyob saab nrau chaav ntawd nov huv tuabsi. Lub suab ntawd nrov ib yaam le Vaajtswv tug kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus lub suab.

Thaus tug TSWV has kuas tug txivneej kws naav ntaub maag moog muab cov ncaig tawg ntawm kis nruab nraab cov lug kws nyob huv qaab cov qhelunpees, tug txivneej ntawd txawm moog sawv ze ntawm ib lub lug.
Cov qhelunpees ib tug txawm cev teg moog muab ob peb lub ncaig tawg lug tso rua huv tug txivneej kws naav rig tsho ntaub maag txhais teg, tug txivneej ntawd nqaa cov ncaig tawg hab tawm moog lawm.
Kuv pum cov qhelunpees txhua tug muaj ib yaam zoo le tuabneeg txhais teg nyob huv qaab puab txhua phob tis.

Kuv pum plaub lub lug zoo ib yaam nkaus, ib lub nyob ib saab ntawm ib tug qhelunpees. Cov lug ntawd ci ib yaam le cov qai zeb muaj nqes, hab txhua lub lug, nyag tseem muaj dlua nyag ib lub lug dlhos rua ntawm ceg kaum saab xis.
Thaus cov qhelunpees moog kev, puab yeej moog tau rua txhua phaab tsi taag tig le. Puab yeej moog tau ua ke rua txhua phaab lawv le puab xaav moog.
Puab tej cev, tej nrausqaum, tej teg, tej tis hab tej lug puavleej muaj qhovmuag huv tuabsi.
Cov lug ntawd zoo ib yaam le cov kws kuv tub xub pum huv thawj zaaj ywgtoog lawm.
Txhua tug qhelunpees twg muaj plaub lub ntsejmuag. Lub ib zoo le tug txiv nyuj lub, lub ob zoo le tuabneeg lub, lub peb zoo le tsuv ntxhuav lub, hab lub plaub zoo le dlaav lub.
(Puab yog tuab cov qhelunpees kws kuv pum nyob ntawm ntug Dlej Khenpales). Thaus cov qhelunpees ntawd yaa rua sau nruab ntug,
cov lug nrug puab moog hab. Thaus puab nthuav tis yaa los cov lug yeej nrug puab moog ua ke.
Thaus cov qhelunpees nreg los cov lug kuj nreg; hab thaus cov qhelunpees yaa los cov lug kuj yaa hab, rua qhov cov qhelunpees yog cov kws tswj cov lug ntawd.
Taamsim ntawd tug TSWV tug tshwjchim kws ci ntsaa ab txawm tawm ntawm txujkev kws moog rua huv lub Tuamtsev moog nreg ncaaj rua sau cov qhelunpees.

Thaus kuv tseem saib ntsoov, cov qhelunpees txawm nthuav tis yaa huv nplajteb nuav moog, ces cov lug txawm yaa nrug puab moog lawm. Puab moog nreg rua ntawm lub roojvaag saab nubtuaj ntawm lub Tuamtsev hab tug TSWV tug tshwjchim kws ci ntsaa ab lug qhwv nkaus cov qhelunpees ntawd.
Kuv tseem ncu has tas yog tuab cov qhelunpees kws kuv tub xub pum nyob huv qaab cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv ntawm tug ntug Dlej Khenpales.
Cov qhelunpees ntawd txhua tug muaj plaub lub ntsejmuag, plaub phob tis, hab muaj ib yaam zoo le tuabneeg txhais teg nyob huv qaab puab txhua phob tis.
Puab cov ntsejmuag los zoo ib yaam le cov ntsejmuag  kws kuv tub xub pum nyob ntawm ntug Dlej Khenpales. Txhua tug qhelunpees moog ncaaj nraim rua tom hauv ntej.

Vaajtswv tug Ntsujplig lug nqaa hlo kuv moog rua ntawm lub roojvaag kws nyob ntawm lub Tuamtsev saab nubtuaj. Muaj neeg nkaum tsib leeg txivneej nyob ze ntawm lub roojvaag, muaj Axules tug tub Ya-axaniyas hab Npenayas tug tub Pelatiyas kws yog ob tug thawjcoj ntawm puab tsaav tuabneeg nrug puab nyob ntawd.
Vaajtswv has rua kuv tas, “Tub noobneej, cov txivneej kws koj pum ntawd, tuavhuv ua phem ua qas hab qha cov tuabneeg huv lub nroog nuav ua txhum.

Puab has tas, ‘Tsi ntev peb yuav tau ua tsev dlua.  Lub nroog nuav zoo le lub laujkaub kws nyob huv qhovcub hab peb zoo ib yaam le cov nqaj kws hau huv lub laujkaub ntawd, tabsis txawm le caag los lub laujkaub tseem thaiv peb ntawm cov nplaim tawg.’
Tub noobneej, koj ca le cev kuv tej lug tshev cov tuabneeg ntawd taamsim nuav.”
Vaajtswv tug Ntsujplig lug kaav hlo kuv, hab tug TSWV qha kuas kuv has cov lug nuav rua cov tuabneeg ntawd tas: “Cov Yixalayees, kuv paub tej kws mej has hab tej kws mej tuavhuv ua lawm.
Mej tua tuabneeg coob leej huv lub nroog nuav, txhaj muaj tej tuabneeg tuag pawg lug rua txhua txujkev.

“Kuv yog tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has le nuav rua mej. Lub nroog nuav yog lub laujkaub kws taabtom nyob huv qhovcub, tabsis dlaabtsi yog cov nqaj kws hau rua huv? Tub yog cov tuabneeg tuag kws mej tua ntaag! Mej yuav tsi tau nyob huv lub nroog nuav lawm, kuv yuav muab mej tshem rua saab nrau ntug nroog!
Mej puas ntshai tej nav ntaaj? Kuv yuav khaiv ib paab tuabneeg nqaa ntaaj tuaj tua mej. Tug TSWV kws yog Vaajtswv has le ntawd.
Kuv yuav coj mej tawm moog rua nrau ntug nroog hab muab mej cob rua cov tuabneeg txawv tebchaws. Kuv tub txav txim rua mej lawm,
mej yuav raug tua tuag rua huv mej lub tebchaws, ces txhua tug txhaj yuav paub has tas kuv yog tug TSWV.
Lub nroog nuav yuav tsi tiv thaiv mej le lub laujkaub tiv thaiv cov nqaj. Txawm yog mej yuav nyob huv lub tebchaws Yixalayees nuav qhov twg los kuv yuav rau txim rua mej.
Mej yuav paub has tas kuv yog tug TSWV kws rau txim rua mej, vim mej coj lwm tsaav tuabneeg tej kevcai, mej ua le ntawd yog mej rhuav kuv tej kevcai hab kuv tej lug saamfwm!”

Thaus kuv tseem cev Vaajtswv lug, Pelatiyas ca le qaug ntawg tuag lawm. Kuv txhus caug ndlua ua ntsejmuag ti nkaus huv aav hab thov has tas, “Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam, thov tsi xob ua le ko! Koj txawm yuav muab cov tuabneeg kws seem huv tebchaws Yixalayees tua kuas tuag taag le los?”
Tug TSWV has rua kuv tas:.

“Tub noobneej, cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv Yeluxalees sis thaam txug koj hab koj cov kwvtij Yixalayees kws raug nteg moog rua lwm tebchaws. Puab has tas, ‘Cov tuabneeg kws raug nteg moog ntawd nyob nrug dleb lub tebchaws kws muaj kev pehawm tug TSWV. Tug TSWV tub muab lub tebchaws nuav cob rua peb ua peb tug lawm.’

“Koj has rua koj cov kwvtij kws raug nteg moog rua lwm tebchaws lawv le kuv cov lug nuav: Kuv yog tug TSWV kws ntab puab moog nyob rua tej tebchaws kws dleb, hab ua kuas puab tawg moog nyob xyaw ntau tsaav tuabneeg. Tabsis txawm le ntawd los kuv yuav nrug puab nyob huv cov tebchaws ntawd.

“Kuv yog tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam, koj has kuv tej lug nuav rua puab tas, kuv yuav sau puab huv cov tebchaws kws puab moog nyob ntawd rov lug, hab yuav muab lub tebchaws Yixalayees rov rua puab.
Thaus puab rov qaab lug, puab yuavtsum tso txhua yaam kev phem kev qas hab tej mlom kws puab muaj tseg huv tuabsi!
Kuv yuav pub lub sab tshab hab txujkev xaav tshab rua puab. Kuv yuav rhu puab lub sab kws tawv le pobzeb povtseg, hab muab lub sab kws noog lug rua puab.
Ces puab yuav ua lawv le kuv tej kevcai hab muab sab npuab kuv tej lug saamfwm. Puab yuav yog kuv tsaav tuabneeg hab kuv yuav yog puab tug Vaajtswv.

Tabsis kuv yuav rau txim rua cov tuabneeg kws ua kev phem kev qas hab pe mlom. Kuv yuav rau txim rua puab, vim tej kws puab tau ua taag lug lawm.” Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has tej lug nuav.
Cov qhelunpees pib yaa tawm hab cov lug los txawm nrug cov qhelunpees moog lawm. Cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv tug tshwjchim kws ci ntsaa ab lug roog nkaus puab.
Tug tshwjchim txawm ncaim lub nroog hab moog rua tim lub roob kws nyob ntawm lub nroog saab nubtuaj lawm.
Nyob huv zaaj ywgtoog ntawd, Vaajtswv tug Ntsujplig nqaa hlo kuv hab coj kuv rov moog rua tim tebchaws Npanpiloos kws peb raug nteg moog nyob, ces zaaj ywgtoog txawm pluj lawm.
Kuv txhaj pav txhua yaam kws tug TSWV ua rua kuv pum, rua cov tuabneeg kws raug nteg moog ntawd noog.
Tug TSWV has rua kuv tas:.
“Tub noobneej, koj nrug cov tuabneeg ntxeev sab nyob. Puab muaj qhovmuag, tabsis puab tsi pum dlaabtsi; puab muaj qhovntsej, tabsis puab tsi nov lug, rua qhov puab yog tuabneeg ntxeev sab.

“Tub noobneej, ca le sawbsim koj tej khoom hab tawm moog ib yaam le koj yog tug tuabneeg poob tebchaws, hab koj ca le moog rua lwm qhov thaus nruab nub lug taabmeeg suavdlawg. Tej zag qhov kws koj tawm moog le ntawd yuav ua rua puab pum has tas puab yog tuabneeg ntxeev sab.
Ca le nqaa koj pob khoom hab sawv kev moog rua lwm qhov thaus nruab nub lug ib yaam le tug tuabneeg poob tebchaws, kuas puab txhua tug pum hab saib ntsoov koj.
Thaus puab saib ntsoov koj, koj ca le tho ib lub qhov ntawm saab phaab ntsaa, nqaa koj pob khoom tawm ntawm lub qhov ntawd moog.

Ca puab saib ntsoov koj tsaws koj pob khoom rua sau xubpwg hab tawm moog rua saab nrau tsaus ntuj nti, pus nkaus koj qhovmuag kuas koj tsi xob pum kev hab tsi paub sov yuav moog rua qhov twg. Qhov kws koj ua le ntawd, yog ua lub cim qha rua cov Yixalayees paub.”

Kuv ua lawv le tug TSWV qha rua kuv. Nub ntawd kuv txawm sawbsim tau ib pob khoom ib yaam le tug tuabneeg poob tebchaws, hab nub ntawd thaus yuav tsaus ntuj, kuv txawm muab teg tho ib lub qhov ntawm saab phaab ntsaa hab tawm moog rua saab nrau. Puab saib ntsoov kuv tsaws pob khoom rua sau xubpwg hab sawv kev moog lawm.
Taagkig tom qaab tug TSWV rov lug has rua kuv tas:
“Tub noobneej, nwgnuav cov Yixalayees kws ntxeev sab nug has tas, koj ua dlaabtsi le ntawd,
koj teb rua puab lawv le tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam kuas koj has. Cov lug nuav yog has rua tug nom kws kaav lub nroog Yeluxalees hab cov pejxeem kws nyob huv lub nroog ntawd.
Koj has rua puab tas qhov kws koj ua le ntawd, yog ib lub cim qha rua puab paub has tas puab yuav raug luas nteg coj moog ua tuabneeg poob tebchaws.

Tug nom kws kaav puab los yuav tsaws hlo nwg pob khoom rua sau xubpwg hab tawm tsiv ntawm lub qhov kws luas tho rua nwg ntawm saab phaab ntsaa moog tsaus ntuj nti. Nwg yuav pus nkaus qhovmuag hab tsi paub sov yuav moog rua qhov twg.
Tabsis kuv yuav nthuav kuv lub vaag khwb nkaus nwg ca. Ces kuv yuav coj nwg moog rua huv lub nroog Npanpiloos kws yog qhov chaw nwg yuav tuag tsi pum lub nroog ntawd.
Kuv yuav ntab nwg tsoom numtswv, cov tuavxaam hab cov tub faajxwm kuas tawm tsiv moog rua txhua txujkev, ces luas yuav nrhav puab tua povtseg.
“Thaus kuv ntab puab tawm tsiv moog nyob xyaw lwm tsaav tuabneeg rua lwm lub tebchaws, puab yuav paub has tas kuv yog tug TSWV.

Kuv yuav tseg puab cov ntawd ibtxha dlim nav ntaaj nav rag, dlim kev tshaib kev nqhes, hab dlim kaab mob kev nkeeg, kuas thaus puab nrug lwm tsaav tuabneeg nyob, puab yuav leeg paub has tas puab tau ua phem ua qas luj kawg nkaus, hab puab yuav paub has tas kuv yog tug TSWV.”
Tug TSWV has rua kuv tas:.
“Tub noobneej, koj yuav noj mov ua ib ce tshee nyo hab koj haus dlej ntshai ua ib ce laim quas txag.

Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam kuas kuv has rua cov tuabneeg huv lub nroog Yeluxalees kws seem nyob huv puab lub tebchaws le nuav: puab yuav noj mov ua ib ce tshee nyo hab haus dlej ntshai ua ib ce tshee laim quas txag. Puab lub tebchaws yuav raug luas lwg kuas nyob qhuav nkuag ca, rua qhov cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub tebchaws ntawd tsi ua lawv le kuv tej kevcai.
Tej nroog kws nwgnuav muaj tuabneeg nyob puv nkaus yuav puamtsuaj, hab lub tebchaws yuav ua suabpuam taag. Ces puab txhaj yuav paub has tas kuv yog tug TSWV.”
Tug TSWV has rua kuv tas:.
“Tub noobneej, vim le caag cov Yixalayees pheej has zaaj paajlug nuav: ‘Lub sijhawm dlhau zuj zug lawm, hab tej lug qha tshwm tsi muaj dlaabtsi tshwm le?’

Nwgnuav koj ca le qha tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam tej lug rua puab. Kuv yuav ua kuas puab tej paajlug tsi muaj taag. Puab yuav tsi has txug zaaj paajlug ntawd huv tebchaws Yixalayees ntxiv le lawm. Koj qha rua puab le nuav: Tub txug sijhawm lawm, hab tej lug qha tshwm yuav tshwm muaj tseeb!
“Yuav tsi muaj tej zaaj ywgtoog cuav lossis tsi muaj cov cevlug kws dlaag kuas tuabneeg yuam kev nyob huv cov Yixalayees ntxiv lawm.

Kuv yog tug TSWV, kuv has le caag yeej yuav muaj le ntawd. Kuv yuav tsi ncua sijhawm, vim mej tau ntxeev sab taag mej tam neej le, yog le ntawd kuv yuav ua lawv le kuv tau has rua mej lawm. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has le ntawd!”
Tug TSWV has rua kuv tas;
“Tub noobneej, cov Yixalayees xaav has tas, tej kws koj ua ywgtoog pum hab tej lug qha tshwm tseem tshuav ntev maam le tshwm lug.
Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam kuas kuv has rua puab le nuav: Kuv yuav tsi ncua sijhawm lawm. Yuav muaj tseeb le tej lug kws kuv has. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has le ntawd.”
Tug TSWV has rua kuv tas,
“Tub noobneej, koj ca le tshev cov Yixalayees cov cevlug kws pheej cevlug lawv le puab xaav xwb. Koj has kuas puab ca le noog tug TSWV tej lug.”
Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has tas: “Cov cevlug kws ruag yuav raug puamtsuaj! Puab has lawv le puab xaav xwb, puab tsi tau ua ywgtoog pum dlaabtsi le.
Cov Yixalayees, mej cov cevlug tsi muaj nqes ib yaam le tej maa kws nyob huv lub nroog kws pob taag lawm.

Puab tsi zuv ntawm tej qhov kws saab phaab ntsaa qaug lawm lossis puab tsi khu saab phaab ntsaa ntawd. Yog le ntawd nub kws tug TSWV lug hab muaj kev tsuv kev rog tuaj, cov Yixalayees yuav tiv tsi tau.

Tej zaaj ywgtoog kws puab ua yog cuav hab tej lug qha tshwm kws puab has yog lug dlaag xwb. Puab dlaag has tas yog puab cev kuv tej lug, tabsis kuv tsi tau khaiv puab moog. Tsi taag le ntawd xwb, puab tseem xaav kuas tej lug kws puab has yog lug tseeb!
Kuv qha rua puab has tas: Tej zaaj ywgtoog kws mej pum yog cuav hab tej lug qha tshwm kws mej has yog lug dlaag. Mej has tas yog mej has kuv cov lug, tabsis kuv tsi tau has rua mej!”
Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has rua puab tas, “Mej tej lug yog lug cuav hab tej zaaj ywgtoog kws mej pum yog dlaag xwb. Kuv yog tug kws tawmtsaam mej ntaag.

Kuv yuav rau txim rua mej cov kws cevlug cuav hab has tej lug qha tshwm kws ua rua tuabneeg yuam kev. Thaus kuv tsaav tuabneeg tuaj sis sau saablaaj ua ke, mej yuav tsi tau koom nrug puab; mej tej npe yuav tsi muaj nyob huv phoo ntawv kws teev cov Yixalayees tej npe; mej yuav tsi tau rov lug rua huv mej lub tebchaws. Ces mej txhaj yuav paub has tas kuv yog tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam.

“Cov cevlug kws ua rua kuv tsaav tuabneeg yuam kev has tas, ca le tso sab tsi muaj dlaabtsi. Tabsis tsi yog le ntawd! Kuv tsaav tuabneeg puab tau tug ntsaa yeej lawm, ces cov cevlug maam coj moov sib tuaj leem rua.
Koj has rua cov cevlug ntawd tas, puab tug ntsaa yeej yuav pob puag taag. Kuv yuav tso naag hab tso lawg hlub heev lug ntaus hab cua dlaaj cua dlub yuav ntsawj tug ntsaa yeej ntawd.
Tug ntsaa yeej yuav pob, ces txhua tug yuav nug koj has tas, cov moov sib kws leem tug ntsaa yeej dlua twg taag lawm?”
Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has tas: Kuv chim, kuv txhaj tso cua dlaaj cua dlub, tso naag hab lawg lug ntaus puab tug ntsaa yeej.

Kuv txhobtxwm rhuav tug ntsaa yeej kws puab muab moov sib leem kuas tawg taag, tshuav tug taw ntsaa lawm xwb. Tug ntsaa yeej yuav qaug lug ntaus mej tuag taag. Ces txhua tug txhaj paub has tas kuv yog tug TSWV.

“Tug ntsaa yeej hab cov tuabneeg kws muab moov sib leem tug ntsaa yeej yuav raug kuv txujkev chim kws luj kawg nkaus. Ces kuv yuav qha rua koj has tas tug ntsaa yeej hab cov tuabneeg kws muab moov sib leem tug ntsaa yeej tub pluj taag lawm,
cov cev Vaajtswv lug ntawd yog cov kws has rua lub nroog Yeluxalees kuas ca le tso sab, thaus kws tsi muaj kev tso sab.” Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam yog tug has le ntawd.
Tug TSWV has tas, “Tub noobneej, nwgnuav koj tsaa qhovmuag saib koj tsaav tuabneeg cov quaspuj kws pheej has tej lug qha tshwm. Koj ca le tshev puab

hab qha tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam tej lug rua puab has tas: “Cov quaspuj ko yuav raug puamtsuaj! Mej xaws tej pluaj ntaub rua txhua tug coj ntawm teg hab ntus phuam rua txhua tug ntoo sau taubhau kuas puab muaj fwjchim tswj lwm tug lub neej. Mej xaav tau lub fwjchim kws tswj kuv tsaav tuabneeg txujsa hab txujkev tuag moog siv kuas muaj nqes rua mej.

Mej ua saib tsi taug kuv taabmeeg kuv tsaav tuabneeg, kuas mej tau ob peb phoov teg moov nplej hab tau ob peb lub ncuav. Mej tua tej tuabneeg kws tsi tsimnyog tuag, tabsis mej tseg cov tuabneeg kws tsimnyog tuag ca. Mej ua le ntawd kuas dlaag tau kuv tsaav tuabneeg ntseeg mej.”

Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has le nuav: “Kuv ntxub tej pluaj ntaub kws mej coj ntawm teg kws mej siv tswj kuv tsaav tuabneeg txujsa hab txujkev tuag. Kuv yuav chua tej ntawd ntawm mej teg moog, hab tso cov tuabneeg kws raug mej tswj kuas dlim.
Kuv yuav chua mej tej phuam povtseg hab tso kuv tsaav tuabneeg kuas dlim ntawm mej lub fwjchim. Ces mej yuav paub has tas kuv yog tug TSWV.

“Mej tej lug dlaag ua rua cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg kws kuv tsi xaav kuas raug mob qaug zug kawg le. Mej taav kev tsi pub cov tuabneeg ua phem tso puab tej kev phem kev qas tseg, kuas puab txhaj tau txujsa.

Nwgnuav mej tej zaaj ywgtoog cuav hab tej lug qha tshwm kws ua rua tuabneeg yuam kev tsi muaj lawm. Kuv cawm kuv tsaav tuabneeg dlim ntawm mej lub fwjchim lawm, mej txhaj yuav paub has tas kuv yog tug TSWV.”
Cov Yixalayees cov thawjcoj qee leej tuaj nug kuv, saib tug TSWV nyam le caag.
Ces tug TSWV has rua kuv tas,
“Tub noobneej, cov tuabneeg nuav tub muab puab lub sab fij rua tej mlom hab ca tej mlom ntawd coj puab moog ua txhum. Puab xaav has tas kuv yuav teb puab hab nua los?”

Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam kuas kuv has rua puab le nuav: “Txhua tug Yixalayees kws ca tej mlom kaav puab lub sab hab coj puab moog ua txhum, tseem tuaj cuag tug cev Vaajtswv lug kuas nrug tuavxaam, kuv yog tug kws yuav teb puab tej lug xaav tau hab teb tej lug kws puab tej mlom xaav tau.
Tej mlom ntawd ua rua cov Yixalayees txaav dleb ntawm kuv lawm, tabsis kuv ca sab has tas kuv cov lug teb yuav coj tau cov Yixalayees rov lug muab lub sab npuab kuv.
“Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam kuas kuv has rua cov Yixalayees le nuav: Mej ca le tso plhuav mej tej mlom kws phem qas tseg hab rov lug cuag kuv.

“Thaus cov Yixalayees ib tug twg lossis cov tuabneeg txawv tebchaws ib tug twg kws nrug mej cov Yixalayees nyob, tsiv tawm ntawm kuv moog pe mlom, hab tseem tuaj cuag tug cev Vaajtswv lug kuas nrug tuavxaam, mas kuv kws yog tug TSWV yuav teb nwg!
Kuv yuav tawmtsaam nwg. Kuv yuav muab nwg ua qauv has. Kuv yuav tshem nwg tawm huv kuv tsaav tuabneeg moog, mej txhaj yuav paub has tas kuv yog tug TSWV.
“Yog ib tug cevlug twg raug dlaag ntxag kuas teb tej lug cuav, qhov kws ua le ntawd tub yog kuv kws yog tug TSWV dlaag ntxag nwg. Kuv yuav tshem nwg tawm huv kuv tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees moog.
Tug cevlug hab tug kws tuaj thov kuas cevlug yuav raug txim nyaav ib yaam nkaus.

Kuv yuav ua le nuav kuas cov Yixalayees txhaj tsi tso kuv tseg moog ua tej kev txhum kws ua rua puab tsi huv. Puab yuav yog kuv tsaav tuabneeg hab kuv yuav yog puab tug Vaajtswv. Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has le ntawd.”
Tug TSWV has rua kuv tas:.

“Tub noobneej, yog ib lub tebchaws twg ua txhum hab tsi muab sab npuab kuv, ces kuv yuav rhuav tsi pub kuas muaj kev noj kev haus rua lub tebchaws ntawd. Kuv yuav tso kev tshaib kev nqhes lug raug cov tuabneeg hab tej tsaj kuas tuag taag huv tuabsi.
Txawm yog thaus Nau-es, Daniyees  hab Yauj, puab peb leeg ntawd ua neej nyob los puab tej kev ncaaj nceeg tsuas cawm tau puab txujsa nkaus xwb.” Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has le ntawd.
“Lossis kuv tso tej tsaj nyaum lug tum tej tuabneeg thoob tebchaws kuas tuag taag, hab ua rua lub tebchaws nyob qhuav nkuag ca, kuas tsi muaj leejtwg tau luag taug kev hlaa lub tebchaws ntawd.

Kuv yog tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam hab yog Vaajtswv tug kws muaj sa nyob has tas, txawm yog Nau-es, Daniyees hab Yauj puab nyob ntawd los puab yeej cawm tsi tau puab cov mivnyuas kuas dlim. Puab tsuas cawm tau puab xwb, lub tebchaws yuav ua suabpuam taag.
“Lossis kuv tso kev tsuv kev rog tuaj tua lub tebchaws, hab siv ntaaj tua cov tuabneeg hab tej tsaj kuas tuag taag huv tuabsi.

Kuv yog tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam hab yog tug Vaajtswv kws muaj sa nyob has tas, txawm yog Nau-es, Daniyees hab Yauj puab nyob ntawd los puab yeej cawm tsi tau puab cov mivnyuas kuas dlim, puab tsuas cawm tau puab xwb.
“Yog has tas kuv chim, kuv tso sub tawg sub ntshaa lug raug lub tebchaws, kuas cov tuabneeg hab tej tsaj tuag taag huv tuabsi,

kuv yog tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam hab yog tug Vaajtswv kws muaj sa nyob has tas, txawm yog Nau-es, Daniyees hab Yauj puab nyob ntawd los puab yeej cawm tsi tau puab cov mivnyuas kuas dlim, puab txujkev ncaaj nceeg tsuas cawm tau puab xwb.”

Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has tas: “Kuv yuav tso kuv plaub yaam kev rau txim kws nyaav heev lug rua lub nroog Yeluxalees xws le: kev tsuv kev rog, kev tshaib kev nqhes, kev mob kev nkeeg, hab tej tsaj nyaum lug rhuav kuas cov tuabneeg hab tej tsaj tuag taag huv tuabsi.
Yog muaj leejtwg seem tuag hab coj tau nwg cov mivnyuas lug cuag mej, mej yuav pum has tas puab ua phem ua qas kawg le, ces mej yuav paub has tas kuv rau txim ncaaj nceeg rua lub nroog Yeluxalees;
mej txhaj yuav paub has tas txhua yaam kws kuv ua taag lug yeej tsimnyog lawm.” Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has le ntawd.
Tug TSWV has rua kuv tas:
“Tub noobneej, yuav ua le caag muab tsob maab pev tau rua tsob ntoo? Yog muab tsob txiv maab pev rua tsob ntoo kws nyob huv haav zoov yuav txawv le caag?
Koj puas siv tau tsob maab ntawd ua tau ib yaam dlaabtsi? Koj puas muab tau tsob maab ntawd lug ua nqailauj dlai tau tej yaam dlaabtsi?
Nwg tsuas zoo ua tawg rauv xwb. Yog thaus ob tog tw kub nyab taag hab ntu nruab nraab ua ncaig lawm, koj puas tseem siv tau kuas muaj nqes?
Thaus tseem tsi tau muab hlawv tub siv tsi tau ua dlaabtsi. Tom qaab kws kub nyab taag ua ncaig lawm, hajyam siv tsi tau lawm.”
Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has le nuav: “Luas sau tej maab huv haav zoov coj moog hlawv povtseg le caag, kuv yuav coj cov Yixalayees kws nyob huv Yeluxalees moog ib yaam le ntawd,
hab kuv yuav rau txim rua puab. Puab tub dlim suavtawg kub ib zag lawm, tabsis zag nuav suavtawg yuav kub puab kuas dlu lug. Thaus kuv rau txim rua puab, mej yuav paub has tas kuv yog tug TSWV.
Vim puab tsi muab sab npuab kuv, yog le ntawd, kuv yuav muab puab lub tebchaws ua kuas ua suabpuam. Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has le ntawd.”
Tug TSWV has rua kuv ntxiv tas:.
“Tub noobneej, koj ca le qha tej kev phem kev qas kws Yeluxalees tau ua lawm.
Koj qha tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam tej lug rua Yeluxalees has tas: “Koj yug huv lub tebchaws Kana-aas. Koj txiv yog tuabneeg Amaules, hab koj nam yog tuabneeg Hitis.
Thaus yug tau koj lug, tsi muaj leejtwg txav koj txuj hlaab ntaws lossis ntxuav koj,  tsi muab ntsev txhuam lossis muab khaub dluag lug qhwv koj.
Thaus yug tau koj lug, tsi muaj leejtwg hlub koj hab mob sab ua tej kws has taag lug ntawd rua koj. Luas txhaj muab koj pov rua tom taj nraag.
“Kuv dlua kev tuaj pum koj tsau ntshaav tsawv, koj ib ce lu ntshaav taag, tabsis kuv tsi ca koj tuag.
Kuv ua rua koj hlub mog quas nyoos ib yaam le tug ntsuag ntoo, koj txhaj hlub tav nkauj.  Koj ob lub mig puv zoo, hab koj cov plaubhau ntev nplwg loo, tabsis koj tseem labqaab.

“Thaus kuv rov dlua kev tuaj, kuv pum has tas txug lub sijhawm kws koj nyam hluas nraug lawm. Kuv txhaj muab kuv lub tsho luj qhwv koj lub cev kws labqaab. Kuv coglug yuav hlub koj hab yuav koj ua kuv tug quaspuj, kuas koj yog kuv tug.” Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has le ntawd.
“Kuv muab dlej lug ntxuav tej ntshaav ntawm koj lub cev, hab muab roj tsw qaab pleev koj.
Kuv muab ib dlaim tab kws taw suab quas zaw rua koj naav, hab muab ib nkawm khau tawv kws zoo heev rua koj rau; kuv muab phuam ntaub maag rua koj ntoo hab muab tsho ntaub tshwbkaab rua koj naav.
Kuv muab paugteg hab paug cejdlaab rua koj coj,
kuv muab khawb khawm koj qhovntswg, muab qhws ntsej rua koj coj, hab muab mom kub rua koj ntoo.

Koj coj saw nyaj saw kub hab naav tej ntaub maag hab ntaub tshwbkaab kws zoo heev. Koj tau noj tej ncuav kws yog muab cov tseem moov nplej puab, hab koj muaj zib ntaab hab roj txiv ntoo noj. Koj cev zaam zoo nkauj ci ntsaa quas ab, koj txhaj tau lug ua ib tug puj vaajntxwv.

Koj txujkev zoo nkauj ua rua koj muaj koob meej nto moo lug rua txhua tsaav tuabneeg, rua qhov kuv muab koj tseev zaam txaus nyam hab ntxim luas sab heev.” Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has le ntawd.
“Tabsis koj ca le siv koj txujkev zoo nkauj hab nto moo moog nrug txhua tug kws tuaj cuag koj ua kev nkauj kev nraug.
Koj muab tej khaub dluag ibtxha coj moog dlai rua huv koj tej chaw pe mlom, hab chaw ua namndlav.  Ibtxwm yeej tsi muaj le nuav hab yuav tsi muaj ntxiv le lawm.
Koj muab tej saw nyaj saw kub kws kuv muab rua koj coj moog nchuav ua tej tug mlom txivneej hab ua kev nkauj kev nraug nrug tej mlom ntawd.
Koj muab tej tab taw suab quas zaw kws kuv muab rua koj coj moog rua tej mlom naav, koj muab roj txiv ntoo hab tej moov tshuaj tsw qaab kws kuv muab rua koj coj moog fij rua tej mlom.

Kuv pub koj muaj tej zaub mov kws yog tej tseem moov nplej, tej roj txiv ntoo hab zib ntaab noj, tabsis koj muab coj moog ua khoom fij kuas tej mlom nyam koj.” Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has le ntawd.
“Koj muab tej tub tej ntxhais kws koj yug rua kuv coj moog tua fij rua mlom. Koj moog ua kev nkauj kev nraug los tseem tsi txaus koj sab.
Koj txhaj coj kuv tej mivnyuas ntawd moog tua fij rua tej mlom los?
Thaus koj moog ua kev phem kev qas kws yog ua namndlav, koj yeej tsi ncu qaab txug thaus koj tseem yau kws labqaab hab pw tsau ntshaav tsawv ntawd lawm.”
Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has tas, “Koj raug puamtsuaj lawm! Raug puamtsuaj lawm! Koj ua txhua yaam kev phem kev qas hab koj tseem
moog ua tej chaw pe mlom rua ntawm tej ntug kev ua chaw ua namndlav.
Koj coj koj txujkev zoo nkauj moog dlaa paag aav. Koj muab koj lub cev rua txhua tug kws tuaj cuag koj, hab koj naj nub ua namndlav.
Koj ca cov tuabneeg Iziv kws yog phoojywg nruab ze tuaj nrug koj pw huv koj txaaj, hab koj pheej ua namndlav ua rua kuv chim heev.

“Kuv txhaj tsaa teg rau txim rua koj hab tshem tej koob moov kws yog koj feem ntawm koj moog. Kuv muab koj cob rua koj cov yeebncuab kws yog cov Filitees, kuas puab ua rua koj lawv le puab sab nyam, koj tej kev phem kev qas ua rua cov ntxhais Filitees poob ntsejmuag.
“Vim koj tsi txaus sab rua tej kev phem kev qas kws koj ua nrug lwm cov tuabneeg, koj txhaj lawv cov Axilias qaab. Koj yog puab tug namndlav, txawm le ntawd los tseem tsi txaus koj sab qeeg.
Tsi taag le ntawd xwb, koj tseem ua namndlav rua cov Npanpiloos kws yog lub tebchaws kws muaj tej tub laag tub luam, tabsis puab cov ntawd los kuj tsi txaus koj sab le hab.”
Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has tas,  “Koj tau ua ib puas tsaav yaam ib yaam le tug namndlav kws tsi paub txaajmuag le.
Koj ua chaw pe mlom rua txhua txujkev hab ua namndlav rua huv tej chaw ntawd. Tabsis tsi yog koj ua namndlav yuav nyaj ib yaam le tej namndlav ibtxwm ua.
Koj yog tug quaspuj kws muaj quasyawg, tabsis tsi hlub tug quasyawg, txhaj moog ua kev nkauj kev nraug.
Tug namndlav tag, mas luas them nyaj rua nwg, tabsis koj tseem muab khoom pub hab muab nyaj ndlav hluas nraug tuaj txhua qhov tuaj nrug koj pw.
Koj yog ib tug namndlav kws txawv dlua luas tej. Tsi muaj leejtwg yuam kuas koj ua namndlav. Luas tsi them nyaj rua koj; koj them nyaj rua luas. Koj yeej txawv dlua lwm tug namndlav tag.”
Yeluxalees kws yog tug namndlav! Koj ca le noog tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam tej lug.

Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has le nuav: “Koj hle koj tej rig tsho ib yaam le tug namndlav, koj muab koj lub cev rua koj tej hluas nraug hab rua koj tej mlom kws phem qas, hab tua koj tej mivnyuas fij rua tej mlom ntawd.

Vim le nuav kuv yuav coj taagnrho koj tej qub hluas nraug tuaj ua ke, tsi has cov kws koj nyam hab cov kws koj ntxub huv tuabsi. Kuv yuav coj puab tuaj sawv puagncig koj, ces kuv yuav muab koj tej rig tsho hle kuas puab pum koj cuasqaab.
Kuv yuav rau txim rua koj, vim koj ua kev nkauj kev nraug hab tua tuabneeg. Kuv chim hab npautawg kuv txhaj rau txim kuas koj tuag.
Kuv yuav muab koj cob rua puab teg, puab yuav rhuav koj tej chaw ua namndlav hab pe mlom. Puab yuav chua pis nta koj tej rig tsho hab tej saw nyaj saw kub ca kuas koj nyob labqaab.
“Puab yuav sau nthwv tuaj muab pobzeb ntaus koj hab muab ntaaj txav kuas koj tu ua ob peb yaa.

Puab yuav muab koj tej vaaj tse hlawv kuas kub nyab taag hab kuv yuav rau txim rua koj taabmeeg ib tsoom quaspuj. Kuv yuav txwv kuas koj tseg tsi xob ua namndlav hab tseg tsi xob muab khoom pub koj tej hluas nraug.
Ces kuv txujkev chim txhaj yuav txag hab kuv lub sab txhaj yuav tug. Kuv yuav tsi chim hab tsi khib ntxiv lawm.

Koj tsi ncu txug thaus koj tseem yau kws kuv tu koj, koj txhaj le moog ua ib puas tsaav yaam rua kuv chim. Yog le ntawd, kuv txhaj ua pauj tej kws koj tau ua lug lawm. Vim le caag koj ua kev nkauj kev nraug tsub rua tej kev pe mlom kws phem qas?” Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam yog tug has le ntawd.
Tug TSWV has tas, “Tuabneeg yuav siv zaaj paajlug nuav has txug koj kws yog lub nroog Yeluxalees has tas: ‘Leej nam zoo le caag, ces tug ntxhais zoo ib yaam le ntawd.’

Koj yog koj nam tug ntxhais tag. Koj nam ntxub nwg tug quasyawg hab nwg tej mivnyuas. Koj zoo ib yaam le koj cov vivncaug kws ntxub puab cov quasyawg hab cov mivnyuas. Koj hab koj cov vivncaug leej nam yog tuabneeg Hitis hab mej txiv yog tuabneeg Amaules.
“Koj tug taislaug yog lub nroog Xamalis kws nyob nrug nwg tej zog saab qaumteb. Koj tug nam hluas yog lub nroog Xaudoos kws nyob nrug nwg tej zog saab qaabteb.
Tsi yog koj ua le puab ua xwb, tej kev phem kev qas kws puab ua ntawd tseem tsi txaus koj sab. Tsi ntev koj yuav moog ua tej kev phem kev qas kws phem tshaaj tej kws puab ua hab.

“Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has tas, ‘Kuv yog Vaajtswv tug kws muaj sa nyob has le nuav: “Koj tug nam hluas kws yog lub nroog Xaudoos hab nwg tej zog tub tsi tau ua kev phem kev qas npaum le koj hab koj tej zog ua.

Ntawm nuav yog Xaudoos txujkev txhum. Nwg hab nwg cov ntxhais khaavtheeb, rua qhov puab muaj noj muaj haus nplua mag hab nyob kaaj sab lug, tabsis puab tsi hlub cov tuabneeg txomnyem hab cov tuabneeg pluag.
Puab khaavtheeb hab tawv ncauj kawg le. Thaus kuv pum puab ua tej kws kuv ntxub, kuv txhaj rhuav kuas puab raug kev puamtsuaj.

“ ‘ “Xamalis tej kev txhum tub tsi npaum le koj tej kev txhum ib nraab. Koj tau ua kev phem kev qas ntau dlua nwg. Yog muab nwg pev rua koj, mas koj tug taislaug zoo le tug kws tsi muaj ib qho txhum le.

Nwgnuav koj yuavtsum ris txujkev txaajmuag. Koj tej kev txhum ntau dlua koj cov vivncaug, yog muab puab pev rua koj, ces zoo ib yaam le puab nyob ib caag tsi tau ua txhum le. Koj ca le tiv kev txobthuam hab ris kev poob ntsejmuag, rua qhov koj ua rua koj cov vivncaug zoo yaam le puab tsi muaj txhum.” ’ ”
Tug TSWV has rua Yeluxalees has tas, “Kuv yuav rov txhim khu lub nroog Xaudoos hab nwg tej zog, kuas rov vaammeej dlua. Kuv yuav rov txhim khu kuas koj vaammeej ib yaam nkaus.
Koj yuav rov txaajmuag rua tej kev phem kev qas kws koj tau ua lawm hab koj txujkev txhum yuav ua rua koj cov vivncaug pum has tas puab zoo dlua koj.
Xamalis hab Xaudoos yuav rov zoo le qub, koj hab koj tej zog los yuav rov zoo le qub hab.
Thaus koj khaavtheeb, koj muab koj tug nam hluas kws yog Xaudoos has tsi zoo
ua ntej kws koj tej kev phem kev qas raug nthuav tawm. Nwgnuav koj zoo le nwg. Cov Edoos, cov Filitees hab cov tuabneeg kws nyob puagncig koj kws ntxub koj los has koj plig tsi zoo.
Koj yuav raug txim vim tej kev phem kev qas kws koj tau ua taag lug. Tug TSWV has le ntawd.”
Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has tas, “Kuv yuav ua rua koj lawv le koj tau ua lawm, rua qhov koj tsi ua lawv le koj coglug, koj rhuav koj tej lug cog tseg.
Txawm le ntawd los kuv yuav ncu ntsoov kuv tej lug cog tseg rua koj thaus koj tseem yau, hab kuv yuav coglug rua koj moog ibtxhis.

Koj yuav rov ncu txug tej kev phem kws koj tau ua taag lug lawm. Koj yuav txaajmuag thaus koj coj koj tug taislaug hab tug nam hluas rov lug. Kuv yuav ca obtug zoo ib yaam le yog koj ntxhais, tabsis kuv tsi coglug rua obtug le kuv coglug rua koj.
Kuv yuav nrug koj coglug dlua tshab, koj txhaj paub has tas kuv yog tug TSWV.
Kuv yuav zaam tej kev txhum kws koj tau ua taag lug, tabsis koj yuav ncu ntsoov tej ntawd hab txaajmuag heev tsi xaav has lug le.” Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has le ntawd.
Tug TSWV has rua kuv tas:.
“Tub noobneej, koj ca le qha ib zaaj lug pevtxwv rua cov Yixalayees;

Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam kuas koj has le nuav rua puab: Muaj ib tug dlaav luj kws ob phob tis zoo nkauj hab cov plaub tis ntev heev. Tug dlaav ntawd yaa moog rua sau roob Lenpanoos hab luv tau ib lub ntsis ntoo cab,
tug dlaav coj lub ntsis cab ntawd moog rua huv lub tebchaws kws muaj kev laag kev luam, hab muab cog rua huv lub nroog kws cov tub laag tub luam nyob.
Tug dlaav tsua coj ib lub noob huv tebchaws Yixalayees moog cog rua huv ib thaaj aav zoo  kws muaj dlej txaus yug kuas lub noob ntawd tuaj kaug hab luj hlub.

Tug yub ntawd tuaj ua ib tsob maab tsi sab, tabsis nwg ncau ceg nthuav rua ob saab. Tsob maab ntawd cov ceg hlaav moog txug rua ntawm tug dlaav hab cov caag nrhau moog tub. Cov ceg hab cov nplooj tsaus nti.

“Muaj dlua ib tug dlaav luj kws ob phob tis ntev hab muaj plaub tuab heev. Tsob maab nrhau caag moog txug rua ntawm tug dlaav, hab cov ceg los hlaav nplooj moog rua ntawm tug dlaav, tsob maab ca sab has tas tug dlaav yuav muab dlej yug nwg ntau dlua huv lub vaaj kws nwg tuaj.
Tabsis tsob maab ntawd yeej cog tau rua huv thaaj aav zoo kws muaj dlej txaus, nwg cov ceg txhaj hlaav nplooj ntau, tawg paaj txi txiv hab ua ib tsob maab kws zoo heev.

“Kuv kws yog tug TSWV kaav ib puas tsaav yaam nug le nuav: ‘Tsob maab nuav puas yuav luj hlub taug? Thawj tug dlaav yeej dlob tau tsob maab, zaws cov txiv hab ntshua tej ceg povtseg kuas tsob maab qhuav. Tsi taag yuav siv zug lossis ca ib tsaav tuabneeg kws muaj zug tuaj dlob povtseg le.

Tsob maab ntawd yeej cog rua huv thaaj aav kws zoo lawm tag, tabsis nwg puas yuav luj hlub taug? Thaus cov cua saab nubtuaj ntsawj tuaj, nwg puas yuav ntsws? Nwg puas yuav tuag tshaav rua ntawm thaaj chaw kws nwg tuaj?’ ”
Tug TSWV has rua kuv tas:.

“Koj nug saib cov tuabneeg ntxeev sab puas paub zaaj lug pevtxwv ntawd lub ntsab. Koj has rua puab tas, vaajntxwv Npanpiloos tuaj rua huv Yeluxalees, nteg cov Yudas tug vaajntxwv hab nwg cov numtswv coj moog rua tim tebchaws Npanpiloos lawm.
Vaajntxwv Npanpiloos tseem nteg cov Yudas tug vaajntxwv tsev tuabneeg ib tug coj moog hab yuam kuas nwg coglug lawv le vaajntxwv has. Nwg nteg cov numtswv coj moog kaw,
tsi pub kuas tsaav tuabneeg Yudas sawv taug hab kuas puab ua lawv le tej lug kws cog tseg lawm xwb.

Tabsis cov Yudas tug vaajntxwv ntxeev sab hab khaiv ib paab numtswv moog rua nraag tebchaws Iziv, coj neeg hab tubrog coob heev tuaj. Nwg puas yuav ua tav? Nwg ua le ntawd, nwg puas yuav tsiv dlim? Nwg yuav rhuav tsi tau nwg tej lug cog tseg hab tsiv tsi dlim le!”

Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has tas, “Kuv yog tug Vaajtswv kws muaj sa nyob, cov Yudas tug vaajntxwv yuav tuag rua huv tebchaws Npanpiloos, rua qhov nwg rhuav tej lug cog tseg kws nwg nrug vaajntxwv Npanpiloos kws tsaa nwg ua vaajntxwv lawm.
Txawm yog Falaus muaj tubrog coob heev los yuav paab cov Yudas tug vaajntxwv tua tsi yeej, thaus cov Npanpiloos tuaj khawb aav meem tug ntsaa yeej kuas tua tau tuabneeg tuag coob ntawd.
Cov Yudas tug vaajntxwv saib tsi taug hab rhuav tej lug cog tseg lawm. Nwg ua txhua yaam le ntawd, mas nwg yuav tsiv tsi dlim le.”
Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has tas, “Kuv yog tug Vaajtswv kws muaj sa nyob, kuv yuav rau txim rua nwg vim nwg tuav kuv lub npe coglug has tas, nwg yuav ua lawv le tej lug cog tseg ntawd.
Kuv yuav nthuav vaag khwb nkaus nwg. Kuv yuav coj nwg moog rua tim tebchaws Npanpiloos hab rau txim rua nwg, rua qhov nwg tsi muab sab npuab kuv.
Nwg cov tubrog kws sab tawv tshaaj yuav tuag taag rua huv tshaav rog, hab cov seem yuav tawg tsiv ua saab ua sua rua txhua qhov. Koj txhaj yuav paub has tas kuv yog tug TSWV kws has le ntawd.”
Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has le nuav: “Kuv yuav txav tsob ntoo cab kws sab lub ntsis hab luv tug ntsuag mog; kuv yuav coj moog cog rua sau roob sab,
yog cov Yixalayees lub roob kws sab tshaaj plawg. Nwg yuav ncau ceg, txi txiv hab peem tsheej ua ib tsob ntoo cab luj heev. Yuav muaj txhua yaam noog lug ua zeg hab nyob ntawm tej ceg.

Txhua tsob ntoo kws nyob huv lub tebchaws yuav paub has tas kuv yog tug TSWV. Kuv ua rua cov ntoo kws sab kuas qeg hab ua kuas cov ntoo kws qeg sab tuaj. Kuv ua rua cov ntoo kws tseem ntsuab kuas tuag tshaav, hab ua kuas cov ntoo kws qhuav lawm rov hlaav nplooj. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws has le ntawd. Kuv yuav ua lawv le tej lug kws kuv tau has lawm.”
Tug TSWV has rua kuv tas:
“Zaaj paajlug kws tej tuabneeg naj nub has huv tebchaws Yixalayees yog dlaabtsi? ‘Nam txiv noj txiv qaub, tabsis mivnyuas lug quavncaug.’ ”
Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has tas, “Kuv yog Vaajtswv tug kws muaj sa nyob. Kuv yuav tsi pub mej naj nub has zaaj paajlug nuav huv lub tebchaws Yixalayees ntxiv lawm.
Txhua tug txujsa yog kuv le, tsi has nam txiv hab mivnyuas huv tuabsi. Tug twg ua txhum, tug ntawd tuag xwb.
“Pevxaam has tas, muaj ib tug tuabneeg zoo kws sab ncaaj hab ua ncaaj ua nceeg,
nwg tsi pe cov Yixalayees tej mlom hab tsi noj tej khoom fij rua mlom ntawm qhov chaw kws txwv tsi pub pe mlom. Nwg tsi tau ntxag tej quaspuj lossis tsi nrug tug quaspuj kws tseem coj ntxhua pw.

Nwg tsi dlaag lossis tsi nyag leejtwg. Nwg thim tej kws luas coj tuaj yuam nqe ntawm nwg rov rua luas, nwg pub zaub mov rua cov tuabneeg tshaib nqhes noj lossis muab rig tsho rua cov tuabneeg labqaab naav.
Nwg tsi qev nyaj rua leejtwg kuas them paajlaum. Nwg tsi ua kev phem kev qas, hab nwg txav txim ncaaj nceeg rua cov kws muaj xaiv muaj lug.
Tug tuabneeg kws ua le ntawd yog tug kws fwm kuv tej lug saamfwm hab coj lawv le kuv tej kevcai. Nwg yog tug ncaaj nceeg hab nwg yuav muaj sa nyob. Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has le ntawd.
“Pevxaam has tas, tug tuabneeg ntawd muaj ib tug tub ua tubsaab hab tua tuabneeg, nwg ua  tej kws has lug sau nuav ib yaam
kws leej txiv tsi tau ua ib zag le. Nwg noj tej khoom kws fij rua mlom ntawm qhov chaw kws txwv tsi pub pe mlom, hab ntxag luas tej quaspuj,
nwg dlaag ntxag cov tuabneeg pluag, nwg ua tubsaab hab nwg tsi thim tej kws luas coj tuaj yuam nqe ntawm nwg rov rua luas. Nwg moog pe mlom hab ua kev phem kev qas,
nwg qev nyaj rua luas kuas luas them paajlaum. Nwg puas yuav muaj sa nyob? Nwg yuav tsi muaj. Nwg tau ua tej kev phem kev qas nuav, mas nwg yuav tuag. Nwg yuav ris nwg lub txim ntawd tuag.
“Pevxaam has tas, muaj dlua ib tug txivneej muaj ib tug tub. Tug tub ntawd pum txhua yaam kev txhum kws leej txiv ua, tabsis nwg tsi ua phem lawv le leej txiv ua.
Nwg tsi moog pe cov Yixalayees tej mlom, tsi noj tej khoom kws fij rua tej mlom ntawm qhov chaw kws txwv tsi pub pe mlom, hab nwg tsi ntxag luas tej quaspuj,

tsi tsimtxom lossis nyag leejtwg tug. Nwg thim tej kws luas coj tuaj yuam nqe ntawm nwg rov rua luas. Nwg pub zaub mov rua cov tuabneeg tshaib nqhes noj hab muab rig tsho rua cov tuabneeg labqaab naav.

Nwg tsi ua kev phem kev qas,  hab tsi qev nyaj rua leejtwg kuas them paajlaum. Nwg ua lawv le kuv tej kevcai hab coj lawv le kuv tej lug saamfwm. Nwg yuav tsi tuag vim nwg txiv tej kev txhum, tabsis nwg yuav muaj sa nyob.
Tabsis nwg txiv ua tubsaab, fuab  luas tug hab nwg naj nub ua phem ua qas rua txhua tug, yog le ntawd nwg yuav tuag vim nwg tej kev txhum.

“Tabsis mej nug has tas, ‘Yog le caag tug tub txhaj tsi raug txim vim leej txiv tej kev txhum? Lu lug teb mas yog tug tub ua ncaaj hab ua zoo. Nwg ceev hab ua lawv le kuv tej kevcai, nwg txhaj muaj sa nyob.

Tsuas yog tug kws ua txhum txhaj yuav tuag xwb. Tug tub yuav tsi raug txim vim leej txiv tej kev txhum, hab leej txiv yuav tsi raug txim vim tug tub tej kev txhum. Tug tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg yuav tau nqe zug vim nwg ua ncaaj. Hab tug tuabneeg tsi ncaaj yuav raug txomnyem vim tej kev phem kev qas kws nwg ua.
“Tug tuabneeg kws tso nwg tej kev txhum tseg hab ua lawv le kuv tej kevcai, nwg xyum coj ncaaj hab ua zoo, nwg yuav tsi tuag; tabsis yuav muaj sa nyob.
Kuv yuav zaam nwg tej kev txhum huv tuabsi hab nwg yuav muaj sa nyob, rua qhov nwg coj ncaaj.

Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has tas, ‘Mej xaav has tas, kuv xaav pum tug tuabneeg ua txhum tuag nua los. Tsi yog le ntawd, kuv tsuas xaav pum tug tuabneeg txhum tso nwg tej kev txhum tseg hab muaj sa nyob xwb.

“ ‘Yog muaj ib tug tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg tso nwg txujkev ua zoo tseg, hab moog ua kev phem kev qas, ib yaam le cov tuabneeg ua phem ua qas ua, tug ntawd puas yuav muaj sa nyob? Tsi yog le ntawd! Kuv yuav tsi suav tej kws nwg tau ua zoo yaav taag lug le, nwg yuav tuag vim nwg tej kev txhum hab tsi muab sab npuab kuv.’

“Tabsis mej has tas, ‘Tej kws tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam ua, nwg ua tsi ncaaj.’ Mej cov Yixalayees, ca le noog kuv has. Mej xaav has tas, tej kws kuv ua, kuv ua tsi ncaaj nua los? Mej yog cov kws ua tsi ncaaj ntaag!
Thaus tug tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg tso nwg txujkev ua zoo tseg, hab moog ua kev phem kev qas, nwg yuav tuag; nwg tuag vim tej kev phem kev qas kws nwg ua.
Thaus tug tuabneeg tsi ncaaj nceeg tso nwg tej kev txhum tseg, rov lug coj ncaaj hab ua zoo, nwg yuav tau txujsa.
Nwg thim xaav hab tso kev txhum tseg, yog le ntawd, nwg yuav tsi tuag, tabsis yuav muaj sa nyob.
Mej cov Yixalayees has tas, ‘Tej kws tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam ua, nwg ua tsi ncaaj.’ Mej xaav has tas tej kws kuv ua, kuv ua tsi ncaaj nua los? Mej yog cov kws ua tsi ncaaj ntaag.

“Kuv kws yog tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has rua mej cov Yixalayees has tas, kuv yuav txav txim rua mej txhua tug lawv le teg num kws mej tau ua lug lawm. Ca le tso mej tej kev phem kev qas tseg, tsi xob ca mej tej kev txhum coj mej moog raug kev puamtsuaj.
Mej ca le tso plhuav tej kev phem kev qas kws mej naj nub ua tseg, muab lub sab tshab hab txujkev xaav tshab lug coj. Vim le caag mej cov Yixalayees yuav xaav tuag ua luaj?
Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has tas, ‘Kuv tsi xaav kuas ib tug twg tuag le. Ca le tso mej tej kev txhum tseg, mej txhaj muaj sa nyob.’ ”
Tug TSWV has kuas kuv hu zaaj nkauj quaj ntsuag nuav rua cov Yixalayees ob tug nom:
Meb nam zoo ib yaam le tug maum tsuv ntxhuav! Nwg tu nwg cov mivnyuas luj hlub nrug cov txiv tsuv ntxhuav kws nyaum heev.
Nwg tu tug mivnyuas ntawd hab qha kuas txawj moog nrhav noj; nwg txhaj ua ib tug tsaj kws noj tuabneeg.
Ntau tsaav tuabneeg nov nwg lub moo hab khawb qhov tog nwg kev. Luas muab nqailauj nqai nwg caab moog rua nraag tebchaws Iziv lawm.
Thaus nwg pum has tas qhov kws nwg naj nub tog tsi muaj qaabhau, nwg taag kev ca sab. Nwg tu dlua ib tug mivnyuas, tug ntawd luj hlub ua ib tug tsuv ntxhuav kws nyaum heev.
Thaus nwg luj hlub tav ib tug txiv tsuv ntxhuav lawm, nwg nrug lwm cov tsuv ntxhuav moog nrhav tum tsaj. Nwg xyum moog tum tsaj hab ua ib tug tsaj kws noj tuabneeg.
Nwg tsoo luas tej chaw faajxwm, hab rhuav luas tej nroog puag taag. Txhua zag kws nwg nyooj ua rua cov tuabneeg huv lub tebchaws ntawd ntshai heev.
Ntau tsaav tuabneeg sis sau ua ke tuaj tua nwg; muaj tuabneeg coob heev tuaj txhua qhov chaw tuaj. Puab nthuav puab tej vaag khwb hab nteg tau nwg.

Puab muab nwg kaw rua huv ib lub nkuaj hab coj nwg moog cuag cov Npanpiloos tug vaajntxwv. Puab tso tuabneeg zuv rawv nwg tsi pub nwg nyooj, kuas tsi nov nwg lub suab nyooj sau tej roob kws nyob huv tebchaws Yixalayees lawm.
Meb nam zoo ib yaam le tsob txiv maab kws cog ze rua ntawm ntug dlej. Nyob qhov ntawd muaj dlej nplua mag, tsob txiv maab muaj nplooj tsaus nti hab txi txiv ncw heev.
Tsob txiv maab tej ceg khov heev, hab ua tau vaajntxwv tej cwj. Hab tsob txiv maab sab heev moog nto plawg sau cov fuab; txhua tug pum tsob txiv maab ntawd muaj nplooj ntau hab sab heev.
Tabsis txawm muaj tuabneeg limham muab nwg dlob povtseg. Cov cua saab nubtuaj ntsawj ua rua nwg cov txiv qhuav; hab nwg tej ceg ntshua taag; hab luas muab tej ceg qhuav coj moog hlawv povtseg taag.
Nwgnuav luas muab nwg coj moog cog rua tom taj suabpuam; ntawm thaaj aav kws tsi muaj dlej.

Tabsis suavtawg ca le cig sau tej ntsis txiv maab; kub tej ceg hab tej txiv taag dlu lug. Cov ceg ntawd tsi khov hab tsi tau ua vaajntxwv tej cwj lawm. Ntawm nuav yog zaaj nkauj quaj ntsuag kws luas hu taag rov hu dlua.
Lub tsib hlis ntuj nub xab kaug, xyoo xyaa kws peb raug nteg coj moog rua lwm tebchaws. Cov Yixalayees cov thawjcoj qee leej tuaj nug kuv tuavxaam saib tug TSWV nyam le caag.
Tug TSWV has rua kuv tas:

“Tub noobneej, koj ca le has rua cov tuabneeg kws tuaj cuag koj has tas, tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has le nuav: Puas yog mej xaav tuaj nug saib kuv nyam le caag? Kuv yog Vaajtswv tug kws muaj sa nyob. Kuv tsi pub mej nug kuv ib lus le. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam, tej lug nuav yog kuv has.
“Tub noobneej, koj puas tau npaaj txhij yuav txav txim rua puab? Koj ca le qha kuas puab paub txug tej kev phem kev qas kws puab cov yawmkoob tau ua taag lug lawm.

Koj ca le qha tej kws kuv has nuav rua cov Yixalayees. Thaus kuv xaiv cov Yixalayees, kuv tau coglug tseg rua puab lawm. Thaus puab tseem nyob nraag tebchaws Iziv, kuv qha rua puab has le nuav: Kuv yog tug TSWV kws yog puab tug Vaajtswv.

Kuv coglug rua puab has tas, kuv yuav coj puab tawm nraag tebchaws Iziv lug nyob rua huv lub tebchaws kws kuv tau xaiv tseg rua puab lawm. Lub tebchaws ntawd aav rog hab zoo ua noj ua haus dlua lwm lub tebchaws.
Kuv has kuas puab tso tej mlom phem qas kws puab nyam tseg, hab tsi xob ca cov Iziv tej vaajtswv cuav ua rua puab tsi huv, rua qhov kuv yog tug TSWV kws yog puab tug Vaajtswv.

Tabsis puab tawmtsaam kuv, tsi noog kuv lug, tsi tso puab tej kev phem kev qas lossis tsi tso kev pe cov Iziv tej vaajtswv cuav tseg. Thaus puab tseem nyob nraag Iziv, puab tub yuav raug kuv txujkev chim kws luj kawg nkaus.

Tabsis kuv tsi ua le ntawd, yog kuv ua le ntawd, luas yuav txobthuam kuv lub npe. Kuv tau qha rua cov Iziv kws cov Yixalayees nrug nyob has tas, kuv yuav coj cov Yixalayees tawm huv cov Iziv lub tebchaws moog.
“Kuv txhaj tau coj cov Yixalayees tsiv tawm nraag tebchaws Iziv lug rua taj suabpuam lawm.
Kuv muab kuv tej lug saamfwm hab tej kevcai qha rua puab, yog leejtwg ua lawv le kuv tej lug saamfwm hab tej kevcai ntawd, yuav tau txujsa.
Kuv muab nub Xanpataus ua ib lub cim coglug nruab nraab ntawm puab hab kuv, kuas puab paub has tas, kuv yog tug TSWV kws ua rua puab dlawbhuv.

Tabsis thaus cov Yixalayees tseem nyob nraag taj suabpuam, puab ntxeev sab rua kuv hab tsi noog kuv lug. Puab rhuav kuv tej kevcai hab tsi coj lawv le kuv tej lug saamfwm kws pub tau txujsa rua tug kws ua lawv le ntawd. Thaus puab tseem nyob ntawm taj suabpuam, puab saib nub Xanpataus tsi tseemceeb. Kuv txujkev chim tub yuav ua rua puab raug kev puamtsuaj.
Tabsis kuv tsi ua le ntawd, yog kuv ua le ntawd, cov tuabneeg kws pum ntsoov kuv coj cov Yixalayees tawm huv tebchaws Iziv lug yuav txobthuam kuv lub npe.

Yog le ntawd, thaus puab tseem nyob nraag taj suabpuam, kuv coglug rua puab has tas kuv yuav tsi coj puab moog rua huv lub tebchaws kws kuv yuav muab rua puab, yog lub tebchaws kws aav rog hab zoo ua noj ua haus dlua lwm lub tebchaws.
Kuv tau coglug le ntawd, rua qhov puab rhuav kuv tej kevcai hab tsi coj lawv le kuv tej lug saamfwm, hab puab saib nub Xanpataus tsi tseemceeb, puab nyam pe puab tej mlom heev dlua.
“Tabsis kuv hlub puab heev. Kuv txhaj tsi tua kuas puab tuag rua nraag taj suabpuam.
Kuv ntuag cov Yixalayees tej hluas le nuav: Mej tsi xob xyum coj lawv le mej cov yawmkoob tau ua lug lawm; tsi xob coj lawv le puab tej kevlig kevcai lossis pe puab tej mlom kws ua rua mej tsi huv.
Kuv yog tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv. Mej yuavtsum ua lawv le kuv tej kevcai hab tej lug saamfwm.
Muab nub Xanpataus ua nub dlawbhuv, qhov ntawd yuav ua lub cim rua peb tej lug cog tseg, hab yuav ua rua mej ncu ntsoov has tas kuv yog tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv.

“Tabsis cov tuabneeg kws nyob tam ntawd ntxeev sab rua kuv. Puab rhuav kuv tej kevcai hab tsi ua lawv le kuv tej lug saamfwm kws pub tau txujsa rua tug kws ua lawv le ntawd. Thaus puab tseem nyob nraag taj suabpuam, puab saib nub Xanpataus tsi tseemceeb, kuv txujkev chim tub yuav ua rua puab raug kev puamtsuaj.
Tabsis kuv tsi ua le ntawd, yog kuv ua le ntawd, cov tuabneeg kws pum ntsoov kuv coj cov Yixalayees tsiv tawm huv tebchaws Iziv lug, yuav txobthuam kuv lub npe.
Kuv txhaj coglug dlua rua puab nyob nraag taj suabpuam has tas, kuv yuav lawv kuas puab moog nyob ri sua thoob plawg nplajteb.
Kuv ua le ntawd, rua qhov puab rhuav kuv tej kevcai hab tsi coj lawv le kuv tej lug saamfwm, puab saib nub Xanpataus tsi tseemceeb, hab puab pe tej mlom kws puab cov yawmkoob tau pe lug lawm.
“Kuv txhaj muab tej kevcai kws tsi zoo hab tej lug saamfwm kws cawm tsi tau txujsa rua puab.
Kuv ca puab fij tej khoom kws ua rua puab tsi huv, hab ca puab muab puab cov tub hlub tua fij. Qhov ntawd yog kev rau txim kuas puab paub has tas, kuv yog tug TSWV.
“Tub noobneej, koj ca le moog has tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam tej lug rua cov Yixalayees le nuav: qhov kws puab cov yawmkoob tsi muab sab npuab kuv, ua rua kuv poob ntsejmuag heev.

Kuv coj puab lug rua huv lub tebchaws kws kuv tau coglug tseg has tas yuav muab rua puab. Tabsis thaus puab pum tej roob sab hab tej ntoo kws muaj nplooj tsaus nti, puab tua tsaj fij rua tej ntawd. Qhov kws puab tua tsaj hlawv fij hab muab cawv txiv maab fij le ntawd ua rua kuv chim heev rua puab.
Kuv nug puab has tas, tej chaw sab kws mej moog ntawd yog dlaabtsi? Puab txhaj hu tej chaw ntawd has tas ‘Chaw Sab’  lug txug naj nub nua.
Nwgnuav koj ca le moog has kuv tej lug rua cov Yixalayees le nuav: Vim le caag mej ua tej kev txhum kws mej cov yawmkoob ua, hab pe puab tej mlom?

Txawm yog nwgnuav los mej tseem muab khoom hab muab mej tej mivnyuas tua hlawv fij rua mlom hab ua rua mej tsi huv ib yaam le mej cov yawmkoob. Mej cov Yixalayees tseem nug has tas, kuv nyam le caag! Kuv yog tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam hab yog Vaajtswv tug kws muaj sa nyob, kuv yuav tsi pub mej nug ib yaam dlaabtsi le.
