Mej xaav has tas mej yuav ua kuas mej zoo ib yaam le lwm tsaav tuabneeg hab zoo ib yaam le cov tuabneeg kws nyob rua lwm lub tebchaws kws pe tej ntoo hab tej pobzeb. Tabsis mej yuav ua tsi tau le ntawd.”

“Kuv yog tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam hab yog Vaajtswv tug kws muaj sa nyob, kuv has rua mej has tas thaus kuv chim, kuv yuav siv kuv txhais teg hab kuv lub fwjchim kws luj kawg nkaus tswj mej.
Thaus kuv coj mej tawm huv cov tebchaws kws kuv ntab mej moog nyob ua saab ua sua rov lug, kuv yuav qha kuv lub fwjchim hab kuv txujkev chim rua mej.
Kuv yuav coj mej moog rua ntawm ‘Lub taj suabpuam ntau Tsaav Tuabneeg’ hab kuv yuav rau txim rua mej tim ntsej tim muag qhov ntawd.
Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has tas, kuv yuav rau txim rua mej ib yaam le kuv rau txim rua mej cov yawmkoob nraag taj suabpuam Xinais.
“Kuv yuav tswj mej nruj heev, hab ua kuas mej fwm kuv tej lug cog tseg.

Kuv yuav tshem cov tuabneeg ntxeev sab hab cov tuabneeg txhum tawm ntawm mej moog. Kuv yuav coj puab tawm huv tej tebchaws kws nwgnuav puab nyob moog, tabsis kuv yuav tsi coj puab rov lug rua huv tebchaws Yixalayees. Mej txhaj yuav paub has tas kuv yog tug TSWV.”

Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has tas, “Cov Yixalayees, mej ca le moog pe mlom lawv le mej sab nyam! Tabsis kuv has rua mej has tas tom qaab ntawd mej yuavtsum fwm kuv lub npe kws dlawbhuv hab tseg tsi xob fij khoom rua mej tej mlom lawm.

Mej cov Yixalayees yuavtsum pehawm kuv sau kuv lub roob dlawbhuv  kws yog cov Yixalayees lub roob sab huv tebchaws nuav. Kuv yuav txaus sab rua mej, hab xaav kuas mej coj tej khoom theej txhoj, tej khoom fij kws zoo tshaaj, hab tej khoom fij kws dlawbhuv tuaj pub rua kuv.

Tom qaab kws kuv coj mej tawm huv cov tebchaws kws kuv ntab mej moog nyob ua saab ua sua rov lug nyob ua ke lawm, kuv yuav txais mej tej khoom fij, ces txhua tsaav tuabneeg yuav paub has tas kuv yog tug kws dlawbhuv.
Thaus kuv coj mej rov lug nyob rua huv lub tebchaws Yixalayees kws kuv tau coglug tseg has tas, kuv yuav muab rua mej cov yawmkoob, ces mej yuav paub has tas kuv yog tug TSWV.
Mej yuav ncu txug tej kev poob ntsejmuag hab tej kev phem kev qas kws ua rua mej tsi huv. Mej yuav ntxub mej vim tej kev txhum kws mej ua taag lug lawm.

Cov Yixalayees, mej yuav paub has tas kuv yog tug TSWV, thaus kuv nrug mej has, kuv tsi has lawv le mej teg num phem hab mej tej kev phem kev qas kws mej ua, rua qhov kuv yog tug TSWV kws dlawbhuv.” Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has le ntawd.
Tug TSWV has rua kuv tas:.
“Tub noobneej, koj ca le saib moog rua saab qaabteb, koj ca le tshev saab qaabteb hab cevlug tshev thaaj haav zoov kws nyob saab qaabteb!

Koj has kuas thaaj haav zoov kws nyob saab qaabteb noog tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam tej lug kws has le nuav: Mej saib! Kuv taabtom tis suavtawg hlawv txhua tsob ntoo, tsi has tej ntoo qhuav lossis ntoo nyoog huv mej. Tsi muaj ib yaam kws yuav tua tau cov suavtawg ntawd le. Suavtawg yuav kub saab qaabteb ti nkaus saab qaumteb, ces txhua tug yuav nov suavtawg kub ntaiv fwv.
Puab txhua tug yuav paub has tas kuv yog tug TSWV kws tis suavtawg hlawv puab hab yuav tsi muaj leejtwg tua tau cov suavtawg ntawd.”
Tabsis kuv thov has tas, “Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam, thov tsi xob ca kuv ua tej nuav! Rua qhov txhua tug yuav ywg has tas, nwg ibtxwm has tau xwb nwg ua tsi tau.”
Tug TSWV has rua kuv tas,
“Tub noobneej, koj ca le cev kuv tej lug tshev lub nroog Yeluxalees hab foom phem rua tej chaw kws tuabneeg pe mlom. Koj has rua cov Yixalayees lub tebchaws tas,
kuv yog tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam, kuv has le nuav: kuv yog mej tug yeebncuab! Kuv yuav rhu kuv raab ntaaj tua mej txhua tug, tsi has tug ua zoo lossis tug ua phem.
Kuv yuav siv kuv nraab ntaaj tawmtsaam txhua tug, pib saab qaumteb moog ti nkaus saab qaabteb.
Txhua tug yuav paub has tas kuv yog tug TSWV. Kuv rhu kuv raab ntaaj lawm, mas kuv yuav tsi muab ntsaws rua huv naab hlo le.
“Tub Noobneej, koj ca le quaj le tug tuabneeg kws taag kev ca sab lawm. Koj quaj le ntawd taabmeeg suavdlawg.

Thaus puab nug koj has tas vim le caag koj quaj le ntawd? Koj teb puab has tas, vim puab yuav nov xuv tsi zoo, thaus puab nov tej xuv ntawd, puab yuav ntshai kawg nkaus, puab tej npaab yuav tsaug leeg, puab tug zug yuav ntaug hab puab tej hauvcaug yuav tshee nyo. Lub sijhawm tub lug txug lawm; tej nuav yeej yuav tshwmsim.” Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has le ntawd.
Tug TSWV has rua kuv tas:
“Tub noobneej, koj ca le cev tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam tej lug rua puab has tas: Muaj ib raab ntaaj, raab ntaaj ntawd luas tub huv tau ntse hab txhuam ci nplaag lawm.
Luas huv raab ntaaj ntawd tua tuabneeg, hab txhuam ci nplaag cuag tsaglig xub laim. Yuav tsi muaj kev kaaj sab rua kuv tsaav tuabneeg kws tsi noog kuv tej lug hab tsi quavntsej kuv tej kev rau txim.
Luas txhuam raab ntaaj ci nplaag npaaj ca siv lawm xwb. Luas huv hab txhuam raab ntaaj ci nplaag coj moog cob rua tug tuabneeg tua tuabneeg txhais teg.

Tub noobneej, ca le quaj tu sab; rua qhov raab ntaaj ntawd yuav tua kuv tsaav tuabneeg, hab tua taagnrho cov Yixalayees tej thawjcoj huv tuabsi. Puab yuav raug tua tuag taag nrug kuv tsaav tuabneeg. Ca le ntaus koj hauvsab vim tsi muaj kev ca sab lawm!
Kuv taabtom sim kuv tsaav tuabneeg, yog puab tsi kaam hloov sab, tej kws kuv has ntawd yuav lug raug puab.

“Tub noobneej, koj ca le cevlug. Koj ca le npuaj teg, ces raab ntaaj yuav txav moog txav lug, raab ntaaj ntawd yog raab ntaaj tua tuabneeg kws txaus ntshai heev,  hab yog raab ntaaj kws txuv tuabneeg txujsa.
Raab ntaaj ntawd yuav ua rua kuv tsaav tuabneeg zug ntaug hab qaug. Kuv yuav muab kuv raab ntaaj  kws tua tuabneeg huv ci nplaag cuag tsaglig xub laim, hem puab huv lub nroog.
Raab ntaaj kws ntse heev, koj ca le txav moog rua saab xis hab saab txhumphem! Koj ca le txav moog rua txhua phaab
Kuv los yuav npuaj teg hab kuv txujkev chim yuav ntaug. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws has le ntawd.”
Tug TSWV has rua kuv tas,

“Tub noobneej, koj ca le tshuam phaj rua ntawm ob txujkev kws tug vaajntxwv Npanpiloos yuav coj nwg raab ntaaj tuaj. Ob txujkev ntawd tuaj huv tuab lub tebchaws tuaj. Koj tshuam dlaim phaj rua ntawm ob txujkev tshuam kws moog rua huv lub nroog.
Tshuam ib dlaim phaj qha vaajntxwv kev moog rua huv cov Amoos lub nroog Lanpas, hab ib dlaim qha kev moog rua huv lub nroog Yeluxalees kws muaj chaw faajxwm ruaj khov huv tebchaws Yudas.

Tug vaajntxwv kws kaav Npanpiloos tuaj sawv ntawm ob dlaim phaj ntawm kev tshuam. Nwg tsi paub has tas yuav moog txuj twg, ces nwg muab cov xub neevnti cu,  nwg tuavxaam nrug nwg tej mlom, hab saib tug tsaj kws tua ua khoom fij lub sab.
Vaajntxwv saab teg xis tuav rawv ib tug vug sau has tas lub nroog ‘Yeluxalees!’ Tug vug ntawd qha rua vaajntxwv kuas ca le qw ntaus rog, khawb aav puab ntswg hab khawb kwj ncig lub nroog.

Cov tuabneeg huv Yeluxalees yuav tsi ntseeg tej nuav, rua qhov puab tau coglug tseg lawm. Tabsis tej lug qha tshwm ntawd, yog qha puab tej kev txhum hab ceebtoom rua puab paub has tas puab yuav raug nteg.

Tom qaab ntawd tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has rua puab le nuav: ‘Mej tej kev txhum tub tshwm rua suavdlawg pum lawm. Txhua tug pum has tas mej tau ua txhum luj heev. Txhua yaam kws mej ua qha rua suavdlawg paub has tas mej ua txhum. Txug sijhawm rau txim rua mej lawm, kuv yuav muab mej cob rua mej cov yeebncuab.
“ ‘Cov Yixalayees tej thawjcoj kws ua phem hab tsi dlawbhuv, nub kws rau txim zag kawg rua mej tub lug txug lawm.

Kuv yog tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam, tej lug nuav yog kuv has. Ca le hle mej tej mom kub, hab hle pluaj ntaub kws khi mej taubhau tseg. Yuav tsi zoo le qub lawm. Yuav tsaa cov tuabneeg pluag kuas muaj fwjchim! Hab yuav txu cov thawjtswj kuas poob fwjchim!

Puamtsuaj, puamtsuaj! Kuv yuav ua kuas lub nroog puamtsuaj. Tabsis tej xwm nuav yuav tsi tau muaj moog txug thaus tug kws kuv xaiv lug rau txim rua lub nroog lug txug. Kuv yuav muab lub nroog cob rua tug ntawd.

“ ‘Tub noobneej, koj ca le cev tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam tej lug rua cov Amoos kws txobthuam cov Yixalayees le nuav: “Npaaj raab ntaaj txhij lawm; luas txhuam raab ntaaj ntawd ci nplaag cuag tsaglig xub laim ca tua tuabneeg lawm xwb.
Tej ywgtoog cuav kws mej pum hab tej lug qha tshwm kws mej has yog lug dlaag xwb. Mej ua kev phem kev qas, nub kws rau txim zag kawg rua mej lug txug lawm. Raab ntaaj yuav lug txav mej cejdlaab.
“ ‘ “Ca le ntsaws raab ntaaj rua huv naab! Kuv yuav txav txim rua mej ntawm thaaj chaw kws kuv tsim mej, hab huv lub tebchaws kws yug mej.
Kuv yuav ua kuas mej raug kuv txujkev chim kws cig le nplaim tawg. Hab kuv yuav muab mej cob rua cov tuabneeg nruj tsiv kws muaj cuabkaav ua kuas mej raug puamtsuaj.
Mej yuav raug suavtawg hlawv kuas kub nyab taag. Mej cov ntshaav yuav nrug rua huv mej lub tebchaws, hab yuav tsi muaj leejtwg ncu txug mej lawm.” ’ ” Tug TSWV has le ntawd.
Tug TSWV has rua kuv tas:.
“Tub noobneej, koj npaaj txav txim rua lub nroog Yeluxalees kws tua tuabneeg lawm los? Koj ca le qha kuas nwg paub tej kev phem kev qas kws nwg tau ua lawm.

Kuv yog tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam, koj ca le qha kuv tej lug rua lub nroog has tas, ‘Vim koj tau tua koj cov tuabneeg ntau tug hab pe mlom ua rua koj tsi huv, koj lub sijhawm kawg tub lug txug lawm!

Qhov kws koj tua tuabneeg ua rua koj muaj txim, hab qhov kws koj pe mlom ua rua koj tsi huv. Koj nub kawg lug txug hab koj lub sijhawm tub taag lawm! Kuv txhaj ca lwm tsaav tuabneeg txobthuam hab saib tsi taug koj.
Tej tebchaws nyob dleb hab nyob ze los saib tsi taug koj, rua qhov koj tsi ua lawv le kuv tej kevcai.
Yixalayees cov thawjcoj tso sab rua puab tug zug hab puab tua tuabneeg.
Cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv koj, tsi muaj ib tug fwm nam fwm txiv le. Koj dlaag ntxag cov tuabneeg txawv tebchaws, txhaav cov puj ntsuag hab tej mivnyuas ntsuag tug.
Koj tsi fwm kuv tej chaw dlawbhuv hab saib nub Xanpataus tsi tseemceeb.
Koj cov tuabneeg muaj qee leej dlaag kuas luas muab lwm tug tua povtseg. Qee leej noj tej khoom kws fij rua mlom. Hab qee leej ua kev nkauj kev nraug.
Qee leej nrug nwg txiv tug nam tshab pw, qee leej yuam tej quaspuj thaus tseem coj khaub dluag.
Qee leej ua kev nkauj kev nraug hab qee leej ntxag nwg tug nyaab lossis nwg tug muam kws tsi koom nam.

Koj cov tuabneeg qee leej ca luas ndlav nwg moog tua tuabneeg. Qee leej qev nyaj hab tsub paajlaum ntau rua nwg cov kwvtij Yixalayees them, nwg npluanuj vim txeeb luas tug. Puab cov ntawd tsi ncu txug kuv lawm.’ ” Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has le ntawd.
“Kuv yuav tsaa kuv txhais teg ntaus koj cov tuabneeg kws ua tubsaab hab tua tuabneeg.
Tom qaab kws kuv rau txim rua koj lawm, koj xaav has tas leejtwg tseem muaj zug hab tsaa taug npaab? Kuv yog tug TSWV kws has le ntawd. Kuv yuav ua lawv le kuv has.
Kuv yuav ntab mej tsiv moog nyob rua ntau lub tebchaws hab nyob xyaw lwm tsaav tuabneeg, hab yuav ua kuas mej tej kev phem kev qas pluj moog.
Hab luas lwm tsaav tuabneeg yuav tsi fwm mej, mej txhaj yuav paub has tas, kuv yog tug TSWV.”
Tug TSWV has rua kuv tas:
“Tub noobneej, cov Yixalayees tsi muaj nqes rua kuv lawm. Puab zoo le tej quav tooj lab, tooj dlawb, hlau, txhuas hab nyaj kws luas cais tawm huv yeejvub lug lawm xwb.
Yog le ntawd, kuv yog tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has tas, puab muaj nqes le tej ntawd lawm xwb. Kuv yuav coj puab ua ke lug rua huv lub nroog Yeluxalees
ib yaam le tug tuabneeg kws muab nyaj, tooj lab, hlau, txhuas hab tooj dlawb lug tso rua huv lub yeejvub. Kuv txujkev chim yuav kub kuas puab yaaj taag ib yaam le suavtawg kub tej ntawd.
Kuv yuav sau puab lug nyob rua huv lub nroog Yeluxalees, kuv txujkev chim yuav ua cubtawg hlawv kuas puab yaaj taag.
Puab yuav raug tug TSWV txujkev chim kws luj kawg nkaus. Puab yuav yaaj taag rua huv lub nroog Yeluxalees ib yaam le tej nyaj kws yaaj rua huv lub yeejvub.”
Tug TSWV rov has rua kuv tas:
“Tub noobneej, koj has rua cov Yixalayees has tas, puab lub tebchaws tsi huv lawm, kuv yuav rau txim rua puab lug ntawm kuv txujkev chim.

Cov thawjcoj  ntawd zoo ib yaam le cov tsuv ntxhuav kws nyooj quas lawg rua tej tsaj kws puab tum tau. Puab tua tuabneeg, fuab luas tej nyaj hab tej khoom kws muaj nqes, hab puab tua tuabneeg ua rua muaj puj ntsuag coob heev.

Cov povthawj rhuav kuv tej kevcai hab ua rua kuv tej khoom dlawbhuv tsi huv lawm. Puab tsi cais has tas yaam twg dlawbhuv hab yaam twg tsi dlawbhuv. Puab tsi qha qhov txawv ntawm yaam kws huv hab yaam kws tsi huv rua suavdlawg paub. Hab puab saib nub Xanpataus tsi tseemceeb. Qhov tseemceeb yog cov Yixalayees tsi fwm kuv.
Cov numtswv zoo ib yaam le tej maa kws muab tej tsaj kws puab tum tau dlua ib thooj rua ib qho. Puab tua tuabneeg ua kuas puab muaj txag npluanuj.

Cov cevlug muab kev txhum npog tseg ib yaam le tuabneeg muab moov sib dlawb pleev phaab ntsaa. Puab pum tej ywgtoog cuav hab pav tej lug qha tshwm tsi tseeb. Puab khaav has tas yog puab has tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam tej lug. Tabsis kuv kws yog tug TSWV tsi tau has rua puab le.
Cov tuabneeg npluanuj fuab hab nyag luas le. Puab quab yuam cov tuabneeg pluag hab txhaav cov tuabneeg txawv tebchaws tug.

Kuv nrhav puab cov ntawd ib tug kws txawj khu phaab ntsaa, hab sawv nreg nroog ntawm saab phaab ntsaa kws puag lawm, tiv thaiv lub tebchaws kuas kuv txujkev chim tsi xob rhuav lub tebchaws, tabsis kuv nrhav tsi tau ib tug le.
Yog le ntawd, kuv txhaj ca kuv txujkev chim lug raug puab, kuas puab puamtsuaj taag ib yaam le suavtawg hlawv, vim puab tau ua kev phem kev qas.” Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has le ntawd.
Tug TSWV has rua kuv tas:
“Tub noobneej, muaj ob vivncaug kws koom ib leeg nam;
thaus obtug nyavnyuas tav nkauj nyob huv tebchaws Iziv, obtug moog ua namndlav ua rua obtug lub cev nkaujxwb puag lawm.

Tug taislaug npe hu ua Auhulas,  (nwg pev txug lub nroog Xamalis) nwg tug nam hluas npe hu ua Auhulinpas  (nwg pev txug lub nroog Yeluxalees). Kuv yuav obtug ua kuv quaspuj huv tuabsi, hab obtug puavleej yug tubki rua kuv.
Auhulas yog kuv tug quaspuj, tabsis nwg pheej moog ua namndlav nrug nwg cov hluas nraug kws tuaj peg tebchaws Axilias tuaj.
Cov hluas nraug ntawd, yog cov tubrog kws naav tej tsoog tsho ntaub maag xav, puab yog numtswv hab thawj tubrog qeb sab; puab puavleej caij neeg, puab hluas hab zoo nraug heev.
Auhulas pheej ua namndlav rua cov tubrog Axilias hab qaug rua kev nkauj kev nraug, nwg txhaj moog pe cov Axilias tej mlom ua rua nwg tsi huv lawm.

Nwg pheej ua namndlav ib yaam le thaus nwg tseem nyob nraag tebchaws Iziv kws nwg ua rua nwg lub cev nkaujxwb puag. Thaus nwg tseem yog nkaujxwb, tub muaj txivneej tuaj nrug nwg pw ib yaam le tug namndlav lawm.
Kuv txhaj muab nwg cob rua nwg cov hluas nraug Axilias kws nwg nyam heev.
Puab muab nwg hle labqaab hab txeeb nwg tej tub tej ntxhais coj moog, hab rhu ntaaj tua nwg. Tej quaspuj nyob rua txhua qhov sis ntxhi zum zawg has txug nwg txuj moov phem.
“Auhulinpas kws yog nwg tug nam hluas pum ntsoov tej nuav los nwg tseem ua namndlav heev dlua Auhulas kws yog nwg tug taislaug lawm hab.
Nwg xaav ua namndlav rua cov Axilias tej numtswv hab tej thawj tubrog kws naav tej tsoog tsho ci plaag. Puab cov ntawd puavleej caij neeg, puab hluas hab zoo nraug heev.
Kuv pum has tas Auhulinpas ua txhum kev nkauj kev nraug heev, hab nwg tug taislaug los ua ib yaam le nwg.

‘Auhulinpas ua namndlav heev zuj zug. Nwg qaug sab rua cov Npanpiloos cov thawj tubrog tej dluab kws luas txaug rua ntawm tej phaab ntsaa kws zaas lab ci nplaag, sa hlaab ntawm tej dluav hab khi tej pluaj ntaub txaij nraug zeeg rua sau taubhau.
Thaus nwg pum dlheev cov dluab ntawd, nwg lub sab qaug lais rua kev nkauj kev nraug hab tso xuv moog rua cov tubrog Npanpiloos.
Cov tubrog Npanpiloos tuaj nrug nwg pw. Puab ua rua nwg lub cev tsi huv, thaus kawg nwg txhaj moog nrug puab ua phem ua qas.
Auhulinpas labqaab qha rua txhua tug paub has tas nwg yog namndlav. Kuv dlhuav nwg ib yaam le kuv dlhuav nwg tug taislaug hab.
Nwg moog ua namndlav heev dlua yaav taag lug, nwg coj tug yaam ntxwv ib yaam le thaus nwg tseem yog ntxhais hluas kws nwg ua namndlav nyob nraag tebchaws Iziv.
Nwg xaav ua namndlav rua cov txivneej kws muaj zug ib yaam le tej txiv neeg luav lossis txiv neeg xob.’
(Auhulinpas, koj xaav rov moog ua namndlav le qub kws thaus koj tseem yog ntxhais hluas nyob nraag tebchaws Iziv kws koj ca tej txivneej tuaj kov koj ob lub mig hab ua rua koj cev nkaujxwb puag.)

“Kuv yog tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has rua Auhulinpas le nuav: ‘Koj zug ntaug taag rua koj cov hluas nraug lawm, tabsis kuv yuav ua kuas puab chim heev rua koj, hab kuv yuav coj puab tuaj vij koj.

Kuv yuav coj cov Npanpiloos, cov Khalede-aas, cov Pekaus, cov Sau-as, cov Kau-as hab cov Axilias tuaj. Kuv sau cov numtswv hab cov thawj tubrog hluas kws zoo nraug heev tuaj. Taagnrho cov numtswv nuav puavleej caij neeg hab muaj meejmom sab.

Puab yuav coj tubrog coob, coj tsheb ua rog hab tsheb thauj khoom tuaj saab qaumteb  tuaj tua koj. Puab muaj tej thaiv nav ntaaj hab mom hlau. Puab yuav tuaj vij koj. Kuv yuav muab koj cob rua puab, hab puab yuav txav txim rua koj lawv le puab txuj kevcai.

Kuv chim heev rua koj, kuv txhaj ca puab tuaj ua rua koj lawv le puab txujkev chim. Puab yuav txav koj lub taubntswg, ob lub nploojntseg, hab tua koj cov mivnyuas povtseg. Puab yuav coj koj tej tub tej ntxhais moog hlawv caj.
Puab yuav chua koj tej khaub dluag hab txeeb koj tej saw nyaj saw kub.

Kuv yuav ua kuas koj tso plhuav koj txujkev ua nkauj ua nraug hab kev ua namndlav le koj pheej ua nyob nraag tebchaws Iziv tseg. Koj yuav tsi tsaa qhovmuag saib tej mlom lossis xaav txug lub tebchaws Iziv ntxiv lawm.’ ”
Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has le nuav: “Kuv yuav muab koj cob rua cov tuabneeg kws koj ntxub hab cov tuabneeg kws koj dlhuav.
Puab ntxub koj heev, puab yuav txeeb txhua yaam kws koj khwv tau moog, ca koj nyob labqaab rua luas pum le tug namndlav. Koj txujkev ua nkauj ua nraug hab ua namndlav,
coj tej nuav lug raug koj. Koj ua namndlav rua ntau tsaav tuabneeg hab pe mlom ua rua koj tsi huv lawm.
Koj ua lawv le koj tug taislaug, yog le ntawd kuv yuav muab lub khob kws nwg haus lawm rua koj haus hab.”
Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has tas, “Koj yuav haus koj tug taislaug lub khob; lub khob ntawd luj hab tub heev. Txhua tug yuav thuam hab luag koj plig; lub khob ntawd puv kawg le.
Lub khob ntawd yuav ua rua koj qaug hab txomnyem heev, yog lub khob kev ntshai hab kev puag ntsoog yog koj tug taislaug Xamalis lub khob ntaag.
Koj yuav haus khee kawv huv qaab khob, lub khob tawg hab tej txhais yuav hlais koj ob lub mig. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has le ntawd.”
Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has le nuav, “Rua qhov koj tsi ncu qaab kuv hab tig nrausqaum rua kuv, koj txhaj raug kev txomnyem, vim koj ua kev nkauj kev nraug hab ua namndlav.”
Tug TSWV has rua kuv tas, “Tub noobneej, koj npaaj txav txim rua Auhulas hab Auhulinpas lawm los? Koj ca le nthuav tej kev phem kev qas kws obtug tau ua lawm.
Obtug ua kev nkauj kev nraug hab tua tuabneeg, ua nkauj ua nraug nrug tej mlom hab tua tej mivnyuas kws obtug yug rua kuv fij rua tej mlom.
Tsi taag le ntawd xwb, obtug tseem ua rua kuv lub Tuamtsev tsi dlawbhuv hab saib kuv nub Xanpataus tsi tseemceeb.
Txhua nub kws obtug tua kuv tej mivnyuas fij rua tej mlom, obtug ua tsi huv rua kuv lub Tuamtsev!
“Obtug tso xuv tsi tseg moog caw tej txivneej kws nyob dleb heev, ces puab txawm tuaj. Ob vivncaug moog dlaa dlej, zaas tawv muag hab muab saw nyaj saw kub lug coj.
Obtug nyob ntawm lub rooj kws zoo heev, muaj ib lub rooj kws rau tej tshuaj tsw qaab, hab roj txiv ntoo kws kuv muab rua obtug nyob ntawm obtug hauv ntej.

Muaj ib paab tuabneeg sis thaam ntshu nrooj puagncig obtug. Puab yog ib paab txivneej kws tuaj tom taj suabpuam tuaj. Puab nqaa paugteg tuaj looj rua ob vivncaug ntawd ncej npaab hab muab mom kub kws zoo nkauj heev rua obtug ntoo.
Kuv xaav has tas, luas siv ob vivncaug ntawd ua namndlav, txhaj ua rua obtug lub cev puag taag rua kev nkauj kev nraug.
Cov txivneej ntawd naj nub rov tuaj cuag ob tug namndlav ntawd. Puab pheej tuaj cuag Auhulas hab Auhulinpas kws nyam ua nkauj ua nraug heev ntawd.
Cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg yuav rau txim rua obtug, rua qhov obtug ua kev nkauj kev nraug hab tua tuabneeg. Obtug ua nkauj ua nraug hab teg lu ntshaav.”
Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has tas, “Ca le coj ib paab tuabneeg tuaj fuab hab txeeb obtug tej khoom.
Ca paab tuabneeg ntawd muab pobzeb ntaus obtug, muab ntaaj tua obtug hab tua obtug cov mivnyuas hab hlawv obtug tej vaaj tse huv tuabsi.
Kuv yuav txwv tsi pub tuabneeg ua kev nkauj kev nraug thoob tebchaws, hab ntuag txhua tug quaspuj kuas tsi xob ua kev nkauj kev nraug le obtug ua.
Kuv yuav rau txim rua meb ob vivncaug, vim meb tau ua kev nkauj kev nraug hab pe tej mlom. Meb txhaj yuav paub has tas kuv yog tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam.”
Lub kaum hli ntuj nub xab kaug, xyoo cuaj kws peb raug nteg moog, tug TSWV has rua kuv tas:
“Tub noobneej, koj ca le teev nub nua ca, rua qhov nub nua yog nub kws vaajntxwv Npanpiloos tuaj vij lub nroog Yeluxalees.
Koj ca le qha tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam tej lug pevtxwv rua puab le nuav: Ca le muab lub laujkaub txawb rua huv qhovcub hab laub dlej rua.
Muab cov nqaj kws zoo tshaaj plawg kws yog thooj pwgpu hab thooj ncej puab tso rua huv; xaiv tej pobtxhaa kws zoo tso rua huv hab.
Xaiv cov nqaj yaaj kws zoo heev tso rua huv; muab tawg lug rauv  rua huv qaab lub laujkaub ntawd. Ca kuas cov dlej npau; tsawg cov pobtxhaa hab cov nqaj.”

Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has tas: “Lub nroog kws tua tuabneeg raug puamtsuaj lawm! Nwg zoo le lub laujkaub xeb kws ibtxwm tsi ntxuav le. Luas muab cov nqaj huv lub laujkaub npu ib dlaim zuj zug tsi tshuav ib dlaim seem le.
Lub nroog tua tuabneeg tsi muab tej ntshaav laub rua huv aav kuas cov moov aav npug tej ntshaav; tabsis nwg muab laub rua sau lub pobzeb.
Kuv tseg cov ntshaav ntawd nyob rua sau lub pobzeb, tsi muab dlaabtsi npug le, kuas kuv txujkev chim txhaj tau ua pauj rua nwg.”
Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has le nuav: “Lub nroog kws tua tuabneeg puamtsuaj lawm! Kuv yuav sau tawg ntau heev lug teeb tseg.
Ca le nqaa tawg lug ntxiv! Ntxuaj kuas cubtawg cig! Tsawg cov nqaj kuas muas, muab dlu xyaw txumlom! Muab cov pobtxhaa hlawv kuas kub nyab taag.
Ca le muab lub laujkaub tooj tso rua sau cov ncaig tawg kuas kub heev. Thaus cov xeb nti taag lawm lub laujkaub txhaj rov huv,
txawm ua le ntawd los cov xeb kws khub lub laujkaub yuav nti tsi taag.
Yeluxalees, koj txujkev ua nkauj ua nraug ua rua koj lub cev tsi huv lawm. Txawm yog kuv ntxuav los koj yeej tsi huv. Koj yuav tsi huv moog txug thaus koj raug kuv txujkev chim kws luj kawg nkaus.

Kuv kws yog tug TSWV has le nuav: Lub sijhawm txav txim lug txug lawm. Kuv yuav tsi tseg hab tsi taabncuab koj le. Koj yuav raug txim lawv le tej kev txhum kws koj tau ua lawm.” Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has le ntawd.
Tug TSWV has rua kuv tas:
“Tub noobneej, kuv tshuab ib paas xwb, ua rua tug kws koj hlub heev yaa moog rua lwm qhov lawm. Tsi pub koj ywg, quaj lossis poob ib lub kua muag le.

Tsi pub kuas koj lub suab nca rua leejtwg nov. Ca le ntoo phuam hab rau khau, luas txhaj tsi paub has tas koj quaj ntsuag. Tsi xob npug koj lub ntsejmuag lossis noj tej zaub mov kws cov tuabneeg quaj ntsuag noj.”
Thaus sawv ntxuv kuv tseem nrug cov tuabneeg suavdlawg thaam. Thaus tsaus ntuj, kuv tug quaspuj tuag lawm, ces nub tom qaab kuv txawm ua lawv le tug TSWV has rua kuv.
Tej tuabneeg nug kuv has tas, “Vim le caag koj txhaj ua le nuav?”
Kuv teb puab has tas, “Tug TSWV has rua kuv kuas

has rua mej cov Yixalayees le nuav: ‘Mej khaav has tas lub Tuamtsev ua rua mej muaj fwjchim. Mej nyam tuaj saib, tabsis tug TSWV yuav ua kuas nwg lub Tuamtsev tsi huv. Ces cov hluas huv mej tej tsev tuabneeg kws tseem nyob huv lub nroog Yeluxalees yuav raug tua tuag taag rua huv tshaav rog.
Thaus ntawd mej yuav ua le kuv ua. Mej yuav tsi muab ntaub npug mej lub ntsejmuag hab yuav tsi noj tej zaub mov kws cov tuabneeg quaj ntsuag noj.
Mej yuav ntoo phuam hab rau khau, mej tsi xob quaj lossis nyav. Mej yuav puamtsuaj taag vim mej tej kev txhum, hab mej ib leeg yuav nroo rua ib leeg.

Kuv yog Exekees, kuv ua lub cim rua mej ntaag; mej yuav ua txhua yaam lawv le kuv ua. Tug TSWV has tas thaus tej nuav tshwmsim lawm, mej txhaj yuav paub has tas kuv yog tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam.’ ”
Tug TSWV has tas, “Tub noobneej, kuv yuav tshem lub Tuamtsev kws puab khaav has tas ua rua puab muaj fwjchim hab nyam tuaj saib ntawd, hab puab tej tub tej ntxhais moog huv tuabsi.
Nub ntawd yuav muaj qee leej dlim kev puamtsuaj lug qha tej ntawd rua koj.
Nub ntawd koj yuav rov has tau lug rua tug kws dlim lug ntawd, koj yuav tsi nyob ntsag tu lawm. Koj yuav ua lub cim rua tej tuabneeg suavdlawg, puab txhaj yuav paub has tas kuv yog tug TSWV.”
Tug TSWV has rua kuv tas:.
“Tub noobneej, koj ca le cevlug tshev cov Amoos.

Koj has kuas puab ca le noog tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam tej lug: ‘Mej zoo sab qhov kws luas ua tsi huv rua kuv lub Tuamtsev, cov Yixalayees lub tebchaws ua suabpuam, hab cov Yudas raug luas nteg moog.

Vim mej zoo sab le ntawd, kuv yuav ca cov tuabneeg kws nyob saab nubtuaj tuaj tua yeej mej. Puab yuav tuaj tsuam yeej tubrog hab nyob huv mej lub tebchaws. Puab yuav tau noj mej tej txiv maab hab haus mej tej kua mig nyuj.
Kuv yuav muab lub nroog Lanpas hloov ua chaw kaw ntxhuav, hab muab lub tebchaws Amoos ua chaw kaw yaaj, mej txhaj yuav paub has tas kuv yog tug TSWV.
“ ‘Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has le nuav: “Mej npuaj teg hab dlha paaj pawg zoo sab heev. Mej saib tsi taug cov Yixalayees lub tebchaws.

Vim mej ua le ntawd, kuv yuav muab mej cob rua lwm tsaav tuabneeg, ca luas tuaj fuab hab txeeb mej tug. Kuv yuav rhuav kuas mej tu noob hab ua tsi tau ib tsaav tuabneeg lossis ib lub tebchaws. Mej txhaj paub has tas, kuv yog tug TSWV.” ’ ”
Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has tas, “Vim cov Mau-am  has tas, cov Yudas tsuas zoo le lwm tsaav tuabneeg xwb,
yog le ntawd, kuv yuav ca luas tuaj tua cov nroog kws tiv thaiv cov Mau-am tug nrimteb, cov nroog ntawd yog: Npethes Yesimaus, Npa-aas Me-oos hab Kili-athayees.
Kuv yuav ca cov tuabneeg kws nyob saab nubtuaj tuaj tua yeej cov Mau-am hab cov Amoos, kuas cov Mau-am  ua tsi tau ib tsaav tuabneeg ntxiv lawm.
Kuv yuav rau txim rua cov Mau-am, puab txhaj yuav paub has tas kuv yog tug TSWV.”
Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has tas, “Vim cov Edoos ua nruj ua tsiv pauj rua cov Yudas, ces thaus kawg lub txim txhaj lug raug rua cov Edoos.

Kuv has rua suavdlawg paub has tas, kuv yuav rau txim rua cov Edoos hab tua txhua tug tuabneeg hab tej tsaj kuas tuag taag huv tuabsi. Kuv yuav ua kuas puab lub tebchaws ua suabpuam, txij ndlua ntawm lub nroog Temas moog txug ndlua rua lub nroog Dedaas, hab tej tuabneeg yuav raug tua tuag rua huv tshaav rog.

Kuv yuav ca kuv tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees ua pauj cov Edoos rua kuv hab puab yuav ua rua cov Edoos lawv le kuv txujkev chim. Cov Edoos txhaj yuav paub has tas kuv txujkev rau txim nyaav npaum le caag.” Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has le ntawd.

Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has tas, “Tub noobneej, cov Filitees ua nruj ua tsiv pauj rua cov tuabneeg kws ibtxwm yog puab cov yeebncuab, puab txhaj muab cov tuabneeg kws puab ntxub rhuav puamtsuaj taag.
Yog le ntawd, kuv txhaj has tas, kuv yuav ua kuas cov Filitees tu noob nrho. Kuv yuav ua rua cov kws seem nyob huv lub taj nraag Filitees kuas puamtsuaj huv tuabsi.
Kuv yuav rau txim nyaav pauj rua puab kuas txaus nkaus. Puab yuav raug kuv txujkev chim. Puab txhaj paub has tas kuv yog tug TSWV.”
Lub hlis ntawd nub xab ib,  xyoo kaum ib kws peb raug nteg moog, tug TSWV has rua kuv tas:
“Tub noobneej, cov tuabneeg huv lub nroog Tiles qw zoo sab has tas, ‘Yeluxalees puamtsuaj lawm! Nwg tej kev laag kev luam tu lawm! Nwg yuav tsi nrug peb sis tw lawm!’

“Kuv kws yog tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has le nuav: Lub nroog Tiles, kuv yog koj tug yeebncuab ntaag. Kuv yuav coj ntau tsaav tuabneeg tuaj tua koj, puab yuav tuaj ib yaam le tej nthwv dlej havtxwv nphau.
Puab yuav tuaj rhuav tug ntsaa yeej kws thaiv mej lub nroog hab tsoo mej tej chaw tsomfaaj kuas pob taag. Kuv yuav cheb tej moov aav kuas dlu lug tsuas tseg lub pobzeb ca xwb.

Cov tuabneeg ntaus ntseg yuav tuaj zab puab tej vaag rua sau lub pobzeb kws nyob huv havtxwv. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has le ntawd. Ntau tsaav tuabneeg yuav tuaj fuab lub nroog Tiles,
hab puab yuav muab ntaaj tua cov tuabneeg huv tej nroog kws nyob huv nwg lub tebchaws. Ces cov Tiles txhaj yuav paub has tas kuv yog tug TSWV.”

Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has tas, “Kuv yuav coj tug vaajntxwv kws muaj fwjchim luj dlua lwm tug vaajntxwv tuaj tua lub nroog Tiles. Tug ntawd yog Vaajntxwv Nenpukajnexales kws kaav tebchaws Npanpiloos. Nwg yuav coj ib paab tubrog coob coob kws muaj neeg, tsheb neeg hab tubrog caij neeg tuaj saab qaumteb tuaj.

Cov tuabneeg huv tej nroog kws nyob huv lub tebchaws ntawd yuav raug tua tuag taag. Cov yeebncuab yuav khawb aav meem kuas nce tau tug ntsaa yeej hab puab muab tej vuag ua dlaim thaiv nav ntaaj tuaj tua mej.
Puab yuav siv cuabyeej tuaj tsoo mej tej ntsaa yeej hab siv tej nqaaj hlau tsoo mej tej chaw tsomfaaj.

Puab cov neeg yuav dlha ua plauv tshauv nchu auv nab tuaj voob nkaus mej. Cov neeg hai tsheb lug hlaa tej roojvaag huv lub nroog kws puag taag lawm, tej suab nrov tseeg nkawg ua rua mej tej ntsaa yeej ua zug koog.
Puab cov tubrog caij neeg yuav dlha tsaus nti huv mej tej kev hab muab ntaaj tua mej cov tuabneeg tuag pawg lug. Mej tej ncej kws luj hab khov yuav raug tsoo qaug taag rua huv aav.

Mej cov yeebncuab yuav fuab mej tej nyaj txag hab txeeb mej tej khoom laag luam. Puab yuav tsoo mej tej ntsaa yeej hab rhuav mej tej vaaj tse kws zoo kuas puag taag. Puab yuav coj tej pobzeb, tej ntoo hab tej roj maab moog pov rua huv havtxwv.
Kuv yuav ua kuas mej tej suab nkauj hab suab nkauj nogncaas ntsag.
Kuv tsuas tseg lub pobzeb ca rua cov tuabneeg ntaus ntseg tau zab puab tej vaag xwb. Mej yuav tsi tsim lub nroog ntawd ntxiv lawm. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has le ntawd.”

Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has rua lub nroog Tiles has tas: “Thaus luas tuaj tua yeej mej lawm, cov tuabneeg kws nyob lawv ntug havtxwv yuav nov cov tuabneeg kws raug luas tua tej suab quaj, ua rua puab ntshai heev.

Taagnrho cov vaajntxwv kws nyob lawv ntug havtxwv yuav nqeg sau puab tej zwmtxwv lug. Puab yuav hle puab tej tsho luj hab tej rig tsho tseg, hab nyob huv aav ua ib ce tshee nyo. Puab ntshai tej xwm phem kws lug raug mej, ua rua puab tswj tsi tau qhov kws puab tshee le.

Puab yuav hu zaaj nkauj quaj ntsuag rua mej has tas, Lub nroog kws nto npe tshaaj plawg puamtsuaj lawm! Nwg tej nkoj raug muab tshem tawm huv havtxwv moog lawm. koj hab koj cov tuabneeg kws kaav tej havtxwv, ua rua cov tuabneeg kws nyob lawv ntug havtxwv ntshai kawg le.
Nub kws koj swb, ua rua cov tuabneeg kws nyob lawv ntug havtxwv tshee nyo hab puab txhua tug yoob taag, vim tej kev puamtsuaj kws lug raug koj.”
Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has tas, “Kuv yuav ua kuas koj nyob dlo cuas le tej nroog kws puag taag tsi muaj tuabneeg nyob lawm. Kuv yuav ca dlej havtxwv lug nyaab koj.

Kuv yuav xaa koj moog rua huv tubtuag teb, hab nrug cov tuabneeg tam thaus u nyob. Kuv yuav ca koj moog nrug cov tuabneeg tuag huv tubtuag teb nyob xyaw tej kws pob puag taag moog ibtxhis. Vim le ntawd yuav tsi muaj tuabneeg lug nyob huv koj, hab koj yuav tsi tau ua ib lub nroog rua cov tuabneeg caj nyob lawm.
Kuv yuav muab koj ua ib qho pevtxwv kws txaus ntshai heev, nub ntawd yog koj nub kawg. Tuabneeg yuav nrhav koj, tabsis nrhav tsi tau.” Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has le ntawd.
Tug TSWV has rua kuv tas,
“Tub noobneej, koj ca le hu ib zaaj nkauj quaj ntsuag rua lub nroog Tiles,

yog lub nroog kws nyob ntawm ntug havtxwv hab ua laag ua luam nrug cov tuabneeg nyob lawv ntug havtxwv txhua qhov. Koj ca le qha tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam tej lug rua nwg has tas, Lub nroog Tiles, koj khaav has tas koj zoo nkauj kawg le.
Havtxwv yog koj lub tsev. Cov tuabneeg kws tsim koj, tsim tau koj zoo le lub nkoj kws zoo nkauj heev;
Puab muab ntoo thwjsuab peg Roob Helemoos lug ua ntsaa xov koj, hab coj ntoo cab peg Roob Lenpanoos lug ua koj cov ncej.
Puab coj cov ntoo qheb nraag tebchaws Npasaas lug txua ua dluav; puab coj ntoo cab nraag tebchaws Xaipas lug ua lub saamthaj hab muab kaug ntxhw lug pua.

Puab muab cov ntaub maag zoo heev kws coj nraag tebchaws Iziv lug xaws ua koj dlaim ntaus cua, luas tuaj dleb saib los paub. Koj cov hauvmum yog muab cov ntaub xav kws coj nraag ntug havtxwv Elisas lug xaws vuv.
Koj cov tuabneeg tsaav nkoj tuaj huv lub nroog Xidoos hab Alevas tuaj. Koj cov tuabneeg tsaav nkoj yog cov kws txawj tsaav heev.
Koj cov kws txua ntoo huv nkoj yog cov kws kawm txawj huv lub nroog Nkenpas lug lawm. Cov tuabneeg tsaav nkoj moog rua txhua qhov kws koj ua laag ua luam.
“Cov tuabneeg Pawxias, Lidias hab Linpias tuaj ua koj cov tubrog. Puab muab puab tej thaiv nav ntaaj hab mom hlau khuam rua huv koj, kuas koj tau koob meej.

Cov tubrog Alevas tuaj zuv koj tej ntsaa loog hab cov tuabneeg Nkamas tuaj zuv koj tej chaw tsomfaaj. Puab coj puab tej thaiv nav ntaaj tuaj khuab rua ntawm koj tej phaab ntsaa hab puab yog cov kws tuaj tseev zaam kuas koj zoo nkauj.
“Cov tuabneeg kws nyob Xapees tuaj nrug koj ua luam, puab coj nyaj, hlau, txhuas hab tooj tuaj pauv koj tej khoom laag luam.
Koj ua laag ua luam nrug cov tuabneeg Kilis, Tunpas hab Mesekis. Puab coj tubqhe hab tej twj taig tooj tuaj pauv koj tej khoom laag luam.
Cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv tebchaws Npethes Taunkamas coj neeg thauj nraa, neeg caij ntaus rog hab neeg zaag tuaj pauv koj tej khoom laag luam.

Cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv Laudi-as  los kuj tuaj nrug koj ua laag ua luam; hab cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv tej tebchaws lawv ntug havtxwv coj kaug ntxhw hab ntoo kubtwg tuaj pauv koj tej khoom laag luam ib yaam nkaus.

Cov tuabneeg Xilias los kuj tuaj yuav koj tej khoom hab tej yaam kws koj ua tau huv koj lub tebchaws. Puab coj tej qai zeb muaj nqes, ntaub xav, ntaub tsuj, ntaub maag, qai zeb kaulas hab qai zeb av tuaj pauv koj tej khoom laag luam.
Cov Yudas hab cov Yixalayees coj moov nplej,  zib ntaab, roj txiv ntoo hab roj tsw qaab tuaj pauv koj tej khoom laag luam.

Cov tuabneeg Damaxes hab Kilis coj cawv txiv maab huv Helenpoos, hab tej ntaub plaub yaaj huv lub nroog Xahas,  hab coj hlau hab roj tsw qaab tuaj pauv koj tej khoom laag luam hab tej yaam kws koj ua tau huv koj lub tebchaws.
Cov tuabneeg Dedaas, coj ntaub pua eeb neeg tuaj pauv koj tej khoom laag luam.
Cov tuabneeg Alanpias hab cov numtswv huv tebchaws Kedas, coj yaaj, coj mivnyuas yaaj hab coj tshis tuaj pauv koj tej khoom laag luam.
cov tuabneeg huv Senpas hab La-amas, coj tej qai zeb muaj nqes, coj kub hab coj txhua yaam roj tsw qaab tuaj pauv koj tej khoom laag luam.
Cov tuabneeg huv lub nroog Halaas, Kanes hab Edees tej tub laag tub luam huv Senpas, Asules hab Khilimas, puavleej tuaj nrug koj pauv kev laag kev luam.
Puab coj tej tsoog tsho ntaub xav, coj ntaub tsuj hab ntaub pua tsev kws txaij zoo nkauj, coj hlua hab legxuv tuaj muag rua koj.
Cov tuabneeg Talasis tej nkoj thauj khoom laag luam tuaj rua koj. Koj zoo ib yaam le lub nkoj nyob huv havtxwv kws ntim khoom puv nkaus.
Thaus koj cov tuabneeg nkuam nkoj moog txug ntawm ntug havtxwv, cov cua saab nubtuaj txawm ntsawj koj moog rua tom plawv havtxwv lawm.

Thaus koj tog rua huv havtxwv lawm, koj tej nyaj txag, tej khoom laag luam cov tuabneeg caij nkoj hab tsaav nkoj, cov kws txua ntoo, cov tub laag tub luam, cov tubrog kws nyob huv nkoj, hab txhua yaam pluj taag rua huv havtxwv.
Cov tuabneeg huv nkoj tej suab qw ntxhe moog txug rua tim ntug dlej.
Cov tuabneeg tsaav nkoj, tsaav puab tej nkoj moog rua tim ntug havtxwv, hab txhua tug kws nyob huv nkoj tawm taag rua saab nrau.
Puab txhua tug quaj hab tu sab heev txug koj, puab tsuab moov aav rua sau taubhau hab quaj dlaa huv qhov tshauv.
Puab chais puab tej plaubhau, hab muab ntaub tsaaj lug npua; puab quaj ab sab kawg le.
Puab hu zaaj nkauj quaj ntsuag rua koj has tas: ‘Leejtwg txhaj pev tau lub nroog Tiles kws nwgnuav tub tog rua huv havtxwv lawm?
Thaus koj thauj tej khoom huv havtxwv moog, koj ua rua ntau tsaav tuabneeg txaus sab heev. Hab ua rua tej vaajntxwv huv qaab ntuj nuav muaj txag npluanuj lug ntawm koj tej khoom laag luam.
Nwgnuav koj pob puag taag rua huv havtxwv, koj tog rua huv qaab thu, koj tej khoom hab koj cov tuabneeg ua laag ua luam pluj taag nrug koj rua huv havtxwv lawm.’
“Txhua tug kws nyob lawv ntug dlej havtxwv yoob taag, vim tej xwm phem kws lug raug koj. Txawm yog puab cov vaajntxwv los yeej ntshai ua ntsejmuag thumxem taag le.
Koj pluj ndlais lawm, pluj moog ibtxhis le. Tej tub laag tub luam nyob thoob nplajteb ntshai tshee nyo. Puab ntshai nyob tsaam puab raug tej xwm phem kws koj raug.”
Tug TSWV has rua kuv tas:

“Tub noobneej, koj ca le has tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam tej lug rua tug vaajntxwv kws kaav lub nroog Tiles has tas: Koj khaav has tas koj yog vaajtswv, koj nyob sau vaajtswv lub zwmtxwv kws muaj havtxwv nyob puagncig. Koj ua ib yaam le koj yog vaajtswv, tabsis koj yog tuabneeg xwb, koj tsi yog vaajtswv!
Koj xaav has tas koj ntse tshaaj Danees,  tsi muaj ib yaam dlaabtsi kws koj yuav tsi paub le?
Koj lub tswvyim hab kev txawj ntse ua rua koj npluanuj, muaj nyaj muaj kub puv txhaab.
Koj ua laag ua luam ntse heev hab tau paajlaum ntau kawg. Koj khaavtheeb rua koj tej kev npluanuj!
“Yog le ntawd, kuv yog tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam, kuv has rua koj le nuav: rua qhov koj xaav has tas, koj ntse ib yaam le vaajtswv,
kuv yuav tso cov yeebncuab kws yog tuabneeg txawv tebchaws tuaj tawmtsaam koj. Puab yuav tuaj rhuav txhua yaam khoom zoo kws koj ua tau lug ntawm koj lub tswvyim hab kev txawj ntse.
Puab yuav muab koj pov rua huv tubtuag teb. Koj yuav tuag rua huv plawv havtxwv le tej tuabneeg kws raug luas tua.
Thaus puab yuav tua koj, koj tseem has tas, koj yog vaajtswv hab los? Thaus koj nyob tim ntsej tim muag cov tuabneeg kws tua koj, koj yuav yog tuabneeg xwb, koj tsi yog Vaajtswv.
Koj yuav tuag le cov tuabneeg kws tsi ua kevcai txav tuag rua cov tuabneeg txawv tebchaws teg. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has le ntawd.”
Tug TSWV has rua kuv tas:

“Tub noobneej, koj ca le quaj ntsuag rua tug vaajntxwv kaav lub nroog Tiles kws yuav raug tej xwm phem. Koj ca le has tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam tej lug rua nwg le nuav: Yaav taag lug koj muaj yaam ntxwv zoo, koj ntse hab zoo nraug kawg le!

Koj nyob huv Edees kws yog Vaajtswv lub vaaj, hab koj naav tej tsoog tsho qai zeb muaj nqes kws yog: kanelis, kixaulais, aunixis, npelis, taupas, yapes, xafiles, nkanes hab emelas. Koj naav kub ci ntsaa ab, tej ntawd yog npaaj tseg rua koj  nub kws tsim koj lawm.
Kuv tso ib tug qhelunpees zuv koj.  Koj nyob sau kuv lub roob dlawbhuv, hab moog moog lug lug ntawm cov pobzeb suavtawg.
Koj yeej muaj tug cwjpwm zoo txij thaus kuv tsim koj lug txug rua nub kws koj moog ua kev phem kev qas.

Koj ua laag ua luam khwv kawg, qhov ntawd coj koj moog ua txhum kevcai hab poob rua kev txhum. Kuv txhaj ntab koj tsiv tawm sau kuv lub roob dlawbhuv moog, hab tug qhelunpees kws zuv koj los ntab koj tawm ntawm cov pobzeb suavtawg moog.
Koj khaavtheeb vim koj zoo nraug, koj lub tswvyim pluj taag vim koj lub koob meej nto moo lug. Vim le ntawd kuv txhaj muab koj pov rua huv nplajteb, kuv rau txim rua koj taabmeeg tej vaajntxwv.

Koj ua txhum luj, vim koj ua laag ua luam tsi ncaaj, hab ua rua koj lub chaw pehawm tsi huv lawm. Yog le ntawd kuv txhaj tso suavtawg lug hlawv koj kuas ua tshauv taag rua huv nplajteb taabmeeg tej tuabneeg suavdlawg.
Koj pluj ndlais lawm tag, pluj moog ibtxhis le. Txhua tsaav tuabneeg kws paub koj yuav ntshai hab yoob taag, puab ntshai nyob tsaam puab raug tej xwm phem kws koj raug.”
Tug TSWV has rua kuv tas:
“Tub noobneej, koj ca le cev kuv tej lug tshev lub nroog Xidoos.

Koj ca le has tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam tej lug rua cov tuabneeg huv Xidoos le nuav: Xidoos, kuv yog koj tug yeebncuab, txhua tug tuabneeg yuav qhuas kuv, vim tej kws kuv tau ua rua koj. Puab yuav paub has tas, kuv yog tug TSWV kws dlawbhuv, thaus kuv rau txim rua cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv koj.

Kuv yuav tso kaab mob lug raug koj, hab ua kuas muaj ntshaav ndlwg puv nkaus txhua txujkev. Yuav muaj yeebncuab tuaj txhua phaab tuaj tua koj, hab koj cov pejxeem yuav raug tua. Ces koj txhaj yuav paub has tas, kuv yog tug TSWV.”
Tug TSWV has tas, “Cov tebchaws kws nyob puagncig cov Yixalayees yuav tsi txobthuam hab tsimtxom puab lawm. Puab txhaj yuav paub has tas, kuv yog tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam.”

Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has tas, “Kuv yuav coj cov Yixalayees tawm huv tej tebchaws kws puab moog nyob rov qaab lug. Txhua tsaav tuabneeg txhaj yuav paub has tas, kuv yog tug TSWV kws dlawbhuv. Cov Yixalayees yuav tau rov lug nyob huv puab lub tebchaws kws kuv muab rua kuv tug tubkhai Yakhauj lawm.

Cov Yixalayees yuav nyob kaaj sab lug huv lub tebchaws ntawd. Puab yuav ua vaaj ua tsev hab cog txiv maab. Kuv yuav rau txim rua cov tebchaws nyob puagncig puab kws pheej txobthuam hab tsimtxom puab. Puab yuav nyob kaaj sab lug, puab txhaj paub has tas, kuv yog tug TSWV kws yog puab tug Vaajtswv.”
Lub kaum hli ntuj nub kaum ob, xyoo kaum kws peb raug nteg moog, tug TSWV has rua kuv tas:
“Tub noobneej, koj ca le cev kuv tej lug tshev Falaus kws yog cov Iziv tug vaajntxwv. Koj qha rua nwg has tas, nwg hab nwg cov tuabneeg yuav raug txim.

Koj has tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam tej lug rua Falaus kws yog cov Iziv tug vaajntxwv le nuav: Kuv yog koj tug yeebncuab, koj yog tug naab qaa luj kws nyaum heev pw huv haav dlej. Koj has tas, tug dlej Niles yog koj le hab koj yog tug tsim nwg.
Kuv yuav muab nuv chob koj puabtsaig kuas tshaab plawg, hab ua kuas tej ntseg kws nyob huv koj tug dlej lu koj tej khum.
Kuv yuav muab koj hab cov ntseg kws lu rua ntawm koj cov khum pov rua tom taj suabpuam hab yuav tsi muaj tuabneeg muab koj log. Kuv yuav ca tej noog hab tej tsaj lug noj koj.
Cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv tebchaws Iziv txhaj yuav paub has tas kuv yog tug TSWV.” Tug TSWV has tas, “Cov Yixalayees tso sab rua koj txujkev paab, tabsis koj tub khov tsi cuag tug nyuas kaav lojkov.
Thaus cov Yixalayees cev teg tuav koj, koj luv chob puab pwgpu, hab thaus puab pheeb koj, koj luv ua rua puab saav dluav.
Yog le ntawd, kuv yog tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has qha rua koj tas, kuv yuav tso tuabneeg nqaa ntaaj tuaj tua koj, puab yuav tua koj cov tuabneeg hab tej tsaj txhu kuas tuag taag.
Tebchaws Iziv yuav nyob qhuav nkuag ca, koj txhaj yuav paub has tas kuv yog tug TSWV. “Rua qhov koj has tas, tug dlej Niles yog koj le, hab koj yog tug tsim,

nwgnuav kuv yog koj hab tug dlej Niles tug yeebncuab. Kuv yuav ua kuas tebchaws Iziv nyob qhuav nkuag ca, txij ndlua ntawm lub nroog Midaules kws nyob saab qaumteb moog ti nkaus lub nroog Axavas kws nyob saab qaabteb hab moog txug ndlua ntawm cov tuabneeg Sudaas tug nrimteb.
Yuav tsi muaj tuabneeg lossis tsaj taug kev hlaa lub tebchaws ntawd le. Yuav tsi muaj tuabneeg nyob rua huv lub tebchaws ntawd plaub caug xyoo.

Kuv yuav ua kuas lub tebchaws nyob nphob xuav rua huv nplajteb nuav. Nwg tej nroog yuav pob puag moog txug plaub caug xyoo hab yuav puamtsuaj phem tshaaj lwm lub nroog. Kuv yuav ua kuas cov tuabneeg Iziv poob tebchaws. Puab yuav tawg moog nyob xyaw lwm tsaav tuabneeg rua txhua lub tebchaws.”
Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has tas, “Tom qaab kws dlhau plaub caug xyoo lawm, kuv yuav coj cov tuabneeg Iziv kws moog nyob xyaw lwm tsaav tuabneeg rov qaab lug,
hab kuv yuav ca puab lug nyob rua saab qaabteb huv tebchaws Iziv kws yog puab qub teb qub chaw. Puab lub tebchaws yuav tsi muaj fwjchim,

lub tebchaws ntawd yog lub kws tsi muaj fwjchim tshaaj plawg huv nplajteb nuav. Puab yuav tsi tau kaav lwm tsaav tuabneeg ntxiv lawm. Kuv yuav ua kuas puab tsi muaj fwjchim, puab txhaj yuav kaav tsi tau lwm tsaav tuabneeg.

Cov Yixalayees yuav tsi moog vaamkhom cov Iziv paab lawm. Cov Iziv txujkev txhum ua rua cov Yixalayees pum has tas, puab tso sab yuam kev rua cov Iziv lawm. Ces cov Yixalayees txhaj yuav paub has tas, kuv yog tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam.”
Lub ib hlis ntuj nub xab ib, xyoo neeg nkaum xyaa kws peb raug nteg moog, tug TSWV has rua kuv tas:

“Tub noobneej, Vaajntxwv Nenpukajnexales kws kaav tebchaws Npanpiloos tub sawv kev tuaj ntaus lub nroog Tiles lawm. Nwg yuam nwg cov tubrog kuas ris nraa nyaav heev, ua rua puab dlo hau hab xubpwg hle tawv taag. Txawm le ntawd los nwg hab nwg cov tubrog tsi tau ib yaam dlaabtsi huv lub nroog Tiles ua nqe zug le.

Kuv kws yog tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has le nuav: Kuv yuav muab lub tebchaws Iziv cob rua Vaajntxwv Nenpukajnexales, nwg yuav fuab hab nqaa cov Iziv tej nyaj tej kub moog them nwg cov tubrog.
Kuv yuav muab lub tebchaws Iziv ua nqe zug rua nwg, rua qhov nwg cov tubrog ua num rua kuv. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has le ntawd.
“Txug thaus kws tej ntawd tshwmsim lawm, kuv yuav ua kuas cov Yixalayees rov muaj fwjchim. Exekees, koj ca le moog has kuas txhua tug nov, puab txhaj yuav paub has tas kuv yog tug TSWV.”
Tug TSWV has rua kuv ntxiv tas:
“Tub noobneej, koj ca le cevlug lawv le tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam tej lug: Nub kws muaj kev txhawj ntshai lug yuav txug!
Nub ntawd tub lug ze lawm, yog nub kws tug TSWV rau txim, yog nub muaj kev tsaus ntuj hab kev txomnyem rua txhua tsaav tuabneeg.

Yuav muaj kev ua tsuv ua rog huv tebchaws Iziv. hab muaj kev kub ntxhuv nyob huv tebchaws Sudaas. Ntau leej yuav raug tua rua huv tebchaws Iziv; Tuabneeg yuav tuaj fuab ua rua lub tebchaws puamtsuaj taag.
“Kev sis tua zag nuav ua rua cov tubrog Sudaas, Linpias, Lidias, Alanpias, Kub hab kuv cov tubrog raug tua tuag taag.”

Tug TSWV has tas, “Cov tuabneeg kws tuaj paab cov Iziv hab Iziv cov tubrog kws khaavtheeb yuav raug tua tuag taag rua huv tshaav rog. Txij ndlua ntawm Midaules kws nyob saab qaumteb moog txug rua ntawm lub nroog Axavas kws nyob saab qaabteb. Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has le ntawd.
Cov tebchaws ntawd yuav nyob qhuav nkuag huv nplajteb hab puab tej nroog yuav puamtsuaj taag.
Thaus kws kuv tis suavtawg hlawv lub tebchaws Iziv, cov tuabneeg kws paab nwg yuav raug tua tuag taag huv tuabsi. Puab txhaj yuav paub has tas, kuv yog tug TSWV.
“Thaus txug nub ntawd cov Iziv yuav raug puamtsuaj taag. Kuv yuav tso ib paab tuabneeg caij nkoj moog hem cov tuabneeg Sudaas kws nyob tso sab lug kuas puab ntshai heev. Nub ntawd tub lug yuav txug.”
Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has tas, “Kuv yuav ca Vaajntxwv Nenpukajnexales kws kaav tebchaws Npanpiloos ua kuas tebchaws Iziv txujkev npluanuj pluj kag moog.
Nenpukajnexales hab nwg tsoom tubrog kws tsi taabncuab leejtwg yuav coj ntaaj tuaj tua tebchaws Iziv kuas puamtsuaj taag hab yuav muaj tuabneeg tuag nyob rua txhua qhov.
Kuv yuav ua kuas tug dlej Niles nqhuab hab muab lub tebchaws Iziv rua cov tuabneeg txawv tebchaws kws sab phem ua kuas puamtsuaj taag. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws has le ntawd.”

Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has tas, “Kuv yuav rhuav tej mlom hab tej vaajtswv cuav kws nyob huv lub nroog Meefis kuas puamtsuaj. Kuv yuav ua rua txhua tug ntshai, kuas tsi muaj ib tug twg kaam lug kaav lub tebchaws Iziv le.
Kuv yuav ua kuas tebchaws Iziv saab qaabteb nyob qhuav nkuag ca, hab tis suavtawg hlawv lub nroog Xau-as kws nyob saab qaumteb, hab kuv yuav rau txim rua lub tuamceeb nroog Thenpes.
Kuv txujkev chim yuav lug raug lub nroog Peluxi-oos kws yog cov Iziv lub nroog ruaj khov hab kuv yuav rhuav lub nroog Thenpes tej kev npluanuj.
Kuv yuav tis suavtawg hlawv lub tebchaws Iziv, ces lub nroog Peluxi-oos yuav raug kev txomnyem. Lub nroog Thenpes tej ntsaa yeej pob taag hab dlej yuav nyaab  lub nroog.
Cov tub hluas kws nyob huv lub nroog Heli-aupulis hab Npunpatis yuav raug luas tua tuag taag, dlua le cov yuav raug luas nteg moog.

Thaus kuv txu cov Iziv lub fwjchim hab puab txujkev khaavtheeb, kev tsaus ntuj yuav lug raug lub nroog Tapahes, fuab yuav lug roog lub tebchaws Iziv, ces cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv nwg tej nroog yuav raug luas nteg moog.
Thaus kuv rau txim rua lub tebchaws Iziv, puab txhaj yuav paub has tas kuv yog tug TSWV.”
Lub ib hlis ntuj nub xab xyaa, xyoo kaum ib kws peb raug nteg moog, tug TSWV has rua kuv tas:
“Tub noobneej, kuv tub ua rua Falaus kws yog cov Iziv tug vaajntxwv txhais npaab luv lawm. Tsi muaj leejtwg muab ntaub qhwv, khu kuas zoo, hab muaj zug rov tuav taug ntaaj.

Yog le ntawd, kuv kws yog tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has le nuav: ‘Kuv yog Falaus kws yog cov Iziv tug vaajntxwv tug yeebncuab, kuv yuav luv dlua nwg ib saab npaab kuas ob saab luv huv tuabsi, nwg txhaj tuav tsi tau ntaaj.
Kuv yuav ua kuas cov Iziv tawg moog nyob thoob nplajteb.

Kuv yuav ua rua tug vaajntxwv kws kaav tebchaws Npanpiloos ob txhais npaab muaj zug heev hab muab kuv raab ntaaj cob rua nwg. Tabsis kuv yuav muab Falaus kws ua vaajntxwv kaav cov Iziv ob txhais npaab luv, ces nwg yuav quaj hab tuag taabmeeg nwg tug yeebncuab.

Kuv yuav txu Falaus tug zug hab txhawb cov Npanpiloos tug vaajntxwv tug zug. Thaus kuv muab kuv raab ntaaj rua tug vaajntxwv kws kaav tebchaws Npanpiloos moog tua tebchaws Iziv, txhua tug txhaj yuav paub has tas, kuv yog tug TSWV.
Kuv yuav ua kuas cov Iziv tawg moog nyob thoob nplajteb. Puab txhaj yuav paub has tas, kuv yog tug TSWV.’ ”
Lub peb hlis ntuj nub xab ib, xyoo kaum ib kws peb raug nteg moog, tug TSWV has rua kuv tas:
“Tub noobneej, koj ca le has rua Falaus kws yog cov Iziv tug vaajntxwv hab nwg cov tuabneeg le nuav: Koj muaj zug heev! Kuv yuav muab koj pev rua dlaabtsi?
Koj zoo ib yaam le  tsob ntoo cab nyob peg Lenpanoos kws muaj nplooj hab ceg dlauv zoo nkauj, hab sab nto plawg sau cov fuab.
Muaj dlej yug tsob ntoo luj hlub, cov dlej huv aav yug tsob ntoo kuas sab. luas ywg dlej rua tsob ntoo ntawd lub hauvpaug, hab nwg cov dlej phwj moog rua txhua tsob ntoo huv thaaj zoov ntawd.
Vim muaj dlej txaus, tsob ntoo ntawd txhaj luj hab sab tshaaj lwm tsob, nwg ncau ceg ntau hab ntev.
Txhua yaam noog lug ua zeg rua ntawm nwg tej ceg; tej tsaj qus lug yug mivnyuas rua huv qaab tsob ntoo ntawd; Txhua tsaav tuabneeg thoob nplajteb tuaj nraim huv nwg tug dluab ntxoov ntxoo.
Tsob ntoo ntawd zoo nkauj kawg le, nwg sab hab tej ceg ntev heev. Nwg tej caag nrhau moog ti nkaus cov dlej huv nruab tivtxwv.

Huv Vaajtswv lub vaaj tsi muaj ib tsob ntoo cab kws pev tau tsob ntawd; tsi muaj ib tsob ntoo kws muaj ceg ntau pev tau tsob ntawd le. Huv Vaajtswv lub vaaj tsi muaj ib tsob ntoo zoo nkauj npaum le tsob ntawd.
Kuv ua rua tsob ntoo ntawd zoo nkauj hab ncau ceg ntau heev. Tsob ntoo ntawd ua rua tej ntoo huv Vaajtswv lub vaaj Edees khib kawg le.
“Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has rua koj tas: Vim tsob ntoo ntawd sab moog nto sau cov fuab,  nwg txhaj khaavtheeb.
Yog le ntawd kuv txhaj ca lwm tsaav tuabneeg ib tug nom tuaj kaav nwg. Tug nom ntawd yuav rau txim rua tsob ntoo ntawd lawv le nwg txujkev phem kev qas.

Cov tuabneeg txawv tebchaws kws tsi muaj kev taabncuab yuav tuaj ntuv tsob ntoo ntawd povtseg. Nwg tej ceg hab tej kaav yuav poob puv nkaus rua sau tej roob hab tej haav huv lub tebchaws ntawd. Txhua tsaav tuabneeg kws nyob huv tsob ntoo ntawd tug dluab ntxoov ntxoo yuav tsiv taag.
Tej noog yuav yaa lug tsaws rua sau tug caav ntoo hab tej tsaj qus yuav lug tsuj tej ceg.

Yog le ntawd, txij nuav moog yuav tsi muaj ib tsob ntoo sab moog nto sau cov fuab lawm. Txawm yog yuav ywg dlej ntau npaum le caag los yeej tsi sab le tsob ntawd. Tej ntawd puavleej yuav puamtsuaj ib yaam le tej tuabneeg nplajteb kws tub xub moog rua huv tubtuag teb lawm.”

Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has tas, “Thaus tsob ntoo moog rua huv tubtuag teb, kuv yuav ua kuas cov dlej huv nruab tivtxwv lug voob nkaus nwg. Kuv yuav sau tej dlej rov qaab kuas ntau tug dlej yuav tsi ndlwg. Rua qhov tsob ntoo ntawd tuag lawm, kuv yuav ca kev tsaus ntuj lug qhwv nkaus Lenpanoos tej roob hab ua kuas txhua tsob ntoo huv haav zoov qhuav taag.

Thaus kuv muab nwg pov rua huv tubtuag teb, txhua tsaav tuabneeg yuav nov lub suab nrov qeeg nkawg. Txhua tsob ntoo huv lub vaaj Edees hab txhua tsob ntoo sau Roob Lenpanoos kws raug xaiv hab tau dlej txaus kws tub moog rua huv tubtuag teb lawm yuav zoo sab vim tsob ntoo ntawd poob rua huv tubtuag teb lawm hab.
Puab yuav nrug nwg moog rua huv tubtuag teb nrug cov kws tub moog ua ntej lawm nyob ua ke. Cov kws nyob huv tsob ntoo ntawd tug dluab ntxoov ntxoo, yuav raug ntab moog nyob xyaw txhua tsaav tuabneeg.

“Tsob ntoo ntawd yog Falaus hab nwg cov pejxeem. Tsi muaj ib tsob ntoo huv lub vaaj Edees sab hab muaj fwjchim le tsob ntawd. Tabsis nwgnuav, nwg moog rua huv tubtuag teb hab nrug cov tuabneeg kws tsi ua kevcai txav raug tua tuag rua huv tshaav rog nyob ib yaam le cov ntoo huv lub vaaj Edees.” Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has le ntawd.
Lub kaum ob hlis ntuj nub xab ib, xyoo kaum ob kws peb raug nteg moog, tug TSWV has rua kuv tas:

“Tub noobneej, koj ca le has rua Falaus kws yog cov Iziv tug vaajntxwv le nuav: Koj has tas koj yog tug tsuv ntxhuav kws nyob xyaw txhua tsaav tuabneeg, tabsis koj zoo le tug naab qaa luj kws nyob huv paag dlej, koj ob txhais kutaw dlu ua rua lub paag dlej nru taag hab tej dlej tsi huv lawm.
Thaus muaj ntau tsaav tuabneeg tuaj sis sau ua ke, kuv yuav muab kuv lub vaag khwb nkaus koj hab ca puab hai koj moog rua tim ntug.
Kuv yuav muab koj pov rua huv aav, ca tej noog hab tej tsaj huv nplajteb tuaj noj koj.
Kuv yuav muab koj lub cev tuag kws lwj pov moog kuas puv txhua lub roob hab txhua lub haav.
Kuv yuav muab koj cov ntshaav laub kuas ndlwg moog puv txhua lub roob hab txhua tug dlej.
Thaus kuv ua rua koj puamtsuaj, kuv yuav ua kuas lub ntuj tsaus ndlais, tej nubqub, lub nub hab lub hli yuav tsi ci lawm.
Kuv yuav muab tej kws ci pum kev rua sau nruab ntug tshem tawm kuas lub nplajteb tsaus ntuj nti. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has le ntawd.
“Kuv yuav ua rua ntau tsaav tuabneeg raug kev nyuaj sab thaus kuv ntab koj moog nyob xyaw ntau tsaav tuabneeg huv tej tebchaws kws koj tsi tau paub dlua.

Tej kws kuv ua rua koj, yuav ua rua ntau tsaav tuabneeg yoob taag. Thaus kuv yoj kuv raab ntaaj, tej vaajntxwv yuav ntshai heev. Nub kws koj poob moog ntawd, puab txhua tug yuav ntshai heev hab txhawj txug puab txujsa.”
Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has rua cov Iziv tug vaajntxwv tas, “Koj yuav raug tug vaajntxwv kws kaav tebchaws Npanpiloos raab ntaaj tua xwb.
Kuv yuav ca lwm tsaav tuabneeg cov tubrog kws ua nruj ua tsiv nqaa ntaaj tuaj tua koj cov tuabneeg kuas tuag taag. Koj hab txhua yaam kws koj khaav yuav raug puamtsuaj taag.
Kuv yuav muab koj tej tsaj tua kuas tuag taag rua ntawm tej ntug paag dlej. Yuav tsi tshuav tuabneeg lossis tsaj lug ua kuas dlej nru lawm.
Kuv yuav ca koj tej dlej nyob tug yeeg hab ntshab si, hab ca koj tej dlej ndlwg ntsag tu. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has le ntawd.
Thaus kuv muab tebchaws Iziv ua kuas nyob qhuav nkuag ca hab tua cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv tuag taag lawm, puab txhaj yuav paub has tas, kuv yog tug TSWV.

Ntawm nuav yog zaaj nkauj quaj ntsuag kws luas yuav hu! Tej quaspuj huv txhua tsaav tuabneeg yuav hu zaaj nkauj quaj ntsuag rua Iziv hab nwg cov tuabneeg. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has le ntawd.”
Lub ib hlis ntuj nub kaum tsib,  xyoo kaum ob kws peb raug nteg moog, tug TSWV has rua kuv tas:
“Tub noobneej, koj ca le quaj ntsuag rua cov tuabneeg Iziv. Koj ca le xaa puab nrug lwm tsaav tuabneeg kws muaj fwjchim moog rua huv tubtuag teb.
Koj has rua puab tas: Mej xaav has tas, mej zoo nkauj tshaaj luas lwm tug nua los? Mej yuav tau moog rua huv tubtuag teb hab pw nrug cov tuabneeg kws tsi ua kevcai txav.
“Cov Iziv yuav tuag nrug cov tuabneeg kws raug tua rua huv tshaav rog. Tub npaaj raab ntaaj txhij lawm yuav tua puab txhua tug.

Cov thawj kws muaj fwjchim hab cov tuabneeg kws tuaj cov Iziv tog, puab zoo sab tog txais cov Iziv moog rua huv tubtuag teb. Puab qw has tas, ‘Cov tuabneeg tsi ua kevcai txav kws raug tua tuag rua huv tshaav rog lug pw ntawm nuav lawm!’
“Axilias cov tubrog tej ntxaa nyob puagncig nwg, puab yog cov kws raug nav ntaaj tuag rua huv tshaav rog.

Puab tej ntxaa nyob huv qhov kws tub tshaaj plawg huv tubtuag teb. Nwg cov tubrog puavleej tuag taag rua huv tshaav rog, hab puab tej ntxaa nyob puagncig nwg. Puab tau ua rua tej kws tseem nyob huv nplajteb ntshai kawg le.

“Elames cov tubrog tej ntxaa nyob puagncig nwg. Puab yog cov kws raug nav ntaaj tuag rua huv tshaav rog, hab puab moog rua huv tubtuag teb tsi taag ua kevcai txav le. Thaus tseem ua neej nyob, puab ua nruj ua tsiv, tabsis nwgnuav puab tuag xyaab leeg hab poob ntsejmuag kawg.

Elaas pw nrug cov tuabneeg kws raug nav ntaaj tuag rua huv tshaav rog, hab nwg cov tubrog tej ntxaa nyob puagncig nwg. Puab puavleej tsi tau ua kevcai txav hab yog raug tua tuag rua huv tshaav rog. Thaus tseem ua neej nyob puab ua nruj ua tsiv, tabsis nwgnuav puab tuag xyaab leeg hab poob ntsejmuag kawg, puab nrug cov tuabneeg kws raug tua tuag rua huv tshaav rog nyob ua ke.

“Mesekis hab Tunpas cov tubrog tej ntxaa nyob puagncig obtug. Puab yog cov kws raug nav ntaaj tuag rua huv tshaav rog, puab tsi tau ua kevcai txav le. Puab tau ua rua tej tuabneeg kws tseem ua neej nyob huv nplajteb ntshai kawg le.

Luas tsi fwm puab hab tsi coj puab moog log ib yaam le cov thawjcoj tam thaus u  kws muab puab tej cuabyeej ua rog nrug puab moog rua huv tubtuag teb, muab puab tej ntaaj tag puab taubhau, hab muab puab dlaim thaiv nav ntaaj  tso rua sau puab lub cev. Cov ntawd tau ua rua tej tuabneeg kws tseem ua neej nyob huv nplajteb ntshai kawg le.
“Qhov ntawd qha has tas, cov Iziv yuav raug tua hab pw nrug cov tuabneeg tsi ua kevcai txav kws raug nav ntaaj tuag rua huv tshaav rog.

“Edoos nrug nwg cov vaajntxwv hab nwg cov thawjcoj nyob huv hab. Puab muaj tubrog coob hab muaj fwjchim heev, tabsis nwgnuav puab nrug cov tuabneeg tsi ua kevcai txav kws raug nav ntaaj tuag rua huv tshaav rog pw ua ke huv tubtuag teb.

“Cov numtswv kws nyob saab qaumteb hab cov Xidauni-aas nyob ntawd hab. Yaav taag lug puab muaj fwjchim ua rua tuabneeg ntshai heev, tabsis nwgnuav puab nrug cov tuabneeg tsi ua kevcai txav kws raug nav ntaaj tuag rua huv tshaav rog poob ntsejmuag kawg moog rua huv tubtuag teb. Puab koom txujkev txaajmuag nrug cov tuabneeg kws moog rua huv tubtuag teb.
“Thaus Falaus pum puab tuag le ntawd, ua rua nwg zoo sab kawg, rua qhov Falaus hab nwg cov tubrog los raug nav ntaaj tuag rua huv tshaav rog hab”. Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has le ntawd.

“Falaus ua rua cov tuabneeg kws tseem ua neej nyob ntshai kawg, tabsis Falaus hab nwg cov tubrog nrug cov tuabneeg tsi ua kevcai txav kws raug nav ntaaj tuag rua huv tshaav rog pw ua ke huv tubtuag teb.” Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has le ntawd.
Tug TSWV has rua kuv tas:
“Tub noobneej, ca le has rua koj cov tuabneeg tas, thaus kuv coj kev tsuv kev rog tuaj rua huv lub tebchaws, yog cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub tebchaws xaiv puab ib tug ua tub faajxwm hab
thaus nwg pum muaj yeebncuab tuaj tawmtsaam lub tebchaws, nwg tshuab raaj tshuab xyu ceebtoom rua suavdlawg.
Yog leejtwg nov lub suab ceebtoom ntawd, tabsis nwg tsi quavntsej le, yog yeebncuab muab nwg tua tuag, ces nwg ris nwg lub txim xwb.
Nwg tuag vim nwg tsi quavntsej lub suab ceebtoom. Tabsis yog nwg ua lawv le lub suab ceebtoom, ces nwg yeej yuav tsiv dlim xwb.

Tabsis yog tug tub faajxwm pum yeebncuab tuaj, nwg tsi tshuab raaj tshuab xyu ceebtoom rua suavdlawg paub, yog yeebncuab tuaj tua cov tuabneeg txhum ib tug lawm, ces kuv yuav muab tug ntawd lub txim rua tug faajxwm ris.
“Tub noobneej, nwgnuav kuv yuav tsaa koj ua ib tug tub faajxwm rua cov Yixalayees. Koj yuavtsum qha kuv tej lug ceebtoom rua puab paub.
Yog kuv has rua ib tug tuabneeg txhum tas, tug tuabneeg txhum, koj yuav tuag. Tabsis koj tsi moog qha kuas nwg tso kev txhum tseg, nwg txhaj tsi tuag, ces kuv yuav muab nwg lub txim rua koj ris.
Yog koj tub qha rua tug tuabneeg txhum ntawd lawm, tabsis nwg tsi tso nwg txujkev txhum tseg, nwg yuav tuag rua nwg txujkev txhum, ces kuv yuav tsi muab nwg lub txim rua koj ris.”

Tug TSWV has rua kuv tas: “Tub noobneej, koj has rua cov Yixalayees has tas, mej pheej has tas, ‘Peb nyuaj sab rua peb tej kev txhum hab tej kev phem kev qas kws peb tau ua. Peb puamtsuaj lawm. Peb yuav ua le caag ua neej nyob?’

Koj has rua puab tas, kuv yog tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam, hab yog Vaajtswv tug kws muaj sa nyob. Kuv tsi xaav pum tug tuabneeg txhum tuag. Kuv xaav kuas nwg tso nwg txujkev txhum tseg hab muaj txujsa nyob xwb. Cov Yixalayees, mej ca le tso mej tej kev phem kev qas tseg. Vim le caag mej xaav tuag?

“Tub noobneej, nwgnuav koj ca le has rua cov Yixalayees has tas, yog muaj ib tug tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg moog ua txhum, tej kev ncaaj nceeg kws nwg ua taag lug yeej paab tsi tau nwg le! Yog muaj ib tug tuabneeg txhum tso nwg tej kev phem kev qas tseg, nwg yuav tsi raug txim. Tabsis yog ib tug tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg moog ua txhum, kuv yuav tsi zaam txim rua nwg le.

Txawm yog kuv has tas, kuv yuav muab txujsa rua tug tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg, tabsis yog nwg xaav has tas tej kev ncaaj nceeg kws nwg ua yaav taag lug paab tau nwg lawm, nwg ca le moog ua kev txhum, ces kuv yuav tsi suav nwg tej kev ncaaj nceeg yaav taag lug le. Nwg yuav tuag rua nwg tej kev txhum.
Yog kuv has rua ib tug tuabneeg txhum tas, koj yuav tuag. Tabsis yog nwg tso nwg tej kev txhum tseg, ua ncaaj nceeg hab ua zoo,
xws le: nwg thim tej khoom kws nwg nyag lug rov rua luas, nwg tso kev txhum tseg, hab ua lawv le txuj kevcai kws paab tau tuabneeg muaj txujsa, ces nwg yuav muaj sa nyob tsi tuag.
Kuv yuav zaam tej kev txhum kws nwg ua taag lug hab nwg yuav muaj sa nyob, rua qhov nwg rov lug ua ncaaj hab ua zoo lawm.
“Mej cov tuabneeg has tas, tej kws tug TSWV ua, nwg ua tsi ncaaj. Tsi yog le ntawd; tabsis puab yog cov kws ua tsi ncaaj ntaag!
Yog muaj ib tug tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg tso kev ua zoo tseg, hab moog ua kev phem kev qas, nwg yuav tuag rua nwg txujkev txhum.
Yog muaj ib tug tuabneeg txhum tso nwg tej kev txhum tseg, rov lug ua ncaaj hab ua zoo, nwg yuav muaj sa ua neej nyob.
Cov Yixalayees, mej has tas tej kws kuv ua, kuv ua tsi ncaaj. Yog le ntawd, kuv yuav txav txim rua mej lawv le teg num kws mej ua taag lug lawm ntaag.”
Lub kaum hlis ntuj nub xab ib, xyoo kaum ob kws peb raug nteg moog, muaj ib tug txivneej tsiv dlim huv lub nroog Yeluxalees tuaj qha rua kuv has tas, luas txeeb tau lub nroog Yeluxalees lawm.
Ua ntej mo kws tug txivneej ntawd tuaj cuag kuv, kuv tub xub nov tug TSWV lub fwjchim lug nyob ntawm kuv lawm. Taagkig tom qaab kws tug txivneej ntawd tuaj txug, tug TSWV ua rua kuv has tau lug.
Tug TSWV has rua kuv tas:

“Tub noobneej, cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv cov Yixalayees tej nroog kws pob puag taag lawm has tas: ‘Tsuas muaj Anplahaas tuab leeg xwb, Vaajtswv txhaj muab taagnrho lub tebchaws nuav rua nwg, tabsis nwgnuav peb muaj coob heev lawm, yog le ntawd lub tebchaws yog peb suavdlawg tug huv tuabsi.’

“Koj ca le has tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam tej lug rua puab le nuav: Mej noj tej nqaj kws txhaam ntshaav, pe mlom hab tua tuabneeg. Vim le caag mej tseem has tas, lub tebchaws nuav yog mej tug?
Mej tso sab rua mej tej ntaaj, mej ua kev phem kev qas hab mej ntxag luas tej quaspuj. Vim le caag mej tseem has tas, lub tebchaws nuav yog mej tug?

“Kuv yog tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam hab yog Vaajtswv tug kws muaj sa nyob, koj has rua puab tas, cov tuabneeg nyob huv tej nroog kws pob puag taag lawm yuav raug nav ntaaj tuag taag. Cov kws nyob tom taj suabpuam yuav raug tej tsaj qus tum. Cov kws tsiv moog nkaum rua peg tej roob hab huv tej qhov tsua, yuav raug kaab mob tuag taag.

Kuv yuav ua kuas lub tebchaws nuav nyob qhuav nkuag ca, hab puab tug zug kws ua rua puab khaavtheeb yuav pluj moog. Tej roob huv tebchaws Yixalayees los yuav nyob qhuav nkuag, tsi muaj leejtwg yuav taug kev hlaa le.
Thaus kuv rau txim rua cov tuabneeg vim puab tej kev txhum, hab ua rua lub tebchaws nyob qhuav nkuag ca, puab txhaj yuav paub has tas, kuv yog tug TSWV.”

Tug TSWV has tas: “Tub noobneej, thaus koj tsaav tuabneeg tuaj nyob ua ke rua ntawm tej ntsaa loog lossis ntawm puab tej qhovrooj sis thaam txug koj. Puab ib leeg has rua ib leeg tas, ‘Peb ca le moog noog saib tug TSWV has le caag rua peb?’.
Kuv tsaav tuabneeg sis sau tsheej paab tuaj noog tej lug kws koj has, tabsis puab tsi ua lawv le koj has. Puab lub ncauj laam has lug zoo xwb, puab tseem ua phem ua qas le qub.
Koj tsuas zoo le tug kws muaj lub suab zoo hu zaaj nkauj sis hlub hab txawj ntaus nkauj nogncaas rua puab noog xwb. Puab nov tej lug kws koj has, tabsis puab tsi ua lawv le ntawd.
Tej lug kws koj has tas yuav tshwm muaj, tej ntawd tub tshwm muaj lawm. Thaus ntawd puab txhaj yuav paub has tas, muaj ib tug cev Vaajtswv lug nrug puab nyob.”
Tug TSWV has rua kuv tas:

“Tub noobneej, koj ca le tshev cov Yixalayees cov thawjcoj. Koj has tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam tej lug rua puab le nuav: Mej cov kws yog Yixalayees cov tub yug yaaj raug puamtsuaj lawm lauj! Mej tsuas nrhav rua mej noj xwb, mej tsi pub hab tsi tu paab yaaj le.
Mej haus yaaj mig, naav tej tsoog tsho kws muab plaub yaaj ntus, hab tua tej mivnyuas yaaj kws rog rog noj, tabsis mej tsi pub hab tsi tu kuv paab yaaj le.

Mej tsi tu tug yaaj kws qaug quas zig, tsi khu tug kws muaj mob, tsi muab ntaub qhwv tug kws muaj qhov txhaab, tsi coj tug kws yuam kev rov lug, hab tsi moog nrhav tug kws pluj lawm. Tabsis mej quab yuam paab yaaj hab ua nruj ua tsiv rua puab.
Vim tsi muaj tug tub yug yaaj, cov yaaj txhaj tawg taag hab tej tsaj qus txhaj muab cov yaaj tum noj.
Yog le ntawd kuv paab yaaj txhaj moog moog lug lug sau tej laaj roob hab sau tej roob sab. Puab tawg moog nyob thoob nplajteb los tsi muaj leejtwg nrhav hab coj puab rov qaab lug.
“Mej cov kws yog tub yug yaaj, ca le noog tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam tej lug kws has rua mej le nuav:

Kuv yog Vaajtswv tug kws muaj sa nyob, mej ca le noog kuv has. Kuv paab yaaj raug tej tsaj qus tum, vim tsi muaj tug tub yug yaaj. Kuv cov tub yug yaaj tsi moog nrhav kuv cov yaaj, tabsis puab tsuas nrhav rua puab noj xwb. Puab tsi pub hab tsi tu kuv paab yaaj le.”
Cov tub yug yaaj, mej ca le noog kuv has!

Kuv kws yog tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has tas kuv yog mej tug yeebncuab. Kuv yuav txeeb kuv paab yaaj ntawm mej moog, tsi pub mej yug kuv paab yaaj; kuv yuav tsi pub kuas mej tau noj tau haus ntawm kuv paab yaaj. Kuv yuav cawm kuas kuv paab yaaj dlim tsi pub rua mej tua noj lawm.
“Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has tas: kuv yuav moog nrhav kuv cov yaaj hab tu puab kuas zoo,

ib yaam le tug tub yug yaaj moog nrhav nwg paab yaaj kws tawg ua saab ua sua lawm. Kuv yuav moog nrhav cov yaaj kws tawg ua saab ua sua lawm hab coj puab rov lug tsev. Kuv yuav cawm puab dlim ntawm kev tsaus ntuj hab kev txhawj ntshai.

Kuv yuav coj puab tawm huv lwm tsaav tuabneeg tej tebchaws lug, sau puab lug nyob ua ke hab yuav coj puab rov lug nyob huv puab lub tebchaws. Kuv yuav coj puab moog rua sau cov Yixalayees tej roob kws muaj dlej cag, hab ca puab noj tej zaub huv lub tebchaws kws muaj tuabneeg nyob.
Kuv yuav ca puab noj tej zaub mog, hab sau cov Yixalayees tej roob yuav yog puab tej tshaav zaub; puab yuav pw noj tej zaub mog kws nyob sau cov Yixalayees tej roob.
Kuv yuav ua tug yug kuv paab yaaj, hab nrhav chaw rua puab su. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has le ntawd.

“Kuv yuav moog nrhav cov yaaj kws pluj lawm, hab coj cov yuam kev rov lug, muab ntaub qhwv cov kws muaj qhov txhaab, khu cov kws muaj mob hab paab cov kws qaug quas zig, tabsis cov kws rog hab muaj zug, kuv yuav muab ua kuas puamtsuaj moog, rua qhov kuv yog tug yug yaaj kws ncaaj nceeg.
“Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has tas: Mej cov kws yog kuv paab yaaj, kuv yuav txav txim rua mej ib tug zuj zug, muab tug phem cais tawm ntawm tug zoo, hab cais cov yaaj tawm ntawm cov tshis.

Mej noj tej zaub kws zoo los tsi txaus mej sab, mej tseem muab kutaw tsuj tej zaub kws mej noj seem! Mej haus tej dlej kws ntshab los tsi txaus mej sab, mej tseem muab kutaw dlu tej dlej kws mej haus seem kuas nru!
Kuv cov yaaj yuav noj tej zaub kws mej muab kutaw tsuj hab haus tej dlej kws mej muab kutaw dlu kuas nru lawm xwb los?
“Yog le ntawd, kuv kws yog tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has rua mej tas, kuv yuav txav txim rua mej, tsi has cov yaaj rog hab cov yaaj ntxaug huv tuabsi.
Mej muab xubpwg thawb hab muab kub nrau cov yaaj kws qaug quas zig kuas puab tawg ri sua rua txhua qhov.
Tabsis kuv yuav cawm kuv paab yaaj kuas dlim ntawm txujkev puamtsuaj. Kuv yuav txav txim rua kuv paab yaaj ib tug zuj zug, muab tug zoo cais tawm ntawm tug phem.
Kuv yuav tsaa ib tug ua tug tub yug yaaj; tug ntawd yog kuv tug tubkhai Daviv. Nwg yuav pub zaub rua puab noj hab ua puab tug tub yug yaaj.
Kuv yog tug TSWV, kuv yuav ua puab tug Vaajtswv hab kuv tug tubkhai Daviv yuav ua puab tug vaajntxwv. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws has le ntawd.
Kuv yuav coglug pub kev thaajyeeb rua puab, hab lawv tej tsaj qus tawm huv puab lub tebchaws moog. Kuv paab yaaj yuav nyob hab pw huv haav zoov tso sab lug.
“Kuv yuav foom koob moov rua puab hab ca puab nyob puagncig kuv lub roob kws dlawbhuv.  Kuv yuav tso naag lug lawv caij lawv nyoog, tej naag ntawd yog koob moov kws kuv tso lug.

Tej ntoo yuav tawg paaj txi txiv, tej teb yuav zoo qoobloo hab txhua tug yuav tau nyob kaaj sab lug huv lub tebchaws ntawd. Thaus kuv luv puab tug quabtwg hab tso puab dlim ntawm txujkev ua luas qhev, puab txhaj yuav paub has tas, kuv yog tug TSWV.
Lwm tsaav tuabneeg yuav tsi tuaj fuab puab hab tej tsaj qus yuav tsi tum puab. Puab yuav nyob kaaj sab lug, tsi muaj leejtwg tuaj ua rua puab ntshai lawm.
Kuv yuav muab lub tebchaws kws aav zoo hab aav rog rua puab hab yuav tsi pub kuas muaj kev tshaib nqhes nyob huv puab lub tebchaws. Lwm tsaav tuabneeg yuav tsi txobthuam puab ntxiv lawm.
Txhua tug yuav paub has tas, kuv yeej tsomkwm cov Yixalayees kws yog kuv tsaav tuabneeg. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has le ntawd.
“Mej yog kuv paab yaaj, yog paab yaaj kws kuv yug zoo, mej yog kuv cov tuabneeg, hab kuv yog mej tug Vaajtswv.” Tug Tswv kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has le ntawd.
Tug TSWV has rua kuv tas:
“Tub noobneej, koj ca le tshev lub tebchaws Edoos.”
Koj has tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam tej lug rua nwg le nuav: “Edoos cov roob, kuv yog koj tug yeebncuab! Kuv yuav muab koj ua kuas nyob qhuav nkuag ca.
Kuv yuav ua kuas koj tej nroog pob puag taag; hab ca lub tebchaws nyob qhuav nkuag, koj txhaj paub has tas, kuv yog tug TSWV.
“Koj ibtxwm yog cov Yixalayees tug yeebncuab, koj ua rua cov Yixalayees raug nav ntaaj tuag thaus kuv tso kev puamtsuaj lug raug puab hab thaus kuv rau txim zag kawg rua puab, vim puab tej kev txhum.

Yog le ntawd, kuv yog tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam hab yog Vaajtswv tug kws muaj sa nyob, kuv yuav npaaj kev tuag rua koj. Kev tuag yuav caum koj, koj yuav tsiv tsi dlim le. Koj txhum vim  koj tua tuabneeg.
Kuv yuav ua kuas lub tebchaws Edoos tej roob nyob qhuav nkuag ca, hab tua txhua tug kws taug kev hlaa lub tebchaws ntawd.
Kuv yuav ua kuas tuabneeg tuag puv nkaus sau tej roob, hab cov tuabneeg kws raug nav ntaaj tuag huv tshaav rog tej cev yuav puv nkaus sau tej laaj roob hab huv tej haav.
Kuv yuav ua kuas koj lub tebchaws nyob qhuav nkuag moog ibtxhis, hab yuav tsi muaj tuabneeg nyob huv koj tej nroog le lawm. Ces koj txhaj yuav paub has tas kuv yog tug TSWV.
“Txawm yog kuv yog tug TSWV kws yog puab tug Vaajtswv los koj tseem has tas, tsaav tuabneeg Yudas hab Yixalayees ob lub tebchaws puavleej yog koj le, koj yuav ua tug kaav puab.

Kuv yog TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam hab yog Vaajtswv tug kws muaj sa nyob, kuv yuav ua pauj koj tej kev chim, kev khib hab kev ntxub kuv tsaav tuabneeg rov rua koj. Puab txhaj yuav paub has tas, yog kuv rau txim rua koj, vim tej kws koj tau ua rua puab lawm.
Koj yuav paub has tas kuv yog tug TSWV kws nov koj tej lug txobthuam cov Yixalayees tej roob has tas, cov Yixalayees tej roob peb muab ua puamtsuaj taag hab nyob qhuav nkuag ca lawm.
Kuv tub nov mej tej lug khaavtheeb hab tej lug kws mej has tawmtsaam kuv lawm.”
Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has tas, “Kuv yuav ua kuas koj nyob qhuav nkuag ca, tuabneeg thoob nplajteb txhaj yuav zoo sab vim koj raug puamtsuaj

ib yaam le koj zoo sab thaus koj pum tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees raug rhuav nyob qhuav nkuag ca. Lub roob Xe-iles hab taagnrho tebchaws Edoos yuav nyob qhuav nkuag ca, puab txhua tug txhaj yuav paub has tas, kuv yog tug TSWV.”
Tug TSWV has tas, “Tub noobneej, koj ca le has rua Yixalayees tej roob kuas puab noog
tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam tej lug kws has le nuav: Mej cov yeebncuab has rua mej tas, ‘Tej roob kws nyob thaus u lug puavleej yog peb le!’

“Koj ca le tshev puab lawv le tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam tej lug kws has le nuav: Thaus cov tuabneeg nyob puagncig cov Yixalayees tuaj tua hab txeeb cov Yixalayees tej roob, puab txhua tug luag cov Yixalayees plig.

Cov Yixalayees tej roob, mej ca le noog tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam tej lug kws has rua tej roob, tej laaj roob, tej dlej, tej haav, tej chaw kws pob puag taag kws nyob qhuav nkuag ca hab tej nroog kws tuabneeg tsiv taag kws raug tej tebchaws nyob puagncig tsimtxom hab luag plig.

“Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has tas, vim kuv khib heev kuv txhaj tawmtsaam cov tuabneeg kws nyob puagncig cov Yixalayees, hab tawmtsaam cov Edoos kws muaj plhus ntxag tuaj txeeb kuv lub tebchaws hab kuv tej tshaav zaub ua puab tug lawm.

“Yog le ntawd koj ca le has rua lub tebchaws Yixalayees, has rua tej roob, tej laaj roob, tej dlej hab tej haav lawv le tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam tej lug kws has tas, ‘Kuv khib hab chim heev, vim kuv tsaav tuabneeg raug cov tuabneeg kws nyob puagncig puab thuam hab saib tsi taug.
Kuv yog tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam, kuv coglug has tas, lwm tsaav tuabneeg kws nyob puagncig koj yuav raug rhuav kuas poob ntsejmuag.
Tabsis tej ntoo sau cov Yixalayees tej roob yuav rov hlaav nplooj hab tawg paaj txi txiv rua cov Yixalayees kws yog kuv tsaav tuabneeg. Mej yuav tau rov lug nyob huv mej lub tebchaws sai sai.
Kuv tuaj mej tog, kuv yuav ua kuas mej rov tau laij mej tej teb hab cog mej tej qoobloo.
Kuv yuav ua kuas mej tsaav tuabneeg fuamvaam coob tuaj. Mej yuav rov lug nyob huv mej tej nroog hab yuav rov txhim khu tej kws pob puag taag lawm.

Kuv yuav ua kuas tuabneeg hab tsaj txhu fuamvaam coob. Mej yuav coob tshaaj yaav taag lug ntau npaug hab mej yuav muaj tubki coob. Kuv yuav ca mej nyob huv lub tebchaws ntawd ib yaam le mej nyob lug lawm, hab kuv yuav ua kuas mej vaammeej tshaaj yaav taag lug. Mej txhaj yuav paub has tas kuv yog tug TSWV.
Kuv yuav coj cov Yixalayees kws yog kuv tsaav tuabneeg rov lug nyob huv lub tebchaws. Lub tebchaws yuav yog mej tug, hab mej tej mivnyuas yuav tsi tshaib tsi nqhes lawm.’
“Kuv kws yog tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has le nuav: Tej tuabneeg hu koj has tas koj yog lub tebchaws noj tuabneeg hab has tas, nwg nyag nwg tej mivnyuas.
Tabsis txij nuav moog koj yuav tsi noj tuabneeg hab tsi nyag koj tej mivnyuas lawm. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has le ntawd.

Kuv yuav tsi pub koj lub tebchaws nov lwm tsaav tuabneeg tej lug txobthuam, koj yuav tsi tau ris txujkev txaajmuag. Hab koj yuav tsi nyag koj tsaav tuabneeg tej mivnyuas lawm.” Kuv yog tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has le ntawd.
Tug TSWV has rua kuv tas:

“Tub noobneej, thaus cov Yixalayees tseem nyob huv puab lub tebchaws, puab lub neej hab teg num ua rua lub tebchaws tsi huv lawm. Kuv saib puab teg num tsi huv ib yaam le tug quaspuj kws coj khaub dluag.
Vim puab tua tuabneeg hab pe mlom ua rua puab lub tebchaws tsi huv lawm. Kuv txhaj ca puab raug kuv txujkev chim kws luj kawg nkaus.
Kuv rau txim rua puab vim puab lub neej hab teg num tsi zoo, kuv txhaj ntab puab moog nyob rua lwm tebchaws lawm.

Txawm yog puab moog nyob lub tebchaws twg los puab ua rua luas txobthuam kuv lub npe kws dlawbhuv; rua qhov luas has tas, ‘Cov tuabneeg ntawd yog tug TSWV tsaav tuabneeg, tabsis puab raug ntab tawm huv tug TSWV lub tebchaws moog lawm.’
Kuv fwm kuv lub npe kws dlawbhuv, txhua qhov kws cov Yixalayees moog nyob, puab ua rua kuv poob ntsejmuag.

“Yog le ntawd, koj ca le has tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam tej lug rua cov Yixalayees le nuav: Yaam kws kuv yuav ua tsi yog saib rua sau cov Yixalayees, tabsis vim kuv lub npe dlawbhuv kws mej ua rua kuv poob ntsejmuag rua huv txhua lub tebchaws kws mej moog nyob.

Thaus kuv qha kuv lub npe kws dlawbhuv rua lwm tsaav tuabneeg, yog lub npe kws mej ua rua kuv poob ntsejmuag taabmeeg puab, puab txhaj yuav paub has tas kuv yog tug TSWV. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has le ntawd. Kuv khaiv mej moog qha rua ntau tsaav tuabneeg paub has tas, kuv yog Vaajtswv tug kws dlawbhuv.
Kuv yuav tso mej tawm huv txhua tsaav tuabneeg tej tebchaws hab coj mej rov lug nyob huv mej lub tebchaws.
Kuv yuav muab dlej nchus rua mej hab ntxuav kuas mej huv ntawm mej tej mlom hab txhua yaam kws ua rua mej tsi huv lawm.
Kuv yuav muab lub sab tshab hab txujkev xaav tshab rua mej. Kuv yuav muab mej lub sab kws tawv le pobzeb povtseg, hab muab lub sab kws noog lug rua mej.
Kuv yuav pub kuv tug Ntsujplig rua mej, kuas mej coj tau lawv le kuv txuj kevcai hab ceev kuv tej lug saamfwm.
Mej yuav tau nyob huv lub tebchaws kws kuv muab rua mej cov yawmkoob lawm. Mej yuav yog kuv tsaav tuabneeg hab kuv yuav yog mej tug Vaajtswv.
Kuv yuav cawm kuas mej dlim ntawm txhua yaam kws ua rua mej tsi huv. Kuv yuav ua kuas muaj qoobloo nplua mag rua mej, mej txhaj yuav tsi tshaib tsi nqhes ntxiv lawm.
Kuv yuav ua kuas mej tej txiv ntoo txi txiv ncw hab ua rua mej tej teb ntsu qoobloo, mej txhaj yuav tsi tshaib tsi nqhes hab tsi poob ntsejmuag rua luas lwm tsaav tuabneeg.
Mej yuav ncu txug tej kev phem kev qas hab tej kws mej ua tsi zoo, mej yuav rov ntxub mej, vim tej kev txhum kws mej tau ua taag lug lawm.

Cov Yixalayees, kuv xaav kuas mej paub has tas, tej kws kuv ua nuav tsi yog saib rua sau mej. Tabsis yog kuv xaav kuas mej paub txaajmuag rua tej kws mej ua ntawd. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has le ntawd.”

Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has tas, “Thaus kuv ntxuav kuas mej huv ntawm mej tej kev txhum lawm, kuv yuav coj mej rov moog nyob huv mej tej nroog hab mej yuav rov txhim khu tej nroog kws pob puag taag lawm.
Txhua tug kws dlua kev moog lug hlaa mej lub tebchaws, puab pum has tas mej lub tebchaws nyob qhuav nkuag ca, tabsis nwgnuav kuv yuav ca mej rov lug cog qoobloo rua huv mej lub tebchaws.

Tej tuabneeg yuav sis thaam has tas, yaav taag lug lub tebchaws nuav nyob qhuav nkuag ca, tabsis nwgnuav rov zoo le lub Vaaj Edees lawm. Tej nroog kws pob puag taag hab nyob qhuav nkuag ca rov muaj vaaj tse khov kho hab tuabneeg nyob xauv npo le qub.

Lwm tsaav tuabneeg kws seem nyob puagncig koj txhaj yuav paub has tas kuv yog tug TSWV kws rov txhim khu tej nroog kws pob puag taag lawm hab rov cog qoobloo rua huv lub tebchaws kws nyob qhuav nkuag lawm. Kuv yog tug TSWV, kuv coglug has tas kuv yuav ua tej nuav, kuv yuav ua le ntawd tag.”
Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has tas, “Kuv yuav ca cov Yixalayees rov lug thov kuv paab puab dlua ib zag hab kuv yuav pub kuas puab fuamvaam coob ua npoj ntwg ib yaam le paab yaaj.

Tej nroog kws nwgnuav pob puag taag lawm, yuav rov muaj tuabneeg lug nyob puv nkaus ib yaam le lub nroog Yeluxalees kws yaav taag lug muaj yaaj nyob puv nkaus hab muab tua ua khoom fij rua nub kws ua kevcai. Ces puab txhaj yuav paub has tas, kuv yog tug TSWV.”
Tug TSWV lub fwjchim lug kaav hlo kuv, ces nwg tug Ntsujplig txawm coj kuv moog rua huv lub haav kws muaj pobtxhaa puv nkaus.
Tug TSWV coj kuv moog ncig thoob plawg lub haav ntawd, kuv pum muaj pobtxhaa nyob huv ntau kawg le, cov pobtxhaa ntawd qhuav taag lawm.
