Tug TSWV nug kuv has tas, “Tub noobneej, tej pobtxhaa nuav puas yuav caj sa taug lawm?” Kuv teb has tas, “Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam, tsuas yog koj tuab leeg txhaj paub xwb!”
Tug TSWV has rua kuv tas, “Koj ca le cev kuv tej lug rua cov pobtxhaa nuav. Koj has rua cov pobtxhaa qhuav nuav kuas ca le noog tug TSWV tej lug.
Koj has rua cov pobtxhaa nuav tas, tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has rua mej le nuav: Kuv yuav tshuab paa rua mej kuas mej caj sa.
Kuv yuav muab leeg, muab nqaj, muab tawv lug qhwv mej hab kuv yuav rau paa rua mej kuas mej rov caj sa. Mej txhaj yuav paub has tas, kuv yog tug TSWV.”

Kuv txhaj le cev tug TSWV tej lug rua cov pobtxhaa nuav lawv le tug TSWV has rua kuv; thaus kuv taabtom has, kuv txawm nov cov pobtxhaa ntawd lug sis dlhos nrov ndlij ndlawj ua ke nyob lawv le nyag chaw.
Thaus kuv tsaa qhovmuag saib, kuv pum muaj leeg muaj nqaj rua sau cov pobtxhaa hab muaj tawv hlaav lug qhwv cov nqaj, tabsis tsi tau muaj sa le.

Tug TSWV has rua kuv tas, “Tub noobneej, koj ca le cev kuv tej lug rua tej cua.  Koj has rua cov cua tas, tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has kuas cua ca le tuaj plaub ceg kaum ntuj tuaj tshuab paa rua cov cev tuag nuav kuas puab rov caj sa.”
Kuv txawm cev tug TSWV tej lug lawv le nwg has rua kuv. Ces paa txawm nkaag lug rua huv cov cev tuag ntawd, puab txawm caj sa hab sawv. Puab coob npaum nkaus le ib paab tubrog coob coob.
Tug TSWV has rua kuv tas, “Tub noobneej, cov Yixalayees zoo le cov pobtxhaa nuav ntaag. Puab has tas, puab qhuav taag lawm, puab tsi muaj kev ca sab rua yaav tom ntej le.

Koj ca le cev kuv tej lug rua kuv tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees has tas, kuv yog tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam, kuv yuav qheb puab tej qhov ntxaa. Kuv yuav rhu hab coj puab rov lug rua huv tebchaws Yixalayees.
Thaus kuv qheb puab tej qhov ntxaa hab rhu puab huv tej qhov ntxaa lug, puab txhaj yuav paub has tas kuv yog tug TSWV.

Kuv yuav muab kuv tug ntsujplig tso rua huv puab, mas puab yuav caj sa hab ca puab nyob huv puab lub tebchaws. Puab txhaj yuav paub has tas, kuv yog tug TSWV. Kuv yeej coglug tseg lawm has tas kuv yuav ua tej nuav, ces kuv yuav ua le ntawd. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws has le ntawd.”
Tug TSWV has rua kuv tas:

“Tub noobneej, koj ca le muab ib tug paas ntoo lug hab sau npe ntawv rua tug paas ntawd has tas, ‘Cov Yudas lub tebchaws.’ Hab koj muab dlua ib tug paas ntoo lug, sau dlua ib cov npe ntawv rua tug paas ntawd has tas, ‘Cov Yixalayees lub tebchaws.’
Ces koj muab ob tug paas ntawd ob tog tw lug sis twb ua ke ua ib tug.
Thaus koj cov tuabneeg nug koj has tas, qhov kws koj ua le ntawd yog txhais le caag,

ces koj teb rua puab has tas, tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam yuav muab tug paas ntoo kws pev txug cov Yixalayees lug tuav twb rua tug paas ntoo kws pev txug cov Yudas. Kuv yuav tuav ob tug paas nuav ua ib tug rua huv kuv txhais teg.
“Koj ca le muab ob tug paas ntawd tuav ua tuab tug rua huv koj txhais teg taabmeeg rua suavdlawg pum.
Koj has rua puab tas, tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has tas, kuv yuav coj kuv tsaav tuabneeg tawm huv lwm lub tebchaws kws puab moog nyob ntawd rov lug nyob rua huv puab lub tebchaws.

Kuv yuav muab puab ua ib tsaav tuabneeg nyob huv lub tebchaws ntawd, sau cov Yixalayees tej roob hab yuav muaj tuab tug vaajntxwv kaav puab. Puab yuav tsi ua ob tsaav tuabneeg nyob ob lub tebchaws lawm.

Puab yuav tsi pe tej mlom kws ua rua puab tsi huv lossis puab yuav tsi ua txhum ntxiv le lawm. Kuv yuav paab kuas puab dlim ntawm puab tej kev txhum hab kev ntxeev sab rua kuv. Kuv yuav ntxuav kuas puab huv; puab yuav yog kuv tsaav tuabneeg hab kuv yuav yog puab tug Vaajtswv.
Muaj ib tug zoo le kuv tug tubkhai Daviv yuav lug ua vaajntxwv kaav puab. Puab yuav koom tuab tug vaajntxwv, puab yuav muab sab npuab kuv hab ua lawv le kuv tej kevcai.

Puab yuav nyob huv lub tebchaws kws kuv muab rua kuv tug tubkhai Yakhauj, yog lub tebchaws kws puab cov yawmkoob ibtxwm nyob lug lawm. Puab tej mivnyuas, hab tej xeebntxwv yuav nyob huv lub tebchaws ntawd moog ibtxhis. Muaj ib tug zoo ib yaam le kuv tug tubkhai Daviv yuav lug ua vaajntxwv kaav puab moog ibtxhis le.

Kuv yuav coglug nrug puab sis raug zoo kuas puab nyob tso sab lug moog ibtxhis. Kuv yuav foom koob moov rua puab kuas puab fuamvaam coob, hab kuv yuav tsaa kuv lub Tuamtsev rua huv puab lub tebchaws moog ibtxhis.
Kuv yuav nrug puab nyob; kuv yuav yog puab tug Vaajtswv hab puab yuav yog kuv tsaav tuabneeg.
Thaus kuv tsaa kuv lub Tuamtsev rua puab, txhua tsaav tuabneeg yuav paub has tas, kuv yog tug TSWV kws xaiv cov Yixalayees lug ua kuv tsaav tuabneeg moog ibtxhis.”
Tug TSWV has rua kuv tas:
“Tub noobneej, koj ca le cev kuv tej lug tawmtsaam Nkos kws yog tug vaajntxwv kaav lub nroog Mesej hab Tunpas kws nyob huv tebchaws Mankos. Koj ca le cev kuv tej lug tshev Nkos
hab has rua nwg tas, tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has tas, kuv yog nwg tug yeebncuab.

Kuv yuav muab nwg tig rov qaab hab muab tej nuv chob nwg pobtxhaa puabtsaig, caab nwg, nwg cov tubrog, nwg cov neeg hab cov tubrog caij neeg rov qaab. Cov tubrog ntawd coob heev, puab coj cuabyeej ua rog: coj dlaim thaiv nav ntaaj, sa hlaab hab coj ntaaj.
Cov tubrog Pawxias, Sudaas hab Linpias nrug nwg tuaj. Cov tubrog ntawd puavleej muaj dlaim thaiv nav ntaaj hab muaj mom hlau.
Cov tubrog kws nyob huv Nkaumeles hab Npethes Taunkamas saab qaumteb hab muaj lwm tsaav tuabneeg tej tubrog coob heev nrug nwg tuaj.
Nkos hab cov tubrog kws nwg kaav ca le npaaj kuas txhij.

Ntau xyoo tom qaab, nwg yuav moog ntaus lub tebchaws kws cov tuabneeg kws nyavnyuas rov huv lwm tebchaws lug nyob, hab puab nyob tsi ntshai kev tsuv kev rog. Nwg yuav moog vij cov Yixalayees tej roob kws nyob qhuav nkuag tau ntau xyoo lug lawm. Tabsis nwgnuav puab nyob kaaj sab lug.
Nwg hab nwg cov tubrog nrug lwm tsaav tuabneeg cov tubrog moog ntaus rog ib yaam le naag xub naag cua hab ib yaam le tauv fuab lug roog lub tebchaws.”
Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has rua Nkos has tas: “Thaus txug lub sijhawm ntawd, koj yuav xaav hab npaaj ua phem.
Koj has tas, kuv yuav moog vij lub tebchaws kws tej zog tsi muaj ntsaa yeej thaiv; kuv yuav tua cov tuabneeg kws nyob tso sab lug. Puab tej zog tsi muaj ntsaa yeej hab tsi muaj roojvaag thaiv.

Koj yuav fuab cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv cov nroog kws yaav taag lug tub raug puamtsuaj ib zag lawm. Puab tawm huv lwm tebchaws rov lug sis sau ua ke, nwgnuav puab muaj tsaj txhu, muaj tebchaws hab nyob huv plawv nplajteb.

Cov tuabneeg Senpas, Dedaas hab cov tub laag tub luam kws nyob huv cov nroog huv tebchaws Xapees yuav tuaj nug koj has tas, ‘Koj tub txhij tau tubrog moog tua rog hab fuab khoom lawm los? Puas yog koj xaav tau nyaj tau kub, tsaj txhu hab khoom noj khoom haus nplua mag rov lug tsev?’ ”
Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has kuas kuv moog cev tug TSWV tej lug rua Nkos has tas, “Nwgnuav kuv tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees nyob tso sab lug, koj yuav sawv kev
ntawm koj qhov chaw kws nyob saab qaumteb, coj koj cov tubrog hab lwm tsaav tuabneeg cov tubrog kws coob heev tuaj. Cov tubrog ntawd txhua tug puavleej caij neeg.

Koj yuav tuaj tua kuv tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees ib yaam le naag xub naag cua lug thoob plawg lub tebchaws. Thaus txug lub sijhawm ntawd, kuv yuav kuas koj moog tua kuv lub tebchaws. Qhov kws kuv ca koj ua le ntawd, ua rua ntau tsaav tuabneeg paub has tas, kuv yog tug TSWV kws dlawbhuv.

Koj yog tug kws ntau xyoo dlhau lug kuv cov tubkhai kws yog Yixalayees cov cev Vaajtswv lug tau has txug, txug thaus ntawd kuv yuav coj koj tuaj tua cov Yixalayees.” Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has le ntawd.
Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has tas, “Nub kws Nkos tuaj tua cov Yixalayees, kuv yuav chim heev.
Thaus kuv chim hab npautawg, kuv txujkev chim yuav kub cuag suavtawg, nub ntawd aav yuav qeeg luj heev nyob huv cov Yixalayees lub tebchaws.

Tej ntseg, tej noog, tej tsaj luj tsaj miv hab txhua tug tuabneeg kws nyob huv nplajteb puavleej ntshai kuv tshee nyo. Tej roob sab yuav nphau, tej roob zeb roob tsuas yuav ua zug koog hab tej ntsaa yeej yuav pob taag.
Kuv yuav tso kev puamtsuaj lug ua rua Nkos ntshai heev.  Ces Nkos cov tubrog yuav rhu ntaaj rov sis tua. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has le ntawd.

Kuv yuav rau txim rua Nkos, kuas raug kaab mob hab muaj kev sis ntaus sis tua. Kuv yuav tso naag xub naag cua nrug lawg hab nplaim suavtawg leejfaaj lug rua nwg, nwg cov tubrog hab lwm tsaav tuabneeg cov tubrog.
Qhov kws kuv ua le ntawd, yog qha rua lwm tsaav tuabneeg paub has tas, kuv yog tug muaj fwjchim luj hab yog tug kws dlawbhuv. Puab txhaj paub has tas, kuv yog tug TSWV.”
Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has tas, “Tub noobneej, koj ca le cev kuv tej lug tawmtsaam Nkos kws yog vaajntxwv kaav lub nroog Mesej hab Tunpas has tas, kuv yog nwg tug yeebncuab.
Kuv yuav muab nwg tig moog rua lwm txujkev hab coj nwg dleb heev peg saab qaumteb tuaj kuas txug rua ntawm cov Yixalayees tej roob.
Kuv yuav ntaus nwg raab neevnti kuas poob ntawm nwg saab teg txhumphem hab ntaus nwg xibxub kuas poob ntawm nwg saab teg xis.
Nkos hab nwg cov tubrog hab lwm tsaav tuabneeg cov tubrog kws koom nrug nwg yuav tuag taag rua sau cov Yixalayees tej roob, kuv yuav ca noog hab tej tsaj qus lug noj puab tej cev tuag.
Puab yuav tuag taag rua tom tej taj nraag. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has le ntawd.
Kuv yuav tso suavtawg hlawv tebchaws Mankos hab cov nroog kws nyob lawv ntug dlej havtxwv kws tej tuabneeg nyob kaaj sab lug, puab txhaj yuav paub has tas, kuv yog tug TSWV.

Kuv yuav ua kuas kuv tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees paub kuv lub npe kws dlawbhuv, hab kuv yuav tsi ca kuv lub npe raug luas txobthuam ntxiv lawm. Txhua tsaav tuabneeg txhaj yuav paub has tas, kuv yog tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv kws dlawbhuv.”
Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has tas, “Nub kws kuv has tseg ntawd yeej yuav muaj tshwm lug xwb.
Cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv cov Yixalayees tej nroog yuav tawm moog khaws tej cuabyeej ua rog: tej thaiv nav ntaaj, tej neevnti, tej xub, tej muv hab tej qws lug ca ua tawg txaus rauv xyaa lub xyoos.

Puab yuav tsi tau moog txav tawg huv tej teb lossis tom tej haav zoov, rua qhov puab tau tej cuabyeej ua rog ntawd ua tawg rauv lawm. Cov Yixalayees yuav moog tua hab fuab cov tuabneeg kws tau tuaj tua hab fuab puab yaav taag lug lawm.” Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has le ntawd.

Tug TSWV has tas, “Nub ntawd kuv yuav muab cov Tuabneeg Taug Kev lub Haav huv tebchaws Yixalayees kws nyob saab nub tuaj ntawm ntug Havtxwv Tuag rua Nkos ua chaw log tuag.  Luas yuav muab Nkos hab nwg cov tubrog log rua huv lub haav ntawd. Ces luas yuav hu lub haav ntawd has tas, ‘Nkos Cov Tubrog Lub Haav.’
Cov Yixalayees log cov tuabneeg tuag ntawd xyaa lub hlis maam taag, ces lub tebchaws txhaj rov huv.

Cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv tebchaws sis paab muab cov tuabneeg tuag ntawd log, ces nub kws kuv muaj yeej, cov tuabneeg kws log cov tuag ntawd yuav tau koob meej. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has le ntawd.
Tom qaab xyaa lub hlis lawm, puab yuav xaiv ib cov txivneej moog ncig lub tebchaws nrhav cov tuabneeg tuag  kws seem hab muab log, lub tebchaws txhaj huv.

Thaus cov txivneej ntawd moog nrhav pum cov tuabneeg tuag tej pobtxhaa, ces puab rhais cim rua ntawm cov pobtxhaa ib saab, cov tuabneeg log tuag maam le coj cov pobtxhaa ntawd moog log rua huv Nkos cov tubrog lub haav.
(Luas yuav tis npe rua ib lub nroog nyob ntawd hu ua Hamaunas.) Ces lub tebchaws txhaj huv lawm.”

Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has rua kuv tas, “Tub noobneej, koj ca le hu tej noog hab tej tsaj qus kws nyob puagncig ntawd tuaj noj tej khoom fij kws kuv yuav muab rua puab noj. Muaj ib rooj noj haus luj nyob rua sau cov Yixalayees tej roob, puab yuav tuaj noj nqaj hab haus ntshaav.

Tej noog hab tej tsaj qus yuav tuaj noj cov tubrog tej nqaj hab haus cov numtswv kws kaav nplajteb tej ntshaav ib yaam le haus tej laug yaaj, tej mivnyuas yaaj, tej tshis hab tej txiv nyuj kws rog cov ntshaav huv tebchaws Npasaas.
Thaus kuv tua cov tuabneeg ntawd ib yaam le tua tsaj ua khoom fij, tej noog hab tej tsaj qus yuav noj tej roj ua rua puab dlhuav hab haus tej ntshaav ua rua puab qaug.
Tej noog hab tej tsaj qus yuav tau noj tej nqaj neeg, cov tubrog caij neeg, cov numtswv hab txhua tug tubrog kws nyob sau kuv lub rooj. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has le ntawd.”
Tug TSWV has tas, “Kuv yuav ua kuas txhua tsaav tuabneeg pum kuv tug tshwjchim kws ci ntsaa ab, thaus kws kuv txav txim rua txhua tsaav tuabneeg.
Txij thaus ntawd lug cov Yixalayees yuav paub has tas, kuv yog tug TSWV kws yog puab tug Vaajtswv.

Txhua tsaav tuabneeg yuav paub has tas, qhov kws cov Yixalayees raug nteg moog nyob rua lwm tebchaws, vim puab tau ua kev txhum tawmtsaam kuv. Kuv tso puab tseg, puab txhaj raug yeebncuab tej nav ntaaj tuag rua huv tshaav rog.
Kuv rau txim rua puab lawv le puab tej kev phem kev qas hab ua tsi huv, kuv txhaj tso puab tseg lawm.”

Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has tas, “Nwgnuav kuv yuav taabncuab Yakhauj cov xeebntxwv kws yog tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees hab ua kuas puab rov vaammeej dlua. Kuv yuav fwm kuv lub npe kws dlawbhuv.
Thaus puab rov lug nyob kaaj sab lug huv puab lub qub tebchaws, yuav tsi muaj leejtwg tuaj ua phem rua puab, puab yuav ncu tsi txug puab txujkev txaajmuag kws puab tau ntxeev sab rua kuv lawm.

Kuv yuav coj kuv tsaav tuabneeg kws raug ntab moog nyob rua lwm tsaav tuabneeg kws yog puab cov yeebncuab tej tebchaws rov qaab lug. Thaus ntawd txhua tsaav tuabneeg txhaj yuav paub has tas, kuv yog tug Vaajtswv kws dlawbhuv.

Kuv tsaav tuabneeg txhaj yuav paub has tas, kuv yog tug TSWV kws yog puab tug Vaajtswv. Puab yuav paub zaaj nuav zoo, rua qhov kuv ca puab raug luas nteg moog nyob rua lwm tebchaws, nwgnuav kuv coj puab rov lug nyob huv puab lub tebchaws, tsi tseg ib tug nyob rua lwm tebchaws le.
Kuv yuav pub kuv tug Ntsujplig rua kuv tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees, kuv yuav tsi tso puab tseg ib zag le lawm. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has le ntawd.”

Nub xab kaug, lub xyoo tshab kws yog xyoo neeg nkaum tsib kws peb raug nteg moog, hab tom qaab kaum plaub xyoos kws luas tuaj txeeb tau lub nroog Yeluxalees. Nub ntawd tug TSWV lub fwjchim lug kaav hlo kuv hab coj kuv moog.
Huv zaaj ywgtoog ntawd, Vaajtswv coj kuv moog tso rua sau ib lub roob sab huv Yixalayees lub tebchaws. Nyob ntawm kuv hauv ntej,  kuv pum ib koog tsev zoo le ib lub nroog nyob saab qaabteb.
Thaus nwg coj kuv moog ze lub nroog ntawd, kuv pum ib tug tuabneeg ci ib yaam le tooj dlaag. Nwg tuav rawv ib txuj hlua ntaub maag hab ib tug paas ntsuag sawv ntawm roojvaag.

Nwg has rua kuv tas, “Tub noobneej, koj ca le tsaa qhovmuag saib. Koj ua tuab zoo noog hab ncu tej lug kws kuv has rua koj. Kuv coj koj tuaj yog xaav qha tej nuav rua koj; koj ca le moog qha txhua yaam kws koj pum rua cov Yixalayees.”

Kuv pum ib tug ntsaa yeej kws xov puagncig lub Tuamtsev. Tug txivneej ntawd txawm muab nwg tug paas kws ntev rau tshim coj lug ntsuag tug ntsaa yeej, qhov tuab muaj rau tshim hab qhov sab muaj rau tshim.
Ces nwg moog rua ntawm lub roojvaag saab nubtuaj. Nwg nce ntaiv moog rua theem sau, nwg ntsuag lub roojvaag qhov tub muaj rau tshim.

Nyob ntawm lub roojvaag saab tom, muaj ib txujkev, txujkev ntawd ib saab twg muaj peb lub chaw faajxwm. Cov chaw ntawd ib chaav twg qhov dlaav muaj rau tshim, qhov ntev muaj rau tshim, hab tej phaab ntsaa kws quas cov chaw ntawd tuab tsib tshim. Muaj dlua ib txujkev nyob saab nrau ntev rau tshim, txujkev ntawd moog rua huv saab kws tig rua ntawm lub Tuamtsev.
Nwg moog ntsuag lub roojvaag kws yuav moog rua huv lub Tuamtsev, qhov tub muaj yim tshim hab qhov tuab muaj ob tshim. Saab roojvaag ntawd tig moog rua lub Tuamtsev.

(Txujkev kws moog rua huv lub Tuamtsev, ib saab twg muaj peb lub chaw faajxwm. Cov chaw faajxwm ntawd qhov dlaav hab qhov ntev ib yaam nkaus, hab tej saab phaab ntsaa kws quas cov chaw ntawd los tuab ib yaam nkaus.)
Tug txivneej ntawd ntsuag lub roojvaag qhov dlaav muaj kaum tshim hab qhov ntev muaj kaum peb tshim.
Saab phaab ntsaa ntawm hauv ntej cov chaw faajxwm, qhov sab muaj ib tshim hab qhov tuab muaj ib tshim. (Cov chaw ntawd txhua chaav puavleej dlaav rau tshim).
Nwg ntsuag cov chaw ntawd saab phaab ntsaa tom qaab  ib chaav rua ib chaav hlaa txujkev ntawd muaj neeg nkaum tsib tshim.
Nwg ntsuag chaav kws moog rua ntawm lub tshaav puam, qhov dlaav  muaj rau caum tshim.
Nwg ntsuag lub roojvaag saab phaab ntsaa nrau moog rua saab phaab ntsaa huv muaj tsib caug tshim.
Nyob ntawm tug ntsaa loog saab nrau muaj ib cov qhovrais qheb hab saab ntsaa loog huv luas txaug tej tsob dluab toovlaaj rua.

Tug txivneej ntawd coj kuv ntawm lub roojvaag moog rua huv lub tshaav puam. Nyob lawv tug ntsaa loog saab huv muaj peb caug chaav kws tig tuaj rua ntawm lub tshaav puam, hab saab nrau cov chaav ntawd luas muab pobzeb pua
puagncig lub tshaav puam. Lub tshaav puam saab nrau qeg dlua lub tshaav puam saab huv.
Nwg ntsuag lub roojvaag theem qeg saab huv moog rua ntawm lub roojvaag theem sab saab nrau muaj ib puas tshim.
Ces tug txivneej ntawd ntsuag ntawd lub roojvaag saab qaumteb moog rua ntawm lub tshaav puam kws nyob saab nrau.

Nwg ntsuag cov chaw faajxwm kws peb lub nyob rua ib saab kev, cov phaab ntsaa kws quas cov chaav hab txujkev kws nkaag saab nrau lug, dlaav hab tuab ib yaam nkaus le cov kws nyob ntawm lub roojvaag saab nubtuaj. Lub roojvaag qhov ntev muaj tsib caug tshim hab qhov dlaav muaj neeg nkaum tsib tshim.

Cov chaav, cov qhovrais hab cov dluab toovlaaj kws luas txaug rua ntawm cov phaab ntsaa zoo ib yaam le cov kws luas txaug rua ntawm lub roojvaag kws nyob saab nubtuaj hab. Muaj xyaa theem qeb ntai nce moog rua sau lub roojvaag kws nkaag moog rua huv lub tshaav puam.

Ncaaj ntawm lub roojvaag saab qaumteb lug muaj ib lub roojvaag moog rua lub tshaav puam saab huv, zoo ib yaam le lub roojvaag kws nyob saab nubtuaj. Tug txivneej ntawd ntsuag qhov dleb ntu nruab nraab ntawm ob lub roojvaag ntawd muaj ib puas tshim.

Tug txivneej ntawd coj kuv moog rua saab qaabteb, nyob nraag muaj ib lub roojvaag hab. Nwg ntsuag cov phaab ntsaa saab huv hab lub roojvaag dlaav hab tuab ib yaam le lub roojvaag saab qaumteb hab lub saab nubtuaj.
Lub roojvaag ntawd muaj qhovrais ib yaam le lwm lub roojvaag hab. Lub roojvaag ntawd qhov ntev muaj tsib caug tshim hab qhov dlaav muaj neeg nkaum tsib tshim.
Muaj xyaa theem qeb ntai nce moog rua sau lub roojvaag kws nkaag moog rua huv lub tshaav puam. Luas txaug tej tsob dluab toovlaaj rua ntawm ob saab phaab ntsaa huv lawv txujkev.
Tug txivneej ntawd ntsuag ntawm lub roojvaag saab qaabteb lug rua ntawm lub tshaav puam kws nyob saab huv, muaj ib puas tshim.

Tug txivneej ntawd coj kuv ntawm lub roojvaag saab qaabteb moog rua ntawm lub tshaav puam saab huv. Nwg ntsuag lub roojvaag ntawd txhua phaab, qhov ntev hab qhov dlaav ib yaam nkaus le lwm lub roojvaag hab.

Cov chaw faajxwm, cov roojvaag hab cov phaab ntsaa saab huv puavleej dlaav hab tuab ib yaam le lwm lub roojvaag hab, tej chaav ntawm lub roojvaag puavleej muaj qhovrais. Lub roojvaag qhov ntev muaj tsib caug tshim hab qhov dlaav muaj neeg nkaum tsib tshim.
Lub roojvaag kws tig rua ntawm lub tshaav puam saab nrau, muaj tej dluab toovlaaj kws luas txaug rua ntawm ob saab phaab ntsaa lawv txujkev. Muaj yim theem qeb ntai nce moog rua sau lub roojvaag.

Tug txivneej ntawd coj kuv ntawm lub roojvaag saab nub tuaj moog rua ntawm lub tshaav puam saab huv. Nwg ntsuag lub roojvaag ntawd txhua phaab, qhov ntev hab qhov dlaav ib yaam le lwm lub roojvaag hab.

Cov chaw faajxwm, cov roojvaag hab cov phaab ntsaa saab huv, qhov ntev hab qhov dlaav ib yaam le lwm lub roojvaag hab, tej chaav ntawd puavleej muaj qhovrais nyob puagncig. Lub roojvaag qhov ntev muaj tsib caug tshim hab qhov dlaav muaj neeg nkaum tsib tshim.
Lub roojvaag kws tig rua lub tshaav puam saab nrau, luas txaug tej dluab toovlaaj rua ob saab phaab ntsaa lawv txujkev. Muaj yim theem qeb ntai nce moog rua sau lub roojvaag.
Ces tug txivneej ntawd coj kuv moog rua ntawm lub roojvaag saab qaumteb. Nwg ntsuag lub roojvaag ntawd qhov ntev hab qhov dlaav ib yaam le lwm lub roojvaag hab.

Cov chaw faajxwm, tej dluab kws txaug rua ntawm tej phaab ntsaa saab huv, cov roojvaag hab tej qhovrais kws nyob puagncig cov chaav ntawd puavleej dlaav hab tuab ib yaam le lwm lub roojvaag hab. Lub roojvaag ntawd qhov ntev muaj tsib caug tshim hab qhov dlaav muaj neeg nkaum tsib tshim.
Lub roojvaag  kws tig rua ntawm lub tshaav puam saab huv. Muaj tej dluab toovlaaj kws luas txaug rua ntawm ob saab phaab ntsaa lawv txujkev. Muaj yim theem qeb ntai nce moog rua sau lub roojvaag.
Nyob ntawm lub tshaav puam saab nrau muaj ib chaav txuas nkaus lub roojvaag saab huv kws nyob saab qaumteb. Luas siv chaav ntawd ntxuav tej tsaj kws yuav coj moog hlawv ua khoom fij.

Chaav kws nyob ntawm lub roojvaag muaj plaub lub rooj, ib saab twg ob lub. Puab muab tej tsaj kws ua khoom fij coj lug tua rua sau plaub lub rooj ntawd, tsi has tej tsaj kws yuav muab hlawv theej txhoj lossis dlaws txim.
Nyob rua huv chaav saab nrau muaj plaub lub rooj zoo ib yaam le plaub lub kws nyob saab huv hab. Ib saab roojvaag txawb ob lub rooj saab peg.
Taagnrho yog muaj yim lub rooj kws coj tej tsaj ua khoom fij tuaj tua rua sau, plaub lub nyob rua saab huv hab plaub lub nyob rua saab nrau lub tshaav puam.

Plaub lub rooj kws nyob saab huv, yog siv tua cov tsaj kws hlawv ua khoom fij, cov rooj ntawd muab pobzeb txaug ua, qhov sab muaj ib tshim, qhov dlaav hab qhov ntev puavleej muaj ib tshim hab ib dlus. Tej cuabyeej kws puab siv tua tej tsaj ua khoom fij, puab muab ca rua sau cov rooj ntawd.
Muaj ib cov nqailauj ntev le tug ntivteg ntsa thoob plawg rua ntawm cov phaab ntsaa. Tej nqaj kws tua ua khoom fij, puab muab tso rua sau cov rooj ntawd.

Nwg coj kuv moog rua huv lub tshaav puam saab huv. Nyob huv muaj ob chaav, chaav kws nyob ntawm lub roojvaag saab qaumteb tig rua saab qaabteb, hab chaav kws nyob ntawm lub roojvaag saab qaabteb  tig rua saab qaumteb.
Tug txivneej ntawd has rua kuv tas, cov povthawj kws ua num huv lub Tuamtsev nyob huv chaav kws tig rua saab qaabteb,

hab cov povthawj kws hlawv tsaj fij rua sau lub thaaj, nyob huv chaav kws tig moog rua saab qaumteb. Cov povthawj ntawd yog Xadaus caajceg; puab puavleej yog xeem Levis hab yog cov kws muaj cai moog cuag tau tug TSWV.
Tug txivneej ntawd ntsuag lub tshaav puam saab huv, qhov dlaav hab qhov ntev muaj ib puas tshim ib yaam nkaus. Lub Tuamtsev nyob rua saab nubpoob hab lub thaaj nyob ntawm hauv ntej lub Tuamtsev.

Nwg coj kuv moog rua ntawm lub qhovrooj kws moog rua huv lub Tuamtsev. Nwg ntsuag lub qhovrooj ntawd, qhov sab muaj tsib tshim hab qhov dlaav muaj kaum plaub tshim  hab ob saab phaab ntsaa tuab peb tshim.
Cov qeb ntai kws nce moog rua sau lub qhovrooj, qhov ntev muaj neeg nkaum tshim hab qhov dlaav muaj kaum ob tshim.  Hab muaj ob tug ncej nyob ntawm ob saab qhovrooj.
Tom qaab ntawd tug txivneej tsua coj kuv moog rua chaav huv plawv kws yog Chaav Dlawbhuv. Nwg ntsuag cov ncej ib saab twg dlaav rau tshim

hab lub qhovrooj dlaav kaum tshim, ob saab phaab ntsaa ntawm lub qhovrooj ib saab twg tuab tsib tshim. Nwg ntsuag lub cheeb huv chaav ntawd, qhov ntev muaj plaub caug tshim hab qhov dlaav muaj neeg nkaum tshim.
Nwg moog rua chaav huv plawv hab ntsuag cov ncej ntawm lub qhovrooj muaj ob tshim, lub qhovrooj dlaav rau tshim, hab ob saab phaab ntsaa ib saab twg tuab xyaa tshim.

Nwg ntsuag chaav ntawd lub cheeb, qhov dlaav hab qhov ntev muaj neeg nkaum tshim ib yaam nkaus. Chaav nuav yog chaav kws nyob huv plawv. Nwg has rua kuv tas, “Chaav nuav yog Chaav kws Dlawbhuv kawg nkaus.”
Tug txivneej ntawd ntsuag lub Tuamtsev saab phaab ntsaa saab huv qhov tuab muaj rau tshim. Muaj tej chaav miv miv dlaav plaub tshim lawv lub Tuamtsev saab phaab ntsaa.

Cov chaav ntawd luas ua peb tshooj, ib tshooj twg muaj peb caug chaav. Cov phaab ntsaa kws xov txhua chaav ntawd, tshooj sau nyag dlua tshooj huv qaab, ua le ntawd lug txug tshooj kawg huv qaab, yog le ntawd cov phaab ntsaa txhaj txheem taug tshooj ntawd khov, tsi taag ntsa cov phaab ntsaa rua ntawm lub Tuamtsev le.

Yog tuaj saab nrau saib lub tuamtsev cov phaab ntsaa txij ndlua huv taw ntsaa moog nto rua sau tug nqaaj tsuag, tuab ib yaam nkaus. Muaj ob tug ntaiv lawv lub Tuamtsev saab phaab ntsaa nrau cov chaav moog rua sau, ib tshooj rua ib tshooj.

Cov chaav ntawm saab phaab ntsaa nrau tuab tsib tshim; lub Tuamtsev saab qaumteb muaj ib lub qhovrooj moog rua huv cov chaav ntawd hab saab qaabteb muaj ib lub qhovrooj moog rua huv cov chaav ntawd hab xwb. Kuv pum muaj ib theem puagncig lub Tuamtsev dlaav tsib tshim; theem ntawd sab ntawm npoo aav rua sau kwvyees rau tshim hab nyob nrug cov chaav kws lawv cov phaab ntsaa lub Tuamtsev sis txig. Ntu nruab nraab ntawd moog rua ntawm cov chaav kws cov povthawj nyob, dlaav neeg nkaum tsib tshim puagncig lub Tuamtsev.
Lub tsev nyob saab nubpoob kws tig tuaj rua ntawm lub Tuamtsev lub tshaav puam, qhov dlaav muaj xyaa caum tshim, qhov ntev muaj cuaj caum tshim hab cov phaab ntsaa tuab tsib tshim.
Tug txivneej ntawd ntsuag thoob plawg lub Tuamtsev saab nrau, qhov ntev muaj ib puas tshim. Hab saab tom qaab lub Tuamtsev moog rua ntawm lub tsev kws nyob saab nubpoob muaj ib puas tshim;
qhov dlaav ntawm hauv ntej lub Tuamtsev saab nubtuaj hab lub tshaav puam muaj ib puas tshim hab.
Nwg tsua ntsuag lub tsev qhov ntev moog rua saab nubpoob nrug ob tog hauvmum muaj ib puas tshim. Lub qhovrooj kws moog rua huv lub Tuamtsev, Chaav Dlawbhuv hab Chaav kws dlawbhuv kawg nkaus
puavleej yog muab txag ntoo xov huv taw ntsaa moog nto plawg rua sau cov qhovrais. Cov qhovrais puavleej muaj dlaim kaw.
Cov phaab ntsaa saab huv lub Tuamtsev, luas txaug dluab thoob plawg huv taw ntsaa moog rua sau txij nkaus cov qhovrooj,
yog txaug ua dluab toovlaaj hab dluab qhelunpees, ib tug quas ib tug thoob plawg saab phaab ntsaa. Ib tug qhelunpees twg muaj ob lub ntsejmuag:
Lub ntsejmuag tuabneeg tig rua saab kws muaj tsob toovlaaj, lub ntsejmuag tsuv ntxhuav tig dlua rua lwm saab kws muaj tsob toovlaaj, hab txaug le ntawd thoob plawg cov phaab ntsaa;
huv taw ntsaa moog txij nkaus cov qhovrooj.
Cov ncej qhovrooj ntawm Chaav Dlawbhuv ua plaub faab. Ntawm hauv ntej Chaav kws dlawbhuv kawg nkaus, muaj ib yaam zoo le

lub thaaj kws muab ntoo txua, qhov sab muaj peb tshim, hab qhov dlaav muaj ob tshim. Cov ceg, tug taab  hab cov thaiv puavleej yog ntoo. Tug txivneej ntawd has rua kuv tas, “Lub rooj nuav yog lub kws txawb rua ntawm Tug TSWV xubndlag.”
Muaj dlua ib lub qhovrooj moog rua ntawm Chaav Dlawbhuv hab muaj ib lub moog rua huv Chaav kws dlawbhuv kawg nkaus.
Ob lub qhovrooj ntawd puavleej muaj ob dlaim txag qhovrooj kws qheb tau rua ob saab.

Luas txaug tej dluab toovlaaj hab tej dluab qhelunpees rua cov txag qhovrooj ntawm Chaav Dlawbhuv, ib yaam le cov kws luas txaug rua ntawm tej phaab ntsaa. Hab luas muab ntoo lug ntsa ua lub qhovrooj saab nrau.
Chaav ntawd ob saab phaab ntsaa puavleej muaj qhovrais hab luas txaug tej dluab toovlaaj rua ntawm cov phaab ntsaa.

Tug txivneej ntawd coj kuv moog rua ntawm lub tshaav puam saab nrau hab coj kuv moog rua huv lub tsev kws nyob saab qaumteb ntawm lub Tuamtsev. Lub tsev ntawd nyob tsi dleb lub tsev kws nyob rua saab nubpoob ntawm lub Tuamtsev.
Lub tsev nuav qhov ntev muaj ib puas tshim hab qhov dlaav muaj tsib caug tshim.

Saab kws tig rua ntawm lub Tuamtsev, qhov dlaav ntawm lub tsev ntawd moog rua ntawm lub Tuamtsev muaj neeg nkaum tshim, hab ib saab tig rua ntawm lub tshaav puam saab nrau kws luas muab pobzeb pua lawm. Lub tsev ntawd ua peb tshooj, ib tshooj txuas ib tshooj.
Lub tsev nuav saab qaumteb muaj ib txujkev tshaab plawg huv, dlaav kaum tshim hab ntev ib puas tshim,  hab muaj qhovrooj moog rua huv tej chaav.
Cov chaav kws nyob tshooj kawg sau, nqaim dlua cov chaav kws nyob tshooj nruab nraab hab tshooj huv qaab kawg, rua qhov tshooj sau luas tseg qaab khaav dlaav dlua.
Cov chaav ntawm peb tshooj ntawd puavleej ua sis txuas, yog le ntawd, txhaj tsi muaj ncej txheem ib yaam le cov tsev kws nyob rua huv lub tshaav puam.

Lub tsev ntawd tshooj huv qaab saab phaab ntsaa nrau, tog kws muaj cov chaav ntev tsib caug tshim hab tog kws tsi muaj cov chaav los ntev tsib caug tshim hab. Tshooj kawg sau luas kem ua tej chaav thoob plawg lub tsev ntawd.

Cov chaav tshooj huv qaab saab phaab ntsaa  tom kawg lub tsev saab nubtuaj muaj ib txujkev moog rua lub tshaav puam saab nrau. Saab qaabteb  ntawm lub Tuamtsev muaj ib lub tsev nyob tsi dleb lub tsev kws nyob rua saab nubpoob ntawm lub Tuamtsev.

Muaj ib txujkev tshaab plawg huv lub tsev ntawd ib yaam le lub peg saab qaumteb hab. Txujkev ntawd qhov dlaav hab qhov ntev los zoo ib yaam hab puavleej muaj qhovrooj moog rua huv tej chaav ib yaam nkaus.
Huv qaab cov chaav ntawm lub tsev saab qaabteb muaj ib lub qhovrooj nyob ntawm saab phaab ntsaa saab nubtuaj lug xaus.

Tug txivneej ntawd has rua kuv tas, “Ob lub tsev nuav puavleej dlawbhuv, cov povthawj kws moog cuag tug TSWV nqaa tej khoom fij dlawbhuv lug noj rua huv ob lub tsev nuav. Rua qhov cov chaav ntawd dlawbhuv, cov povthawj txhaj coj tej khoom fij kws dlawbhuv lug tso rua huv: tej qoobloo, tej tsaj theej txhoj dlaws txim lossis ntxuav kev txhum.

Thaus cov povthawj moog rua huv lub Tuamtsev lawm, yog puab yuav tawm moog rua saab nrau lub tshaav puam, puab yuavtsum muab tej tsho dlawbhuv kws puab naav pehawm tug TSWV hle ca hab hloov dlua khaub dluag, maam le tawm moog rua saab nrau kws muaj tuabneeg.”
Thaus tug txivneej ntawd ntsuag lub Tuamtsev saab huv taag lawm, nwg coj kuv ntawm lub roojvaag saab nubtuaj moog rua saab nrau hab ntsuag puagncig lub Tuamtsev saab nrau.
Nwg nqaa tug paas ntsuag moog ntsuag saab nubtuaj ntawm lub Tuamtsev, muaj tsib puas tshim.
Ces nwg tsua moog ntsuag saab qaumteb, saab qaabteb hab saab nubpoob, txhua phaab puavleej muaj tsib puas tshim ib yaam nkaus,
plaub phaab ntsaa loog ntawd, ib phaab twg ntev tsib puas tshim. Tug ntsaa loog quas qhov kws dlawbhuv hab qhov kws tsi dlawbhuv.
Tug txivneej ntawd coj kuv moog rua ntawm lub roojvaag kws tig moog rua saab nubtuaj,

kuv pum cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv tug tshwjchim ci ntsaa ab saab nubtuaj tuaj. Vaajtswv lub suab nrov nroo ntwg ib yaam le dlej havtxwv ndlaas, ces Vaajtswv tug tshwjchim ci ntsaa ab rua lub nplajteb.

Zaaj ywgtoog nuav zoo ib yaam le zaaj kws kuv pum thaus Vaajtswv rhuav lub nroog Yeluxalees, hab zaaj kws kuv pum nyob ntawm ntug Dlej Khenpales. Ces kuv ca le txhus caug ndlua hab nyo ntshis rua huv aav.
Tug TSWV tug tshwjchim lug ntawm lub roojvaag saab nubtuaj moog rua huv lub Tuamtsev.
Tug TSWV tug Ntsujplig lug kaav hlo kuv hab coj kuv moog rua ntawm lub tshaav puam saab huv, kuv pum tug TSWV tug tshwjchim ci ntsaa ab thoob plawg lub Tuamtsev.
Tug txivneej ntawd sawv ntawm kuv ib saab, ces kuv nov tug TSWV has lug huv lub Tuamtsev tuaj rua kuv tas,

“Tub noobneej, ntawm nuav yog kuv lub zwmtxwv. Kuv yuav nrug cov Yixalayees nyob hab kaav puab moog ibtxhis le, tsi has cov Yixalayees lossis puab cov vaajntxwv yuav tsi moog pe lwm tsaav tuabneeg tej vaajtswv hab tsi nyob ze puab tej vaajntxwv tej cev tuag,  ua rua kuv lub npe Dlawbhuv raug txobthuam;

Cov vaajntxwv ntawd ua puab lub loog, tej qhovrooj, tej paws rooj hab tej ncej qhovrooj, ncaaj kuv lub Tuamtsev tej paws rooj hab tej ncej qhovrooj, tsuas yog muaj tuab saab phaab ntsaa quas puab hab kuv nkaus xwb. Puab ua rua kuv lub npe kws Dlawbhuv raug txobthuam; vim tej kev phem kev qas kws puab ua; kuv chim, kuv txhaj ua rua puab puamtsuaj taag.

Txij nuav moog puab yuavtsum tseg tsi xob pe lwm tsaav tuabneeg tej vaajtswv hab tshem puab cov vaajntxwv tej cev tuag  kuas dleb ntawm kuv. Yog puab ua le ntawd, kuv yuav nrug puab nyob moog ibtxhis.”
Tug TSWV has rua kuv tas, “Tub noobneej, koj ca le qha tug qauv ua lub Tuamtsev nuav rua cov Yixalayees, kuas puab txaajmuag rua tej kev txhum kws puab tau ua lawm.

Yog puab paub txaajmuag rua tej kws puab tau ua taag lug lawm, koj maam le qha tug qauv kws ua lub Tuamtsev rua puab paub: dlaim dluab tsev, txujkev lug hab txujkev tawm, lub cheeb tsev, txhua yaam kws ua lub Tuamtsev, tej kevcai hab kev tswjfwm huv tuabsi. Koj ca le sau txhua yaam nuav qha rua puab kuas paub has tas yuav ua le caag txhaj npaaj tau hab ua tau lawv le tug qauv hab tej kevcai.
Ntawm nuav yog lub Tuamtsev txuj kevcai: puagncig lub Tuamtsev moog rua sau tej pov roob, puavleej yog qhov chaw dlawbhuv.”

Ntawm nuav yog ntsuag lub thaaj, yog siv tuab tug paas kws ntsuag lub Tuamtsev. Lub thaaj ntawd tug taw puagncig sab ib tshim hab dlaav ib tshim, hab puab ib dlaim ua tug ntug lawv tug taw sab ib dlus.
Txij ntawm tug taw huv aav moog rua sau ntu miv, sab ob tshim, dlaav ib tshim; txij ntawm ntu miv moog rua sau ntu luj, sab plaub tshim hab dlaav ib tshim.
Lub thaaj theem kawg sau sab plaub tshim, lub ncauj nthuav hab muaj plaub tug kub nyob ntawm plaub ceg kaum.
Lub thaaj ua plaub faab, ib faab twg muaj kaum ob tshim.
Lub npoo thaaj qhov luj nthuav ua plaub faab, ib faab twg muaj kaum plaub tshim hab tug puab npoo dlaav ib dlus, (tug npoo thaaj dlaav ib tshim,) tug ntaiv nyob rua saab nubtuaj.

Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has rua kuv tas, “Tub noobneej, koj ca le noog tej lug kws kuv has. Thaus ua tau lub thaaj lawm, koj ca le tua tsaj hlawv fij rua sau hab muab cov ntshaav nchus rua sau ua kevcai fij lub thaaj.

Cov povthawj xeem Levis kws yog Xadaus caajceg txhaj yog cov kws tuaj cuag tau kuv hab fij khoom rua kuv. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has le ntawd. Koj muab ib tug ntsuag nyuj rua puab tua fij dlaws txim.
Koj muab ib cov ntshaav moog nchus rua plaub tug kub sau plaub ceg kaum thaaj hab thoob plawg lub npoo thaaj. Qhov kws koj ua le nuav, yog ua kevcai ntxuav kuas lub thaaj dlawbhuv.
Koj muab tug nyuj kws tua fij dlaws txim coj moog hlawv fij rua ntawm lub Tuamtsev saab nrau.

Nub tom qaab koj muab ib tug laug tshis kws tsi muaj ib qhov phem le coj lug tua fij dlaws txim hab koj muab cov ntshaav nchus rua sau lub thaaj ua kevcai ntxuav ib yaam le koj muab cov ntshaav nyuj ua lawm.
Thaus kws koj ua kevcai ntxuav le ntawd taag lawm, koj muab ib tug ntsuag nyuj hab ib tug thaav yaaj kws tsi muaj ib qhov phem le
coj lug rua kuv. Cov povthawj yuav muab ntsev nphoo rua ob tug tsaj ntawd hab muab tua hlawv fij rua kuv.
Xyaa nub ntawd, ib nub twg koj yuavtsum muab ib tug thaav tshis, ib tug ntsuag nyuj hab ib tug thaav yaaj kws tsi muaj ib qhov phem le lug tua ua khoom fij dlaws txim kuas txwm xyaa nub.
Xyaa nub ntawd cov povthawj ua kevcai ntxuav lub thaaj kuas tav.

Thaus dlhau xyaa nub ntawd lawm, nub yim, cov povthawj txawm pib fij khoom rua sau lub thaaj, hlawv khoom theej txhoj hab fij khoom ua kev sis raug zoo. Ces kuv yuav txaus sab rua mej suavdlawg. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has le ntawd.”
Tug txivneej ntawd coj kuv moog rua ntawm lub roojvaag saab nrau kws nyob ntawm lub Tuamtsev saab nubtuaj. Lub roojvaag ntawd luas muab kaw lawm,

hab tug TSWV has rua kuv tas, “Lub roojvaag nuav yuav kaw hab tsi qheb. Tsi pub leejtwg qheb hab moog lub roojvaag nuav le, rua qhov tug TSWV kws yog cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv tau moog lub roojvaag nuav lawm. Lub roojvaag nuav yuav kaw moog le.
Tsuas yog tug vaajntxwv txhaj moog tau qhov ntawd hab noj tau tej zaub mov dlawbhuv ntawm kuv lub rooj. Nwg lug hab tawm ntawm lub roojvaag nuav moog xwb.”

Ces tug txivneej ntawd coj kuv ntawm lub roojvaag saab qaumteb moog rua ntawm hauv ntej lub Tuamtsev. Thaus kuv tsaa qhovmuag saib, kuv pum tug TSWV tug tshwjchim ci ntsaa ab thoob plawg tug TSWV lub Tuamtsev. Kuv txhus caug ndlua hab nyo taubhau ti nkaus huv aav,

tug TSWV has rua kuv tas, “Tub noobneej, koj ua tuab zoo noog tej kws koj nov hab ua tuab zoo saib tej kws koj pum. Kuv yuav qha tej kevcai siv lub Tuamtsev rua koj. Koj ncu ntsoov has tas, leejtwg txhaj moog tau rua huv lub Tuamtsev hab tawm rov lug, hab leejtwg moog tsi tau rua huv lub Tuamtsev.
“Koj ca le has rua cov Yixalayees kws yog tuabneeg ntxeev sab has tas, kuv yog tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam, kuv yuav tsi ca mej ua kev phem kev qas ntxiv lawm.

Puab tau ua tsi huv rua kuv lub Tuamtsev, vim puab ca cov tuabneeg txawv tebchaws kws tsi ua kevcai txav hab tsi noog kuv lug, moog rua huv kuv lub Tuamtsev thaus mej taabtom muab tej roj hab tej ntshaav tsaj fij rua kuv. Kuv tsaav tuabneeg tau rhuav qhov kws kuv nrug puab sis coglug lawm, vim tej kev phem kev qas kws puab tau ua taag lug.
Puab tsi ua cov saib hab tu tej khoom dlawbhuv huv kuv lub Tuamtsev, puab ca cov tuabneeg txawv tebchaws ua teg num ntawd.

“Kuv yog tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has tas, tsi pub ib tug tuabneeg txawv tebchaws kws tsi tau ua kevcai txav hab tsi noog kuv tej lug, moog rua huv kuv lub Tuamtsev. Txawm yog cov tuabneeg txawv tebchaws kws ibtxwm nrug cov Yixalayees nyob los tsi pub moog rua huv le.”
Tug TSWV has rua kuv tas: “Kuv yuav rau txim rua cov Levis kws nrug cov Yixalayees yuam kev ua txhum, tso kuv tseg hab moog pe mlom lawm.
Tsimnyog puab ua kuv teg num huv kuv lub Tuamtsev, zuv tej roojvaag, tu lub Tuamtsev, tua tej tsaj kws cov tuabneeg coj tuaj tua hlawv ua khoom fij theej txhoj, hab paab tej tuabneeg suavdlawg.

Tabsis vim puab coj cov Yixalayees moog pe mlom, qhov kws puab ua le ntawd, txhaj ua rua cov Yixalayees poob rua txujkev txhum. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam, kuv coglug has tas, kuv yuav rau txim rua puab.
Tsi pub puab ua cov povthawj kws ua kuv teg num lossis moog ze tej khoom dlawbhuv lossis moog rua huv Chaav kws dlawbhuv kawg nkaus. Vim puab ua kev phem kev qas, kuv txhaj rau txim rua puab.
Kuv yuav tsaa puab ua cov zuv lub Tuamtsev, cov hu nkauj hab saib lwm yaam num huv lub Tuamtsev.”

Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has tas, “Thaus cov Yixalayees tso kuv tseg, cov povthawj xeem Levis kws yog Xadaus caajceg, tseem muab sab npuab kuv hab ua kuv teg num huv kuv lub Tuamtsev. Nwgnuav puab txhaj yog cov kws lug cuag tau kuv hab ua kuv teg num kws yog muab roj hab ntshaav tsaj fij rua kuv.
Puab cov ntawd txhaj le moog tau rua huv kuv lub Tuamtsev, fij khoom rua sau lub thaaj hab ua cov coj kev pehawm Vaajtswv huv lub Tuamtsev.

Thaus puab lug ntawm lub roojvaag lug rua huv chaav kws nyob huv lub Tuamtsev, puab yuavtsum naav tej tsoog tsho ntaub maag. Tsi xob naav tej tsoog tsho ntaub plaub yaaj, thaus puab lug ua num chaav huv lossis huv lub Tuamtsev.
Puab naav rig ntaub maag tuab lu, hab muab ib pluaj ntaub maag paav taubhau, tabsis tsi xob naav tej yaam kws ua rua puab nto fws.

Ua ntej puab tawm moog rua ntawm lub tshaav puam saab nrau kws cov tuabneeg nyob, puab yuavtsum hloov cov khaub dluag kws puab naav ua num ca rua huv cov chaav kws Dlawbhuv tsaiv, puab maam le naav tej khaub dluag kws puab ibtxwm naav, txhaj tsi ua rua tej tuabneeg raug mob.
“Tsi pub cov povthawj chais puab tej plaubhau kuas dlu lug lossis tseg puab tej plaubhau kuas ntev dlhau, tabsis yuavtsum txav kuas zoo saib.
Tsi pub cov povthawj haus cawv txiv maab ua ntej puab moog rua chaav kws nyob saab huv.
Tsi pub cov povthawj yuav puj nrauj, tsuas pub yuav tug nkaujxwb kws yog tuabneeg Yixalayees lossis tug puj ntsuag kws tug quasyawg yog povthawj xwb.
“Cov povthawj yuavtsum qha kuas kuv tsaav tuabneeg paub yaam kws dlawbhuv hab yaam kws tsi dlawbhuv, hab kuas paub yaam huv hab yaam kws tsi huv.
Thaus muaj plaub ntug, cov povthawj yog cov txav txim lawv le kuv tej kevcai. Puab yuav ceev tej rooj noj rooj haus lawv le kuv tej kevcai, kev tswjfwm hab ceev nub Xanpataus ua nub tseemceeb.

“Tsi pub cov povthawj moog kov tug tuabneeg tuag kws yuav ua rua puab tsi huv, puab tsuas kov tau tug kws yog puab nam puab txiv, puab cov mivnyuas lossis puab tug tijlaug, tug kwv lossis tug muam kws tseem tsi tau yuav quasyawg xwb.
Tom qaab kws tug ntawd ua kevcai ntxuav kuas huv lawm, nwg yuav tau tog xyaa nub,

nwg maam le moog rua chaav kws nyob huv lub Tuamtsev hab fij khoom ua kevcai ntxuav kuas huv, nwg txhaj rov moog ua tau num nyob huv lub Tuamtsev. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has le ntawd.
“Cov povthawj kev noj haus yog cov Yixalayees muab lawv le kuv tau has tseg lawm. Cov povthawj tsi muaj laj tsi muaj teb ua puab tug. Kuv yog tug kws yug puab.

Tej khoom fij kws yog qoobloo, tej tsaj kws coj tuaj theej txhoj hab tej tsaj kws coj tuaj fij dlaws txim, puavleej yog muab ua zaub mov rua cov povthawj. Cov povthawj tau txhua yaam kws cov Yixalayees coj tuaj rua kuv ua puab tug.

Txhua yaam qoobloo kws mej sau tau, mej muab thawj kawm kws zoo tshaaj ntawm thawj phaum kws mej sau tau hab txhua yaam kws mej coj tuaj fij rua kuv yog cov povthawj tug. Txhua zag kws mej cub ncuav, mej muab thawj lub rua cov povthawj, kuv txhaj foom koob moov rua mej tsev tuabneeg.
Cov povthawj yuavtsum tsi xob noj tej noog lossis tej tsaj kws nwg tuag nwg lossis tej tsaj kws lwm tug tsaj tum tuag hlo le.”

Thaus mej muab lub tebchaws faib rua txhua xeem, mej yuavtsum tshwj ib thaaj aav huv lub tebchaws rua tug TSWV ua qhov chaw dlawbhuv. Qhov ntev muaj neeg nkaum tsib txheeb tshim hab qhov dlaav muaj neeg nkaum txheeb tshim.
Thaaj aav kws ca ua lub Tuamtsev ua xwmfaab xwmmeem, ib phaab twg muaj tsib puas tshim. Hab txhua phaab yuavtsum tseg aav seem tsib caug tshim rua saab nrau.
Ib nraab ntawm thaaj aav ntawd, muab neeg nkaum tsib txheeb tshim ntev hab kaum txheeb tshim dlaav, ca ua lub Tuamtsev kws yog qhov chaw dlawbhuv kawg nkaus.

Thaaj aav ntawd yog thaaj kws dlawbhuv huv lub tebchaws, hab yog thaaj kws tseg ca rua cov povthawj kws ua tug TSWV teg num huv lub Tuamtsev. Thaaj aav ntawd ca ua tsev rua cov povthawj nyob hab ua lub Tuamtsev.
Ib nraab ntawm thaaj aav ntawd yog ca ua tsev rua cov Levis kws ua num huv lub Tuamtsev. Puab ua vaaj ua tsev nyob huv thaaj aav ntawd.
Mej muab thaaj aav saab nrau kws nyob npuab thaaj chaw dlawbhuv, qhov ntev muaj neeg nkaum tsib txheeb tshim, hab qhov dlaav muaj tsib txheeb tshim ua cov Yixalayees tug.

Mej tshwj ib thaaj aav rua tug Vaajntxwv kws kaav lub tebchaws. Thaaj aav ntawd txij ndlua ntawm thaaj chaw Dlawbhuv saab nubpoob moog txug rua ntug Havtxwv Meditelanees; hab saab nubtuaj moog rua tug nrimteb kawg. Thaaj aav ntawd qhov ntev mas ntev ib yaam le cov Yixalayees lub tebchaws tug nrimteb saab nubtuaj moog rua saab nubpoob.
Thaaj aav ntawd yog tug Vaajntxwv kws kaav tebchaws kws nyob rua huv lub tebchaws Yixalayees tug, nwg txhaj tsi txeeb tej aav kws tseg ua cov Yixalayees tug.

Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has tas, “Mej cov numtswv kws kaav cov Yixalayees tau ua txhum ntev lug lawm! Mej ca le tseg tsi xob quab yuam hab tsimtxom cov pejxeem. Ca le ua qhov ncaaj hab ua qhov tseeb. Mej tsi xob ntab kuv cov tuabneeg tawm huv puab lub tebchaws moog ntxiv lawm. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has le ntawd.
“Mej yuavtsum siv lub efas hab lub npaj kws tsi ntxo luas:
“Lub efas kws luj tej yaam qhuav yuavtsum sis luag le lub npaj kws luj tej yaam ua kua, ib efas muaj ib feem ntawm ib humes, hab ib npaj los muaj ib feem ntawm ib humes.
“Qhov kws mej luj yog le nuav: Neeg nkaum Kelas muaj ib sekees  Rau caum Sekees muaj ib minas.

“Ntawm nuav yog has txug kev fij khoom kws mej yuav tau fij: moov nplej rau efas twg mej muab ib efas; pobkws: rau efas twg mej muab ib efas; Roj txiv ntoo: kaum npaj twg mej muab ib npaj; (mej yuavtsum siv lub npaj lug luj: kaum npaj muaj ib humes, ib humes hab ib kelas sis npaug). Yaaj: Mej cov Yixalayees, yog leejtwg muaj ob puas tug yaaj, muab ib tug tuaj fij. “Mej yuav tau coj tej qoobloo tuaj fij, tej tsaj kws hlawv fij taagnrho, hab tej tsaj kws fij ua kev sis raug zoo, kuv txhaj yuav zaam mej lub txim. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has le ntawd.
“Taagnrho cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub tebchaws yuavtsum coj  tej khoom fij tuaj rua tug vaajntxwv kws kaav cov Yixalayees.

Tug vaajntxwv teg num yog muab tej tsaj kws tua hlawv fij taagnrho, tej qoobloo, hab muab tej cawv txiv maab, fij ua khoom theej txhoj rua cov Yixalayees thaus ua Kevcai Hli Xab, Nub Xanpataus hab lwm yaam kevcai. Nwg yog tug muab tej tsaj fij taagnrho dlaws txim, fij tej qoobloo, tej tsaj kws hlawv fij taagnrho hab tej khoom kws fij ua kev sis raug zoo, kuv txhaj tshem cov Yixalayees tej kev txhum.”
Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has tas, “Lub ib hlis ntuj nub xab ib, koj yuavtsum muab ib tug ntsuag nyuj kws tsi muaj ib qhov phem le tuaj tua ua khoom fij ntxuav lub Tuamtsev.

Tug povthawj yuav muab ib cov ntshaav ntawm tug tsaj kws tua fij dlaws txim coj moog pleev rua lub Tuamtsev ob tug ncej qhovrooj, plaub ceg kaum thaaj hab cov ncej roojvaag kws moog rua chaav saab huv.

Lub ib hlis ntuj nub xab xyaa, koj ua ib yaam nkaus le kws koj ua nub xab ib, nyob tsaam muaj tej tug yuam kev ua txhum lossis tsi quavntsej nwg tej kev txhum. Koj txhaj le ntxuav tau lub Tuamtsev kuas huv.
“Lub ib hlis ntuj nub kaum plaub, mej yuavtsum pib ua Kevcai Hlaa Dlhau. Xyaa nub ntawd mej noj tej ncuav kws tsi xyaw keeb xwb.
Thawj nub tug vaajntxwv yuavtsum muab ib tug ntsuag nyuj tua fij dlaws nwg hab cov pejxeem suavdlawg lub txim.

Xyaa nub kws ua Kevcai ntawd, ib nub twg tug vaajntxwv yuavtsum fij ib tug ntsuag nyuj hab ib tug laug yaaj kws tsi muaj ib qhov phem le, hlawv taagnrho fij rua tug TSWV. Hab xyaa nub ntawd ib nub twg nwg muab ib tug laug tshis tua fij dlaws txim.
Nwg muab ib efas moov nplej fij nrug ib tug nyuj, ib efas moov nplej fij nrug ib tug yaaj hab ib efas moov nplej twg xyaw peb fwj roj txiv ntoo.

“Lub xyaa hlis ntuj nub kaum tsib kws pib ua Kevcai nyob Tsev Pheebsuab, tug vaajntxwv yuavtsum fij tej tsaj kws muab hlawv taagnrho, tej tsaj kws hlawv fij dlaws txim, tej qoobloo hab tej roj txiv ntoo ib yaam le ua Kevcai Hlaa Dlhau.”

Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has tas, “Rau nub kws ua num ntawd, yuavtsum muab lub roojvaag saab nubtuaj kws moog rua chaav saab huv kaw, tabsis qheb nub Xanpataus hab nub kws ua Kevcai Hli Xab.

Tug vaajntxwv kws kaav lub tebchaws yuav moog ntawm lub tshaav puam saab nrau moog rua ntawm lub roojvaag hab sawv ntawm ib saab tug ncej roojvaag thaus kws cov povthawj muab tej khoom hlawv fij taagnrho hab fij tej khoom ua kev sis raug zoo. Nwg yuav pehawm tug TSWV nyob qhov ntawd hab tawm rov lug rua saab nrau. Lub roojvaag ntawd tsi xob kaw moog txug thaus tsaus ntuj.
Txhua nub Xanpataus hab txhua lub Kevcai Hli Xab, cov pejxeem suavdlawg tuaj txhus caug pehawm tug TSWV ntawm lub roojvaag.
Nub Xanpataus tug vaajntxwv yuavtsum coj rau tug mivnyuas yaaj hab ib tug laug yaaj kws tsi muaj ib qhov phem le tuaj hlawv fij taagnrho rua tug TSWV.

Txhua zag kws fij ib tug laug yaaj twg, nwg muab ib efas moov nplej fij nrug hab ib tug mivnyuas yaaj twg, nwg muab moov nplej ntau npaum le caag fij nrug los tau, tabsis ib efas moov nplej twg muab peb fwj roj txiv ntoo xyaw.
Thaus txug nub ua Kevcai Hli Xab, tug vaajntxwv muab ib tug ntsuag nyuj, rau tug mivnyuas yaaj hab ib tug laug yaaj kws tsi muaj ib qhov phem le tuaj tua fij.

Txhua zag kws vaajntxwv fij tug ntsuag nyuj hab tug laug yaaj, nwg muab ib efas moov nplej fij nrug hab fij ib tug mivnyuas yaaj twg nwg muab moov nplej ntau npaum le caag fij nrug los tau, tabsis ib efas moov nplej twg muab peb fwj roj txiv ntoo xyaw.
Tug vaajntxwv lug lub roojvaag twg lug, ces nwg tawm lub roojvaag ntawd rov qaab xwb.

“Txhua zag kws ua Kevcai cov pejxeem tuaj pehawm tug TSWV, cov kws tuaj ntawm lub roojvaag saab qaumteb tuaj, thaus rov qaab yuavtsum tawm lub roojvaag saab qaabteb moog, hab cov kws tuaj ntawm lub roojvaag saab qaabteb tuaj, thaus rov qaab yuavtsum tawm lub roojvaag saab qaumteb moog. Tsi pub leejtwg tawm lub roojvaag kws nwg tuaj rov qaab.
Tug vaajntxwv yuavtsum tuaj thaus cov pejxeem tuaj hab rov qaab thaus cov pejxeem rov.

Nub ua Kevcai hab ua rooj noj haus lawv le teem ca, puab muab ib efas moov nplej fij nrug ib tug ntsuag nyuj lossis tug laug yaaj, cov mivnyuas yaaj, puab yuav muab moov nplej ntau npaum le caag los tau, tabsis ib efas moov nplej twg muab peb fwj roj txiv ntoo xyaw.

“Thaus tug vaajntxwv xaav fij khoom tshwjxeeb rua tug TSWV, tsi has tej khoom kws muab hlawv fij taagnrho lossis fij ua kev sis raug zoo, yuavtsum qheb lub roojvaag saab nubtuaj kws moog rua chaav saab huv rua nwg moog. Nwg muab khoom fij ib yaam le nwg fij nub Xanpataus, thaus nwg tawm lug lawm yuavtsum kaw lub roojvaag.”

Tug TSWV has tas, “Txhua taagkig sawv ntxuv yuavtsum muab ib tug mivnyuas yaaj noobnyoog ib xyoos kws tsi muaj ib qhov phem le coj lug tua hlawv taagnrho fij rua tug TSWV. Yuavtsum naj nub ua le nuav.
Txhua taagkig twg yuavtsum muab ib feem rau ntawm ib efas moov nplej xyaw ib fwj roj txiv ntoo coj moog fij. Txuj kevcai fij khoom rua tug TSWV nuav, yuavtsum coj moog ibtxhis le.
Tug mivnyuas yaaj, cov moov nplej hab cov roj txiv ntoo yuavtsum coj moog fij rua tug TSWV txhua taagkig moog ibtxhis le.”

Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has tas: “Yog tug vaajntxwv kws kaav tebchaws faib nwg tej laj tej teb rua nwg cov tub ib tug, ces thaaj aav ntawd yuav yog tug tub ntawd hab cov xeebntxwv tug moog le.
Tabsis vaajntxwv muab nwg ib thaaj aav faib rua nwg ib tug tubkhai, ces thaus txug Xyoo Tso  thaaj aav ntawd yeej yog vaajntxwv tug, tsuas yog vaajntxwv hab nwg cov tub txhaj yog tswv aav moog le.

Vaajntxwv tsi xob txeeb cov pejxeem tej laj teb lug ua nwg tug. Nwg tsuas muab tau tej aav kws yog nwg tug lawm pub rua nwg cov tub xwb, nwg tsi xob quab yuam kuv tsaav tuabneeg hab txeeb puab tej laj teb.”

Ces tug txivneej ntawd coj kuv moog rua ntawm lub roojvaag kws tig moog rua cov chaav saab qaumteb kws ze lub roojvaag saab qaabteb ntawm chaav saab huv. Cov chaav dlawbhuv nuav yog ca rua cov povthawj nyob. Nwg qha ib chaav ntawm cov chaav kws nyob saab nubpoob rua kuv

has tas, “Ntawm nuav yog chaav kws cov povthawj hau cov nqaj kws coj moog fij dlaws txim lossis fij theej txhoj hab cub tej ncuav kws yuav coj moog fij, ua le ntawd txhaj tsi coj tej khoom dlawbhuv tawm moog rua saab nrau lub tshaav puam kws yuav ua rua tej tuabneeg raug mob.”
Hab nwg coj kuv moog rua ntawm lub tshaav puam saab nrau hab qha plaub lub ceg kaum tshaav puam miv miv  kws qhov ntev muaj plaub caug tshim hab qhov dlaav muaj peb caug tshim rua kuv.
Txhua lub ceg kaum tshaav puam luas muab pobzeb txhim ua ntsaa thoob plawg hab ua qhovcub npuab cov phaab ntsaa.
Tug txivneej ntawd has rua kuv tas, “Cov qhovcub nuav yog cov kws cov tuabneeg ua num huv lub Tuamtsev hau tej nqaj kws cov tuabneeg coj tuaj fij.”

Tug txivneej ntawd coj kuv rov lug rua ntawm lub qhovrooj Tuamtsev. Muaj ib tug dlej txhawv huv qaab lub qhovrooj ndlwg moog rua saab nubtuaj, (rua qhov lub Tuamtsev tig rua saab nubtuaj.) Tug dlej ntawd ndlwg huv qaab lub Tuamtsev saab nraag moog hlaa lub thaaj ceg kaum saab qaabteb.

Tug txivneej ntawd coj kuv ntawm lub Tuamtsev moog rua peg lub roojvaag saab qaumteb hab ncig moog rua ntawm lub roojvaag kws tig rua saab nubtuaj; ces tug dlej ntawd ndlwg tawm ntawm lub roojvaag saab qaabteb.
Tug txivneej ntawd muab nwg tug paas lug ntsuag ntawm lub qhov kws dlej txhawv moog rua saab nubtuaj, muaj ib txheeb tshim hab nwg coj kuv nqeg rua huv dlej; dlej tub txij kuv muagtaw xwb.
Nwg ntsuag moog ntxiv ib txheeb tshim, dlej tub txij kuv hauvcaug. Nwg rov ntsuag moog ntxiv ib txheeb tshim, dlej tub txij kuv dluav lawm.
Nwg tseem rov ntsuag dlua ib txheeb tshim ntxiv, dlej tub heev ua rua kuv kwm tsi dlhau lawm. Dlej tub heev moog tsi tau le, yuav tau ua luam dlej txhaj moog dlhau xwb.
Nwg has rua kuv tas, “Tub noobneej, koj sau tej nuav ca.” Ces tug txivneej ntawd txawm coj kuv rov moog rua tim ntug dlej,
thaus kws kuv moog txug rua tid, kuv pum muaj ntoo ntau ntau nyob lawv ob saab ntug dlej.

Nwg has rua kuv tas, “Tug dlej nuav ndlwg phua plhawv lub tebchaws moog rua saab nubtuaj, moog tshuam lub haav Yauladees hab ndlwg moog rua Havtxwv Tuag lawm. Thaus tug dlej nuav ndlwg moog txug nraag Havtxwv tuag, cov dlej nuav yuav hloov cov dlej dlaw ntsev huv havtxwv kuas tsuag.

Tug dlej nuav ndlwg moog txug qhov twg, yuav muaj txhua yaam tsaj hab muaj ntseg coob nyob huv. Tug dlej nuav yuav ua rua Havtxwv Tuag tsuag. Hab tug dlej nuav ndlwg moog txug qhov twg txhua tsaav yaam yuav muaj sa.

Cov tuabneeg nrhav ntseg yuav tuaj zab puab tej vaag ntawm ntug havtxwv, txij ndlua ntawm lub Qhovdlej Enkedis moog txug rua ntawm lub Qhovdlej Enkalayees. Lub paag dlej ntawd yuav muaj ntau yaam ntseg nyob huv ib yaam le Havtxwv Meditelanees.
Tabsis tej paag dlej hab tej haav av kws nyob lawv ntug havtxwv yuav tsi tsuag. Tej dlej ntawd yuav dlaw ntsev le qub.

Muaj txhua yaam ntoo kws txi txiv noj tau tuaj lawv ob saab ntug dlej. Cov ntoo ntawd tej nplooj tsi ntsws, tsi qhuav hab txi txiv txhua lub hlis, rua qhov muaj tug dlej kws txhawv huv lub Tuamtsev lug yug cov ntoo ntawd. Cov ntoo ntawd tej txiv ca noj hab tej nplooj ca ua tshuaj.”
Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has tas, “Ntawm nuav yog tej nrimteb huv lub tebchaws kws muab faib rua kaum ob xeem Yixalayees hab xeem Yauxej tau ob npaug.
Kuv tau coglug tseg rua mej cov yawmkoob lawm has tas, kuv yuav muab lub tebchaws nuav rua puab ua puab tug moog le; nwgnuav mej ca le muab faib kuas suavdlawg tau sis npaug zog.
“Tug nrim saab qaumteb txij ndlua ntawm ntug Havtxwv Meditelanees moog rua ntawm lub nroog Heloos, moog rua lub Dlawm Hamas hab moog rua lub nroog Xedas,

moog rua ntawm lub nroog Npeluthas hab Xinpelayees (ob lub nroog nuav nyob ntu nruab nraab ntawm lub nroog Damaxes hab lub nroog Hamas,) hab moog rua ntawm lub nroog Tikoos kws nyob npuab tug nrim tebchaws ntawm cheebtsaam Haulaas.
Tug nrim saab qaumteb, txij ndlua ntawm ntug Havtxwv Meditelanees moog rua ntawm lub nroog Enoos, moog hlaa ntawm lub nroog Damaxes hab lub nroog Hamas tug nrimteb moog rua saab qaumteb lawm.

“Tug nrim saab nubtuaj txij ndlua ntawm lub nroog Damaxes hab lub nroog Haulaas ntu nruab nraab kws yog tug Dlej Yauladees ua nrim rua tebchaws Yixalayees nyob saab nubpoob hab cheebtsaam Nkile-as nyob saab nubtuaj, moog ti nkaus rua ntawm lub nroog Tamaj  kws nyob ntawm ntug dlej Havtxwv Tuag.
“Tug nrim saab qaabteb, txij ndlua ntawm lub nroog Tamaj moog rua ntawm cov paag dlej Kades Melinpas nce rua saab qaumteb nubpoob lawv cov Iziv tug nrimteb moog rua Havtxwv Meditelanees lawm.
“Tug nrim saab nubpoob, yog lawv ntug Havtxwv Meditelanees nce moog rua ntawm Hamas saab nubpoob.
“Ca le muab lub tebchaws nuav faib rua mej kaum ob xeem Yixalayees;

Lub tebchaws nuav yuav ua mej tug moog le. Cov tuabneeg txawv tebchaws kws nrug mej nyob hab puab tej tubki kws yug huv mej lub tebchaws muaj feem tau aav lug ua puab tug thaus mej faib aav. Mej yuavtsum ua zoo rua puab ib yaam le mej ua rua mej cov kwvtij Yixalayees, puab muaj cai nrug mej cov Yixalayees txhua xeem rhu ntawv faib aav.
Txhua tug tuabneeg txawv tebchaws muaj feem nrug xeem kws puab nrug nyob ntawd tau aav lug ua puab tug. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has le ntawd.”

Puab lub tebchaws tug nrim saab qaumteb, txij ndlua ntawm ntug Havtxwv Meditelanees moog rua ntawm lub nroog Heloos, moog rua ntawm lub Dlawm Hamas, moog rua ntawm lub nroog Enoos, moog rua ntu nruab nraab ntawm lub nroog Damaxes hab Hamas. Txhua xeem puavleej tau ib thaaj aav ntawm lub tebchaws, txij ndlua ntawm tug nrimteb saab nubtuaj moog txug tug nrimteb saab nubpoob ntawm Havtxwv Meditelanees,  hab qaumteb moog ti nkaus qaabteb lawv le cov npe xeem nuav: Xeem Daas Xeem Aseles Xeem Nathalis Xeem Manaxes Xeem Efalayees Xeem Lunpees Xeem Yudas Xeem Daas Xeem Aseles Xeem Nathalis Xeem Manaxes Xeem Efalayees Xeem Lunpees Xeem Yudas

Tshwj ib thaaj aav npuab xeem Yudas thaaj, thaaj aav ntawd qhov dlaav hab qhov ntev sis npaug zog, qaumteb rua qaabteb muaj neeg nkaum tsib txheeb tshim, hab nubtuaj rua nubpoob muaj neeg nkaum tsib txheeb tshim, ib yaam nkaus le tej feem kws muab faib rua kaum ob xeem. Yuav ua lub Tuamtsev rua huv thaaj aav ntawd.
Thaaj aav kws tshwj tseg rua tug TSWV, qhov ntev muaj neeg nkaum tsib txheeb tshim hab qhov dlaav muaj neeg nkaum tsib txheeb tshim.

Cov povthawj tau ib feem ntawm thaaj aav dlawbhuv nuav lug ua puab tug. Qhov ntev saab nubtuaj rua saab nubpoob muaj neeg nkaum tsib txheeb tshim, hab qhov dlaav qaumteb rua qaabteb muaj kaum txheeb tshim. Tug TSWV lub Tuamtsev nyob rua huv plawv thaaj aav nuav.

Thaaj aav dlawbhuv nuav yog tseg rua cov povthawj kws yog Xadaus caajceg. Puab muab sab npuab kuv, tsi tso kuv tseg hab tsi koom nrug cov Yixalayees ua txhum ib yaam le cov Levis kws tau moog ua txhum lawm.
Yog le ntawd, puab txhaj tau ib feem ntawm thaaj aav kws tshwj tseg nyob npuas ntawm cov Levis le, thaaj aav ntawd yog thaaj kws dlawbhuv kawg nkaus.

Cov Levis tau ib feem ntawm thaaj aav kws tshwj tseg nyob saab qaabteb npuas cov povthawj le. Thaaj aav ntawd nubtuaj rua nubpoob, qhov ntev muaj neeg nkaum tsib txheeb tshim, hab qaumteb rua qaabteb muaj neeg nkaum txheeb tshim.
Thaaj aav kws muab fij rua tug TSWV yog thaaj kws zoo tshaaj plawg huv lub tebchaws, tsi pub muab muag, muab pauv lossis muab hloov rua leejtwg le. Thaaj aav ntawd dlawbhuv hab yog tug TSWV tug.

Thaaj aav seem saab nrau kws npuas thaaj aav dlawbhuv, qhov ntev muaj neeg nkaum tsib txheeb tshim hab qhov dlaav muaj tsib txheeb tshim, yog tseg rua cov pejxeem ua vaaj ua tsev nyob rua huv plawv hab tseg saab nrau ua tshaav tsaj.
Thaaj aav kws puab ua vaaj ua tsev nyob ntawd, dlaav hab ntev xwmfaab xwmmeem, ib phaab twg muaj plaub txheeb tsib puas tshim.
Lub nroog ntawd tseg aav seem puagncig saab nrau ca ua tshaav tsaj, ib phaab twg dlaav ob puas tsib caug tshim hab ntev ob puas tsib caug tshim.

Thaaj aav seem kws nyob npuas ntawm thaaj aav dlawbhuv, saab nubtuaj muaj kaum txheeb tshim hab saab nubpoob muaj kaum txheeb tshim. Thaaj aav ntawd ca cog qoobloo rua cov tuabneeg kws ua num huv lub nroog noj.
Cov Yixalayees txhua xeem kws nyob huv lub nroog, moog ua cov teb ntawd.
Thaaj aav kws tshwj tseg ntawd dlaav hab ntev xwmfaab xwmmeem, ib phaab twg muaj neeg nkaum tsib txheeb tshim kws yog xaam thaaj aav kws ua lub nroog nrug.

Thaaj aav kws ua lub Tuamtsev, thaaj aav kws cov povthawj nyob, thaaj aav kws cov Levis nyob, thaaj aav kws ua lub nroog hab thaaj aav kws tseg ca ua teb, saab nubtuaj lossis saab nubpoob, puavleej yog tug vaajntxwv kws kaav lub tebchaws tug. Thaaj aav ntawd saab nubtuaj, dlaav moog ti nkaus rua tug nrimteb saab nubtuaj, hab saab nubpoob moog ti nkaus rua Havtxwv Meditelanees, saab qaumteb txij ndlua ntawm xeem Npeenyamees tug nrimteb lug hab saab qaabteb txij ndlua ntawm xeem Yudas tug nrimteb lug.

Feem aav kws nyob rua saab qaabteb, yog muab faib rua cov xeem kws tsi tau muaj aav, tug nrim txij ndlua tug nrim tebchaws saab nubtuaj moog ti nkaus rua Havtxwv Meditelanees. Pib faib qaumteb rua qaabteb rua cov xeem nuav: Xeem Npeenyamees Xeem Xime-oos Xeem Ixakhas Xeem Xenpuloos Xeem Khas.

Thaaj aav nyob saab qaabteb kws muab tu rua xeem Khas, tug nrim txij ndlua ntawm Tamas moog txug rua saab qaabteb nubpoob moog rua cov paag dlej Kades, hab saab qaumteb nubpoob, txij ndlua ntawm Iziv tug nrimteb moog rua Havtxwv Meditelanees.
Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam has tas, “Ntawm nuav yog has txug qhov kws muab lub tebchaws faib rua cov xeem Yixalayees ua puab tug.”

Muaj kaum ob lub roojvaag kws moog rua huv lub nroog Yeluxalees. Ib saab phaab ntsaa yeej twg ntev plaub txheeb tsib puas tshim hab muaj peb lub roojvaag. Ib lub roojvaag twg yog ib xeem npe. Cov roojvaag saab qaumteb tis npe lawv le xeem Lunpees, xeem Yudas hab xeem Levis; cov roojvaag saab nubtuaj tis npe lawv le xeem Yauxej, zeem Npeenyamees hab xeem Daas; cov roojvaag saab qaabteb tis npe lawv le xeem Xime-oos, xeem Ixakhas hab xeem Xenpuloos; hab cov roojvaag saab nubpoob tis npe lawv le xeem Khas, xeem Aseles hab xeem Nathalis.
Tug ntsaa yeej puagncig lub nroog muaj kaum yim txheeb tshim. Txij nuav moog, lub nroog yuav muaj npe hu ua “Tug TSWV Nyob Ntawm Nuav!”
